1 Na me, Alma, Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ me bio, sɛ memfa Amulek na yɛnkɔ ka nsɛmpa no bio nkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi anaa sɛ nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Amonaeha kuropɔn mu hɔ no, ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a mehyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ mereka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn no, wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔ ne me represo sɛ:

2 Wo ne hwan? Wodwene sɛ yɛbɛgye nnipa baako adanseɛ adi, ɛwɔ mu sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔka kyerɛ yɛn sɛ asaase yi bɛtwa mu akɔ?

3 Afei na wɔnte nsɛm a wɔkaae no ase; ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnim sɛ asaase yi bɛtwa mu akɔ.

4 Na wɔkaa nso sɛ: Sɛ wohyɛ nkɔm sɛ kuropɔn kɛseɛ yi bɛsɛe da koro mpo a yɛnnye wo nsɛm no nni.

5 Afei na wɔnnim sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛtumi ayɛ saa anwanwadwuma yi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ akomadenfoɔ ne ɛkɔnseneɛfoɔ nso.

6 Na wɔkaa sɛ: Hwan ne Onyankopɔn no a ɔsoma obi a ɔwɔ ho kwan ka nnipa baako yi ho wɔ nkurɔfoɔ yi mu, sɛ ɔmmera mmɛda nokware a ɛwɔ saa nneɛma akɛseɛ a ɛyɛ nnwanwa yi adi nkyerɛ wɔn anaa?

7 Na wɔbɛnn me sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa rebɛka me; na mmom hwɛ, wɔantumi. Na mede akokoɔduro sɔree sɛ merebɛkasa akyerɛ wɔn, aane, medii adanseɛ akokoɔduro mu kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

8 Monhwɛ, O nnɛ mma atirimuɔdenfoɔ a moakyea, adɛn nti na mowerɛ afiri mo agyanom amammerɛ; aane, adɛn nti na ankyɛre koraa na mowerɛ afiri Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm yi.

9 Monkae sɛ yɛn agya, Lihae, Onyankopɔn nsa na ɛyii no firii Yerusalem baae? Monkae sɛ ɔno na ɔde wɔn faa ɛserɛ no so anaa?

10 Na ankyɛre koraa na mowerɛ afiri mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔyii yɛn agyanom firii wɔn atamfo nsa mu, na ɔkoraa wɔn sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔnsɛe wɔn, na ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn ankasa wɔn nuanom mpo nsa mu?

11 Aane, na sɛ nnyɛ ne tumi a ɛtwa tumi biara mu no a, ne n’ahummɔborɔ, ne n’abodwokyerɛ a ɛwɔ yɛn so a, anka wɔatwa yɛn afiri asaase yi ani so dadaada koraa a anka yɛntumi nnyɛ ho hwee ansa na saa mmerɛ yi reba, na annhwɛ a anka yɛwɔ mɔborɔyɛ ne ɔhaw a ɛnni awieɛ mu.

12 Mo nhwɛ, afei mese mo sɛ, wahyɛ mo sɛ monsakyera; na gye sɛ mosakyera, anyɛ saa a ɛkwan biara nni hɔ a mobɛnya Onyankopɔn aheman no adie. Na mmom monhwɛ, nyɛ ne nyina ara nie—wahyɛ mo sɛ monsakyera anyɛ saa a ɔbɛsɛe mo korakora afiri asaase yi ani so; aane; ɔde n’abufuo bɛba mo nkyɛn, na ɔrennane ne ho wɔ n’abufuhyeɛ mu.

13 Monhwɛ, monnkae nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ Lihae, sɛ: Mmerɛ dodoɔ no a mobɛdi me mmaransɛm so no, mobɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm wɔ asaase yi so no? Na ɔkaa bio sɛ: Mmerɛ dodoɔ no a monni me mmaransɛm so no, wɔbɛtwa mo afiri Awurade anim atwene.

14 Afei mɛpɛ sɛ mokae sɛ, mmerɛ dodoɔ no a Lamanfoɔ no nnii Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm so no, watwa wɔn afiri Awurade anim atwene. Afei yɛhunu sɛ Awurade asɛm ada adi wɔ saa adeɛ yi mu, na watwa Lamanfoɔ no afiri n’anim atwene, ɛfiri wɔn mmaratoɔ ahyɛaseɛ wɔ asaase yi so.

15 Nanso mese mo sɛ, sɛ mokɔ so tena mo bɔne mu a ɛbɛyɛ koraa ama wɔn wɔ atɛmmuda no mu akyɛn mo, aane, ɛbɛyɛ koraa ama wɔn mpo wɔ abrabɔ yi mu akyɛn mo, na gye sɛ mo sakyera.

16 Na bɔhyɛ bebree wɔ hɔ a Lamanfoɔ no nsa bɛka; na ɛfirii wɔn agyanom amammerɛ nti na wɔaka atetekwaa tebea mu; ɛno nti Awurade bɛma wɔn nkwa aware wɔ asaase yi so no.

17 Na mmerɛ bi bɛba a ɔbɛma wɔn agye n’asɛm no adi; na wɔahunu mfomsoɔ a ɛwɔ wɔn agyanom amammerɛ mu; na wɔbɛgye wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara nkwa, na Awurade bɛhunu wɔn a wɔbɔ ne din no nyina ara mmɔbɔ.

18 Na mmom hwɛ Mese mo sɛ, sɛ mokɔ so wɔ mo atirimuɔdensɛm mu a mo nkwa nna renware wɔ asaase yi so ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛma Lamanfoɔ no aba mo so; na sɛ moansakyera a ɛnneɛ wɔbɛba mo so wɔ mmerɛ a monnim, na wɔde ɔsɛee kɛseɛ bɛba mo so; na Awurade abufuhyeɛ na ɔbɛma aba no saa.

19 Na ɔremma montena mo amumuyɛ mu mfa nsɛe ne nkurɔfoɔ. Mese mo sɛ, Daabi; na mmom ɔbɛpɛ sɛ ɔbɛma Lamanfoɔ no asɛe ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔfrɛ wɔn Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara, sɛ ɛba sɛ wɔtumi hwease wɔ bɔne ne mmaratoɔ mu wɔ mmerɛ a wɔahunu ɛhan kɛseɛ a ɛte sei na wɔama wɔanya wɔn Awurade Nyankopɔn ho nimdeɛ kɛseɛ a ɛte sei yi a.

20 Aane, na mmerɛ a wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔsɔ Awurade ani yi, aane, wɔ mmerɛ a n’ani gye wɔn ho kyɛn ɔman biara, abusuakuo biara, kasa hodoɔ biara anaa nnipa biara no; wɔ mmerɛ a wada nneɛma nyina ara adi akyerɛ wɔn yi, sɛdeɛ wɔn pɛ, ne wɔn gyedie, ne mpaebɔ teɛ, wɔ deɛ abɛsene, ne deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ, ne deɛ ɛbɛba no;

21 Wɔ mmerɛ a Onyankopɔn Honhom aba wɔn hɔ; na wɔne abɔfoɔ akasa awie, na Awurade nne akasa akyerɛ wɔn awie, na wɔanya nkɔmhyɛ honhom, ne yikyerɛ honhom, ne akyɛdeɛ bebree nso, kasa ahodoɔ akyɛdeɛ, ne nsɛmpa ka ho akyɛdeɛ, ne Honhom Kronkron akyɛdeɛ no, ne kasa nkyerɛaseɛ ho akyɛdeɛ.

22 Aane, mmerɛ a Onyankopɔn nam Awurade nsa so gyee wɔn firii Yerusalem asaase so no, na ɔgyee wɔn firii ɔkɔm, ne yareɛ, ne yaredɔm ahodoɔ nyina ara mu; na wɔnyaa ahoɔden wɔ ako mu, ɛno nti wɔansɛe wɔn no, wɔayi wɔn afiri nkoasom mu firi mmerɛ baako kɔsi mmerɛ baako mu, na wakora wɔn ara abɛsi saa mmerɛ yi; na wɔayɛ frɔmfrɔm ara abɛsi sɛ wɔayɛ asikafoɔ wɔ nneɛma ahodoɔ nyina ara mu—

23 Na afei monhwɛ Mese mo sɛ, sɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi a wɔanya nhyira pii a ɛte sei yi afiri Awurade nsam mu, to mmara tia ɛhan ne nimdeɛ a wɔwɔ a, mese mo sɛ sɛ ɛba no saa a, na wɔhwease wɔ mmaratoɔ mu a, ɛnneɛ ɛbɛyɛ koraa ama Lamanfoɔ no akyɛn wɔn.

24 Na monhwɛ, Awurade bɔhyɛ no aso Lamanfoɔ so, na mmom sɛ moto mmara a ɛrenso mo so; na Awurade nhyɛɛ bɔ a ɛho da hɔ na ɔnnhyɛɛ mmara denden ntoo hɔ sɛ sɛ mote ne so atua a ɔbɛsɛe mo korakora afiri asaase yi ani so?

25 Na afei sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, ɔnsɛe mo no, Awurade asoma ne bɔfoɔ sɛ ɔmmɛsera ne nkurɔfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no ara, na ɔnna no adi nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ na wɔnkɔ su dendennden nkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ: Mo nsakyeraɛ, na ɔsoro aheman no abɛn.

26 Na ɛfiri saa mmerɛ yi ɛrenkyɛ biara na Onyankopɔn Ba no aba wɔ n’animuonyam mu; na n’animuonyam bɛyɛ sɛ Agya no ba a ɔwoo no korɔ n’animuonyam, ɔno na adom, kyɛpɛ ne nokware, ɔno na abotare ahyɛ no ma, ne ahummɔborɔ, ne abodwokyerɛ, ne ho yɛ hare wɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ sufrɛ ho na ɔtie wɔn mpaebɔ.

27 Na monhwɛ, ɔreba abɛdi ama wɔn a wɔnam gyedie a ɛwɔ ne din mu anya nsakyeraɛ asubɔ no.

28 Ɛno nti, monsiesie Awurade kwan mu, na mmerɛ a nnipa nyina ara bɛnya wɔn nwuma ho akatua sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ no abɛn—sɛ wɔyɛɛ no tenenee mu a wɔbɛtwa nkwagyeɛ ama wɔn akra, sɛdeɛ Yesu Kristo tumi a ɔde gye nkwa no teɛ; na sɛ wɔyɛɛ bɔne a wɔbɛtwa ɛfɔbuo ama wɔn akra, sɛdeɛ ɔbonsam tumi teɛ no.

29 Afei monhwɛ, yei ne ɔbɔfoɔ no nne a ɛretea mu kyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no.

30 Na afei me nuanom adɔfoɔ, mo yɛ me nuanom, na ɛsɛ sɛ mo nya ɔdɔ ma mo ho na mo yɛ nwuma a ɛde nsakyeraɛ ba, mo ahunu sɛ mo akoma ayɛ dendennden wɔ Onyankopɔn asɛm ho, na moahunu sɛ moyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a moayera na moahwease.

31 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a me Alma me kaa saa nsɛm yi no, monhwɛ, nkurɔfoɔ no bo fuu me, ɛfiri sɛ, maka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ akomadenfoɔ na ɛkɔnseneɛfoɔ nso.

32 Na afei nso ɛnam sɛ maka akyerɛ wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔayera na wɔahwe ase nti no, wɔn bo fuu me, na wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa ka me, na wɔkyere me to afiase.

33 Na mmom ɛbaa sɛ Awurade amma kwan amma wɔn nsa anka me saa mmerɛ no mu amfa me anto afiase.

34 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amulek sɔre gyinaae, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn nso. Na afei nnyɛ Amulek nsɛm no nyina ara na me twerɛeɛ, nanso wɔatwerɛ ne nsɛm no mu bi wɔ nwoma yi mu.
alma 10:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lihae yɛ Manase aseni—Amulek ka ɔbɔfoɔ no hyɛ a ɔhyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnhwɛ Alma no—Ateneneefoɔ mpaebɔ ma wɔnsɛe nkurɔfoɔ no—Mmaranimfoɔ ne atɛmmuafoɔ a wɔntene twa fapem to hɔ ma nkurɔfoɔ no sɛee. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 82 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei yei ne nsɛm a Amulek kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Amonaeha asaase so no, ɔse:

2 Me ne Amulek; Me ne Gidona babarima no, ɔno na ɔyɛ Ismael a ɔyɛ Aminadae aseni no babarima no; na saa Aminadae yi na ɔkyerɛɛ ntwerɛeɛ a Onyankopɔn de ne nsatea twerɛe wɔ tɛmpol no afasuo no ho no ase.

3 Na Aminadae yɛ Nifae aseni a ɔyɛ Lihae babarima a ɔfirii Yerusalem asaase so baae no, ɔno a ɔyɛ Yosef a ne nuanom de wɔn nsa tɔnn no maa wɔde no kɔɔ Misraim no babarima Manase aseni.

4 Na monhwɛ, Me nso meyɛ nnipa bi a mewɔ dibrɛ a ɛnnyɛ ketewa wɔ wɔn a wɔnim me nyina ara mu; aane, na monhwɛ, mewɔ mmusuafoɔ ne ayɔnkofoɔ, na menam me nsa ano nwuma so anya ahonyadeɛ pii.

5 Nanso, yei nyina ara akyiri no, na mennim Awurade akwan, ne n’asumasɛm ne ne tumi a ɛyɛ nnwanwa no. Mese na mennim saa nneɛma yei yi da; mmom monhwɛ, sɛ na mereyɛ mfomsoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ m’ahunu n’ahuntasɛm ne ne tumi a ɛyɛ nnwanwa no pii; aane, mpo sɛ wakora nkurɔfoɔ yi nkwa mu.

6 Nanso, meyɛɛ m’akoma den, ɛfiri sɛ ɔfrɛɛ me mmerɛ bebree na mantie; ɛno nti menim deɛ ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho, nanso mampɛ sɛ mɛhunu; ɛno nti menam m’akoma atirimuɔdensɛm so tee atua wɔ Onyankopɔn so ara de kɔsii bosome a ɛtɔ so nson yi mu, ɛda a ɛtɔ so nan no a ɛyɛ afe a ɛtɔ so nan a ɛyɛ afe a ɛtɔ so du no mu wɔ atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie mu.

7 Mmerɛ a meretu kwan akɔhwɛ me busuani bi a ɔbɛn me no, monhwɛ Awurade bɔfoɔ yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ me na ɔkaa sɛ: Amulek, san wakyiri kɔ wo fie, na wo na wo bɛma Awurade nkɔmhyɛni aduane adi; aane nnipa kronkron a Onyankopɔn ahwɛ mu ayi no; na wakyene ɛkɔm nna bebree, ɛnam saa nkurɔfoɔ yi bɔne nti, na ɔkɔm de no, na fa no kɔ wo fie kɔma no biribi ma ɔnni, na ɔbɛhyira wo ne wo fiefoɔ; na Awurade nhyira no bɛba wo ne wo fiefoɔ so.

8 Na ɛbaa sɛ metiee ɔbɔfoɔ no nne, na mesann m’akyiri sɛ merekɔ me fie. Na mmerɛ a merekɔ hɔ no, mehunuu ɔbarima no a ɔbɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: wode no bɛkɔ wofie no—na hwɛ ɔno ne saa ɔbarima yi a ɔreka nneɛma a ɛfa Onyankopɔn ho kyerɛ wo no.

9 Na ɔbɔfoɔ no see me sɛ ɔyɛ nnipa kronkron, ɛno nti mehunuu sɛ ɔyɛ nnipa kronkron ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn bɔfoɔ na ɔka kyerɛɛ me.

10 Na menim bio nso sɛ, nneɛma a wadi ho adanseɛ no yɛ nokware; na hwɛ mese mo sɛ, sɛ Awurade te ase yi, saa ara nso na ɔsomaa ne bɔfoɔ maa ɔdaa saa nneɛma yi adi kyerɛɛ me; na ɔyɛe sei wɔ mmerɛ a na Alma te me fie no.

11 Na monhwɛ, wahyira me fie, wahyira me, ne me mmaa, ne me mma, ne m’agya ne m’abusuakuo nyina ara mpo, na Awurade nhyira aba yɛn so sɛdeɛ nsɛm a ɔkaeɛ no teɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ no.

12 Na afei mmerɛ a Amulek kaa saa nsɛm no nkurɔfoɔ no ho hyɛɛ aseɛ dwirii wɔn; mmerɛ a wɔhunuu sɛ nnyɛ ɔdanseni baako pɛ na ɔredi adanseɛ atia wɔn wɔ deɛ wɔayɛ ho, ne nneɛma nso a ɛbɛba ho, sɛdeɛ nkɔmhyɛ honhom a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no teɛ.

13 Nanso, na ebinom wɔ wɔn mu a wɔdwene sɛ wɔbɛbisa wɔn nsɛm, ama wɔafa naadaa pɔ so ama wɔn nsa aka wɔn wɔ wɔn kasaa mu, ama wɔanya biribi de agyina so adi adanseɛ atia wɔn, na wɔde wɔn ama wɔn atɛmmuafoɔ sɛ wɔne wɔnni no sɛdeɛ mmera no teɛ, na wɔakum wɔn anaa sɛ wɔde wɔn ato afiase, sɛdeɛ bɔne a wɔbɛtumi aka ato wɔn so no anaa sɛ wɔbɛdi ho adanseɛ atia wɔn.

14 Afei saa nnipa no a na wɔrehwehwɛ asɛe wɔn no na wɔyɛ mmaranimfoɔ a na nkurɔfoɔ no abɔ wɔn paa anaa sɛ wɔayi wɔn asi hɔ ama wɔn tumi sɛ wɔmfa mmara no nni nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ bɔne no asɛm ansa na wɔde wɔn akɔ atɛmmuafoɔ no anim.

15 Afei saa mmaranimfoɔ yi asua nkurɔfoɔ no abrabɔ ne wɔn nnaadaa nyina ara; na yei bɛma wɔde nyansa adi wɔn dwuma no yie.

16 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ bisabisaa Amulek nsɛm ama wɔnam yei so ama wadanedane ne nsɛm no anaa sɛ wasesa nsɛm a ɔbɛka no.

17 Afei na wɔnnim sɛ Amulek bɛtumi ahunu wɔn akwan a wɔayɛ no. Na mmom ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrebisabisa no nsɛm no, ɔhunuu wɔn adwene, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: O mo atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne nnɛ mma abɔnefoɔ, mo mmaranimfoɔ ne nyaatwomfoɔ, mo reto fapem ama ɔbonsam, ɛfiri sɛ moresunsum apa ne mfidie na mode abɛkyere Onyankopɔn akronkronfoɔ no.

18 Moreyɛ akwan de asi ateneneefoɔ kwan, na mode atwe Onyankopɔn abufuhyeɛ aba mo tiri so, ama ɔsɛee kɛseɛ aba nkurɔfoɔ yi so.

19 Aane, ne yie mu na Mosaya a na ɔyɛ yɛn hene a ɔdi akyire no kaeɛ, wɔ mmerɛ a na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔde ahennie no ma, ɛnam sɛ ɔnhunu deɛ ɔmfa mma no no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ wɔmma nkurɔfoɔ yi ankasa nyi deɛ wɔpɛ sɛ ɔhwɛ wɔn so—aane, ne yie mu na ɔkaa sɛ, sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ mmerɛ no ba ma nkurɔfoɔ yi fa amumuyɛ a, ɛne sɛ, sɛ mmerɛ no ba ma nkurɔfoɔ yi hwease wɔ mmaratoɔ mu a, na mmerɛ no aso sɛ wɔsɛe wɔn.

20 Na afei mese mo sɛ Awurade abua mo yie wɔ mo amumuyɛ ho; na ɛyɛ sɛ ɔmaa n’abɔfoɔ de nne teaa mu see nkurɔfoɔ yi sɛ: Monsakyera, monsakyera, na ɔsoro aheman no abɛn.

21 Aane, ɛyɛ sɛ ɔmaa n’abɔfoɔ de nne teaa mu sɛ: Mede pɛpɛyɛ ne atentene wɔ me nsa mu reba me nkurɔfoɔ mu.

22 Aane, na mese mo sɛ, sɛ ɛnnyɛ ateneneefoɔ a wɔwɔ asaase yi so no mpaebɔ a, anka saa mmerɛ yi wɔasɛe mo korakora mpo, nanso ɔremfa nsuyire nso, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛɛ wɔ Noa aberɛ so nkurɔfoɔ no, na mmom ɔde ɔkɔm, ne nsaeyareɛ, ne akofena.

23 Mmom ɛnam ateneneefoɔ mpaebɔ so nti na ɔde mo ho akyɛ mo; afei ɛno nti, sɛ mobɛpamo ateneneefoɔ no afiri mo mu a na Awurade remfa ne nsa nto hɔ; na mmom ɔbɛba mo so wɔ n’abufuhyeɛ mu, na ɔkɔm, ne nsaeyareɛ, ne akofena bɛkum mo; na ɛrenkyɛre na mmerɛ no aduru, gye sɛ mosakyera.

24 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ nkurɔfoɔ no bo fuu Amulek yie, na wɔteaa mu kaa sɛ: Saa ɔbarima yi ka asɛm bɔne tia yɛn mmara a ɛtene yi, ne yɛn mmaranimfoɔ a yɛayi wɔn yi.

25 Na mmom Amulek tenee ne nsa, na ɔteaa mu dendennden see wɔn sɛ: O mo atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne nnɛ mma abɔnefoɔ, adɛn nti na ɔbonsam asɔ mo akoma mu dendennden sei? Adɛn nti na moagyae mo ho ama no ama wanya tumi wɔ mo so yi, ama no afira mo ani, ama moante nsɛm a wɔaka yi ase, sɛdeɛ wɔn nokware no teɛ no?

26 Na mo nhwɛ, m’adi adanseɛ atia mo mmara? Monte aseɛ; mose makasa atia mo mmara; mmom m’ankasa antia, na mmom makasa ama mo mmara, de abu mo fɔ.

27 Na afei monhwɛ, Mese mo sɛ, mo mmaranimfoɔ ne mo atɛmmuafoɔ abrabɔ a ɛntene na wɔahyɛ aseɛ reto ɔsɛee fapem de ama nkurɔfoɔ yi.

28 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amulek kaa saa nsɛm yi wieeɛ no nkurɔfoɔ no teateaa mu guu no so sɛ: Afei yɛahunu sɛ saa ɔbarima yi yɛ ɔbonsam ba, ɛfiri sɛ wadi atorɔ akyerɛ yɛn; ɛfiri sɛ wakasa atia yɛn mmara. Na afei ɔse wɔankasa antia mmara no.

29 Na wakasa bio nso de atia yɛn mmaranimfoɔ, ne yɛn atɛmmuafoɔ.

30 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmaranimfoɔ no de hyɛɛ wɔn akoma mu sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛkae saa nsɛm yi de atia no.

31 Na na baako bi wɔ wɔn mu a ne din de Seesrom. Afei ɔno na ɔyii n’anim kɛseɛ kasa tiaa Amulek ne Alma, ɔno na ɔyɛ wɔn a wɔdi akotene pa ara no mu baako, ɔno na ɔwɔ dwumadie kɛseɛ di wɔ nkurɔfoɔ no mu.

32 Afei botaɛ a ɛsi mmaranimfoɔ yi ani so ne sɛ, wɔbɛnya mfasoɔ; na wɔnyaa mfasoɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn adwuma teɛ.
alma 11:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ Nifaefoɔ sikasɛm mu—Amulek ne Seesrom yɛ akasakasa—Kristo nnye nkurɔfoɔ wɔ wɔn bɔne mu—Wɔn a wɔbɛnya ɔsoro aheman adi no nko ara na wɔbɛgye wɔn nkwa—Nnipa nyina ara de honamdua a ɛnnwuo no bɛsɔre—Owuo biara nni wusɔreɛ akyiri. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 82 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei ɛwɔ Mosaya mmara mu sɛ obiara a ɔbu mmara no ho atɛn, anaa sɛ wɔn a wɔayi wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔgye akatua wɔ mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔbɛdi de abua wɔn a wɔde wɔn bɛba wɔn anim no nsɛm no.

2 Afei sɛ obi de obi ka, na sɛ ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔtua ka no a, ɔbɔ no kwaadu kyerɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no; na atɛmmuafoɔ no nam ɔkwan a wɔde ama no no so ma wɔkɔfa saa nnipa no ba n’anim; na ɔbua nnipa korɔ no asɛm sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ ne adanseɛ a wɔadi de atia no no, na wɔma saa nnipa no tua ɛka a ɔde no, anaasɛ wɔgye n’agyapadeɛ nyina ara, anaa sɛ wɔpamo no firi nkurɔfoɔ no mu sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ ɔkorɔmfoɔ ne odwotwafoɔ.

3 Na ɔtɛmmuafoɔ no akatua a ɔgyeɛ no gyina mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɔde yɛ adwuma so—sika kɔkɔɔ senin baako da koro; anaa sɛ dwetɛ senum a ɛne sika kɔkɔɔ senin yɛ pɛ; na yei ne sɛdeɛ mmara a wɔde maaeɛ no teɛ.

4 Afei saa edin yi na wɔde frɛɛ sika kɔkɔɔ ne dwetɛ ahodoɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn boɔ teɛ. Na Nifaefoɔ no na ɛtotoo saa din no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔamfa sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ de bu wɔn akonta wɔ Yerusalem no; na wɔamfa adeɛ a Yudafoɔ de susu wɔn deɛ no; na mmom wɔnam wɔn ankasa wɔn adwene ne sɛdeɛ nneɛma teɛ so sesaa wɔn nkariɛ ne wɔn asusudeɛ no wɔ awoɔntoatoasoɔ biara mu, de kɔsi atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie so, ɛno na ɔhene Mosaya hyehyɛɛe wɔ n’aberɛ so.

5 Afei sei na na—sika kɔkɔɔ sinin baako, sika kɔkɔɔ sian baako, sika kɔkɔɔ shum, ne sika kɔkɔɔ limna mu duro teɛ.

6 Dwetɛ senum baako, dwetɛ amno baako, dwetɛ esrum baako ne dwetɛ onti baako.

7 Dwetɛ senum baako yɛ sika kɔkɔɔ senim baako, anaasɛ atokoɔ nsusuɛ baako, ɛna afei nso aburo abusuakuo ahodoɔ no nyina ara nsusuɛ maakomaako.

8 Afei sika kɔkɔɔ sian baako yɛ senin mmɔho mmienu.

9 Na sika kɔkɔɔ shum baako yɛ sian mmɔho mmienu.

10 Na sika kɔkɔɔ limna baako yɛ ne nyina ara a wɔaka abɔm baako.

11 Na dwetɛ amno baako yɛ senum mmɔho mmienu.

12 Na dwetɛ esrum baako yɛ senum mmɔho nan.

13 Na anti baako yɛ ne nyina ara a wɔaka abɔm boɔ.

14 Afei sei na na wɔn sika no mu nketewa nsusuɛ teɛ—

15 Siblon baako yɛ senum fa; ɛno nti, siblon yɛ atokoɔ nsusuɛ fa.

16 Na shiblum baako yɛ siblon fa.

17 Na leu baako yɛ shiblum fa.

18 Afei sei na wɔn dodoɔ teɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔn nsusuɛ teɛ.

19 Afei sika kɔkɔɔ antean baako yɛ shiblan mmiɛnsa.

20 Afei, na wɔn botaee kɛseɛ ne sɛ wɔbɛnya wɔn ho, na ɛnam sɛ mmerɛ dodoɔ a wɔde yɛ adwuma no ho akatua na wɔnya nti, no, wɔkanyan nkurɔfoɔ no maa wɔtee atua, ne ahurukasɛm ahodoɔ nyina ara ne amumuyɛ, ama wɔanya adwuma pii ama wɔanya sika afiri nsɛm a wɔde bɛba wɔn anim ama wɔadi no ho teɛ; ɛno nti wɔkanyan nkurɔfoɔ no maa wɔsɔre tiaa Alma ne Amulek.

21 Na saa Seesrom yi hyɛɛ aseɛ bisabisaa Amulek nsɛm sɛ: Wo bɛyiyi nsɛm kakra yi a merebɛbisa wo yi ano? Na Seesrom yɛ nnipa bi a ɔdi akotene wɔ ɔbonsam nhyehyɛ bɔne mu yie, ama watumi asɛe deɛ ɛyɛ; ɛno nti ɔsee Amulek sɛ: Wobɛyiyi nsɛm a merebɛbisa wo yi ano anaa?

22 Na Amulek see no sɛ: Aane, sɛ Awurade Honhom a ɛwɔ me mu no ma me ho kwan a, ɛfiri sɛ me renka biribi a ɛne Awurade Honhom no bɔ abira. Na Seesrom buaa no sɛ: Hwɛ, dwetɛ anti nsia nie, na mede yei nyina ara bɛma wo, sɛ wobɛka sɛ Onyankopɔn tumfoɔ biara nni hɔ a.

23 Afei Amulek kaa sɛ: O wo asamando ba, adɛn nti na woregyegye me yi? Wonnim sɛ ɔteneneeni nnyae ne ho mma nsɔhwɛ sei?

24 Wo gyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ anaa? Mese wo sɛ, Daabi, wonim sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, na mmom wodɔ wo sika kyɛn no.

25 Na afei watwa ntorɔ akyerɛ me wɔ Onyankopɔn anim. Wo see me sɛ—Hwɛ saa anti nsia yi a ɛsombo kɛseɛ yi, mede bɛma wo—wɔ mmerɛ a ɛwɔ w’akoma mu sɛ wo remfa mma me; na mmom wo botaɛ ara ne sɛ wo rehwehwɛ me ama mapo Onyankopɔn nokwarefoɔ teasefoɔ no, na wanya kwan asɛe me. Na afei hwɛ, ɛnam saa bɔne kɛseɛ yi nti wobɛnya w’akatua.

26 Na Seesrom see no sɛ: Wo se Onyankopɔn nokwarefoɔ teasefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ?

27 Na Amulek kaa sɛ: Aane, Onyankopɔn nokwarefoɔ teasefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ.

28 Afei Seesrom kaa sɛ: Onyankopɔn afoforɔ binom wɔ hɔ ka ne ho anaa?

29 Na ɔbuaa sɛ, Dabi.

30 Afei Seesrom kakyerɛɛ no bio sɛ: Wo yɛɛ deɛn na wohunuu saa nneɛma yi?

31 Na ɔkaa sɛ: ɔbɔfoɔ na ɔdaa yeinom adi kyerɛɛ me.

32 Na Seesrom kaa bio sɛ: Hwan ne deɛ ɔbɛba no? Ɔne Onyankopɔn Ba no anaa?

33 Na ɔsee no sɛ: Aane.

34 Na Seesrom kaa bio sɛ: ɔbɛgye ne nkurɔfoɔ afiri wɔn bɔne mu anaa? Na Amulek buaa no see no sɛ: Mese wo sɛ ɔrennyɛ saa, ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛyɛ den ama no sɛ ɔbɛtumi adane n’ano.

35 Afei Seesrom kakyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ: Monhwɛ sɛ mobɛkae saa nneɛma yi; ɛfiri sɛ ɔkaa sɛ Onyankopɔn baako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ; nanso ɔkaa sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no bɛba, na mmom ɔrennye ne nkurɔfoɔ—te sɛ obi a ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔhyɛ Onyankopɔn.

36 Afei Amulek see no bio sɛ: Hwɛ watwa ntorɔ ɛfiri sɛ waka sɛ makasa te sɛ obi a ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔhyɛ Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ m’aka sɛ ɔrennye ne nkurɔfoɔ nkwa wɔ wɔn bɔne mu nti.

37 Na mese wo bio sɛ ɔrentumi nnye wɔn wɔ wɔn bɔne mu; ɛfiri sɛ merentumi mpo n’asɛm, na waka sɛ biribiara a ɛho nteɛ no, ntumi nni ɔsoro aheman no; ɛno nti, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mobɛnya nkwa, gyesɛ modi ɔsoro aheman no? Ɛno nti, wɔrentumi nnye mo nkwa wɔ mo bɔne mu.

38 Afei Seesrom see no bio sɛ: Onyankopɔn Ba no ne Agya a Ɔnniawieɛ no ampa anaa?

39 Na Amulek see no sɛ: Aane, ɔne ɛsoro ne asaase ne nneɛma ɛwɔ mu nyina ara no Agya a Ɔnniawieɛ no ampa; ɔne mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ, ɔkandifoɔ ne okyidifoɔ no.

40 Na ɔbɛba wiase yi mu abɛdi ama ne nkurɔfoɔ; na ɔbɛfa wɔn a wɔgye ne din die no mmaratoɔ ato ne ho so; na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔbɛnya nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ no, na nkwagyeɛ nni hɔ ma obiara bio.

41 Ɛno nti atirimuɔdenfoɔ bɛdaso atena hɔ te sɛdeɛ obiara anni amma wɔn no, gyesɛ wɔsanesane owuo mpokyerɛ no; na hwɛ, da bi bɛba a obiara bɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu abɛgyina Onyankopɔn anim, na wɔabu no atɛn sɛdeɛ ne nwuma teɛ.

42 Afei, owuo bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no honam mu wuo; na Kristo wuo no bɛsane saa honam mu wuo no mpokyerɛ mu, ama obiara asɔre afiri saa honam mu wuo yi mu.

43 Honhom ne honamdua no bɛsan aka abɔ mu bio ama wɔayɛ sɛdeɛ na wɔteɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ; nsa ne ɛnan ne apɔsoapɔso nyina ara bɛka asisi anim bio ama nnipadua no baabiara ayɛ sɛdeɛ yɛte seesei ara yi mpo; na wɔde yɛn bɛba abɛgyina Onyankopɔn anim, na yɛbɛhunu sɛdeɛ yɛhunu no seesei yi, na yɛbɛkae yɛn fɔdie nyina ara pefee.

44 Afei, obiara bɛyɛ te sɛdeɛ na ɔte dada no, ɔpanin ne akwadaa, deɛ ɔwɔ nkoasom mu ne ɔdehyeɛ, ɔbarima ne ɔbaa, atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne ateneneefoɔ; na wɔn tiri so nwii baako mpo renyera; na mmom biribiara bɛsi ne dadaa mu ayɛ foforɔ sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ seesei ara yi, anaa sɛ ɛteɛ wɔ honamdua yi mu yi, na wɔde wɔn bɛba abɛgyina Kristo Ɔba no, ne Onyankopɔn Agya, ne Honhom Kronkron no a ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn a Ɔnniawieɛ koro no asɛnibea anim na wɔabɔ wɔn kwaadu ama wɔabu wɔn atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nwuma teɛ, sɛ ɛyɛ anaa sɛ ɛnnyɛ.

45 Afei hwɛ, makasa afa honamdua wuo ne honamdua wusɔreɛ ho asɛm akyerɛ wo Mese wo sɛ wɔbɛnyane honamdua yi a ɛwuo yi ama abɛyɛ honamdua a ɛbɛkyereboɔ, ɛne sɛ, ɛbɛfiri ewuo mu, owuo a ɛdikan mu de akɔ nkwa mu, ama wanwu bio; wɔn honhom ne wɔn nipadua no bɛka abɔ mu, na wɔn mu rentete bio da; na ɛba no saa a, ɛno bɛma ne nyina ara ayɛ honhom ne deɛ ɛnwuo, ama wɔanhunu porɔɛ bio da.

46 Afei, mmerɛ a Amulek kaa saa nsɛm yi wieeɛ no, nkurɔfoɔ no ho dwirii wɔn bio, na Seesrom ho hyɛɛ aseɛ popooe. Na sei na Amulek de ne nsɛm no baa awieɛ, anaa sɛ yei ara ne deɛ matwerɛ.
alma 12:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 12[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma ne Seesrom di apereapereɛ—Wɔn a wɔyɛ agyedifoɔ no nko ara na wɔbɛnya Onyankopɔn asumasɛm—Deɛ nnipa dwene, ne wɔn gyedie, wɔn nsɛm, ne wɔn nwuma na wɔbɛgyina so abu wɔn atɛn—Atirimuɔdenfoɔ bɛwu honhom mu wuo—Saa honamdua wuo asetena a yɛwɔ mu yi yɛ nsɔhwɛ mmerɛ tebea—Dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ no ma owusɔreɛ ba mu na ɛnam gyedie so na bɔnefakyɛ ba—Ɛnam ɔba a ɔwo no korɔ no so bɛhunu wɔn a wɔasakyera no mmɔbɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 82 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei Alma hunuu sɛ Amulek nsɛm no ama Seesrom ayɛ komm, ɛnam sɛ ɔhunuu sɛ Amulek akyere no sɛ ɔredi atorɔ na wadaadaa no sɛ ɔbɛ sɛe no, na ɔhunuu saa no, n’afɔdie hyɛɛ ne so maa ne ho hyɛɛ aseɛ popooe, ɔbuee n’ano na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekasa akyerɛ no, de asi Amulek nsɛm no pi, na wakyerɛkyerɛ nneɛma mu akɔ akyire, anaa sɛ wada twerɛsɛm no adi ama no atera deɛ Amulek aka no.

2 Afei nsɛm a Alma ka kyerɛɛ Seesrom no, nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyina ara teeɛ; na nkurɔfokuo no so, na sei na ɔkasaɛ:

3 Afei Seesrom woahunu sɛ wakye wo wɔ atorɔ ne wo naadaa no mu, na wonnii atorɔ nkyerɛɛ nnipa nko ara na mmom wadi atorɔ akyerɛ Onyankopɔn; na hwɛ ɔnim w’adwene nyina ara, na wahunu sɛ Honhom no ama yahunu w’adwene;

4 Na wahunu sɛ yɛnim sɛ nhyehyɛeɛ no yɛ ɛsum ase nhyehyɛeɛ, te sɛ ɔbonsam aniteɛ, na sɛ wobɛdi atorɔ na wadaadaa nkurɔfoɔ yi ama wɔatia yɛn, na wɔayɛ yɛn, na wɔayi yɛn mu—

5 Afei yei yɛ w’atamfo nhyehyɛeɛ, na wada ne tumi adi wɔ wo mu. Afei mepɛ sɛ wo kae sɛdeɛ maka akyerɛ wo yi no, meka kyerɛ obiara.

6 Na monhwɛ Mese mo nyina ara sɛ yei yɛ ɔtamfo no afidie a wasum de rebɛyi nkurɔfoɔ, ama ɔde mo abɛhyɛ n’ase, ama ɔde ne nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn atwa mo ho ahyia, ama wakyekyere mo ato hɔ de akɔ ɔsɛee a ɛtehɔ daa mu, sɛdeɛ ne nnɔmum mu tumi teɛ no.

7 Afei mmerɛ a Alma kaa saa nsɛm yi no, Seesrom ho hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɛrepopo mmorosoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔgyee Onyankopɔn tumi no dii yie ara; na ɔgye dii nso sɛ Alma ne Amulek nim ne ho nsɛm, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunu sɛ wɔnim n’akoma mu ne ne tiri mu nsɛm nyina ara; ɛfiri sɛ wɔnyaa tumi maa wɔnam nkɔmhyɛ honhom so hunuu saa nneɛma yi.

8 Na Seesrom hyɛɛ aseɛ bisabisaa nsɛm yi aniberɛso, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛhunu Onyankopɔn aheman no ho nsɛm pii. Na ɔsee Alma sɛ: Na deɛ Amulek kaae a ɛfa awufoɔ wusɔreɛ ho no kyerɛ sɛn, sɛ obiara bɛsɔre afiri owuo mu, wɔn a wɔtene ne wɔn a wɔntene bɛba ama wɔabɛgyina Nyankopɔn anim ama wɔabu wɔn atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn nwuma teɛ?

9 Na afei Alma hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ nneɛma yi ase akyerɛ no sɛ: Wɔama dodoɔ no kwan sɛ wɔbɛhunu Nyankopɔn asumasɛm; nanso wɔhyɛ wɔn dendennden sɛ mma wɔnna n’adi nkyerɛ obiara gye sɛ n’asɛm no mu kakraa bi a ɔhwɛ wɔn setie ne wɔn mmɔdenmɔ a, ɔma ho kwan ma wɔde ma nnipa mma.

10 Na ɛno nti, deɛ ɔbɛyɛ n’akoma den no, saa nnipa korɔ no ara na ɔnya asɛm no mu ketewa bi; na deɛ ɔnnyɛ n’akoma den no, ɔno na ɔnya asɛm no mu kɛseɛ, kɔpem sɛ wɔma no kwan ma ɔhunu Onyankopɔn asumasɛm no de kɔsi tire.

11 Na wɔn a wɔbɛyɛ wɔn akoma den no, wɔn na wɔma wɔn asɛm no mu ketewa bi kɔpem sɛ wɔnhunu biribiara a ɛfa n’asumasɛm no ho; na afei ɔbonsam bɛfa wɔn nnɔmum, na ɔnam ne pɛ so de wɔn akɔ ɔsɛee mu. Afei sei na asamando nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no teɛ.

12 Na Amulek akasa pefee afa owuo ho, ne sɛ wɔbɛnyane nnipa afiri honamdua a ɛwuo yi mu de wɔn aba honamdua a ɛnwuo tebea mu, na wɔde wɔn abɛgyina Onyankopɔn asɛnibea anim, ama wabu yɛn atɛn sɛdeɛ yɛn nwuma teɛ.

13 Na sɛ yɛn akoma ayɛ den a, aane, na sɛ yayɛ yɛn akoma den wɔ ne nsɛm ho ara ma wɔnhunu no wɔ yɛn mu a, ɛnneɛ na yɛn gyinabea bɛyɛ hu, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔbɛbu yɛn fɔ.

14 Na yɛn nsɛm bɛbu yɛn fɔ, aane, yɛn nwuma nyina ara bɛbu yɛn fɔ; wɔbɛhunu sɛ yɛn ho yɛ nkekaawa; na yɛn adwene nso bɛbua yɛn fɔ; na gyinabea huhuu a ɛte sei yi mu no, yɛrentumi mma yɛn tiri so nhwɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn; na sɛ yɛtumi hyɛ abotan ne mmepɔ sɛ wɔntutu mɛhwehwe yɛn so mfa yɛn nsie mfiri Onyankopɔn anim a anka yɛn ani bɛgye.

15 Na yei ntumi mma no saa; na ɛwɔ sɛ yɛba bɛgyina n’anim wɔ n’animuonyam mu, ne ne tumi mu, ne n’ahoɔden mu ne n’ahensɛm mu, ne ne nhyɛsoɔ mu, na yɛagye yɛn aniwuo a ɛtehɔ daa ato mu sɛ ne ntɛmmuo nyina ara yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ; na ɔdi nokware wɔ ne nwuma nyina ara mu, na ɔwɔ ahummɔborɔ ma nnipa mma, na ɔwɔ tumi biara sɛ ɔgye nnipa biara a ɔgye ne din di na ɔso nsakyeraɛ aba no nkwa.

16 Na afei monhwɛ, Mese mo sɛ ɛrenkyɛre na owuo aba, mpo owuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu a ɛyɛ honhom mu wuo, saa mmerɛ no na obiara a ɔwu honam mu wuo wɔ ne bɔne mu bɛwu wɔ honhom mu nso; aane, ɔbɛwu owuo a ɛfa nneɛma a ɛyɛ tenenee ho.

17 Na saa mmerɛ yi mu na wɔn amanehunu bɛyɛ sɛ ogya ne sɔfe tadeɛ, a ne gyamframa foro kɔ soro dɛre afebɔɔ; na afei na na mmerɛ no aduru sɛ wɔde mpokyerɛ bɛkyekyere wɔn de ama ɔsɛeɛ a ɛtehɔ daa sɛdeɛ ɔbonsam tumi ne ne nnɔmum teɛ, deɛ ɔnam ne pɛ so de twe wɔn ma wɔbɛhyɛ n’ase.

18 Afei mese mo sɛ: wɔbɛyɛ sɛdeɛ obiara nni mmaa wɔn; ɛfiri sɛ, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn atɛntenenee teɛ no nti wɔrentumi nni mma wɔn; na wɔrentumi nwu nso, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsɛeɛ biara nni hɔ bio.

19 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Alma wiee saa nsɛm yi ka no, nkurɔfoɔ no ho hyɛɛ aseɛ dwirii wɔn;

20 Na ɔbarima bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Antionah a ɔyɛ ɔhwɛsofoɔ panin wɔ wɔn mu, ɔno na ɔsɔre ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: ɛdeɛn asɛm na waka yi, sɛ nnipa bɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu na wasesa afiri saa honamdua a ɛwuo yi mu akɔ honam dua a ɛnwuo tebea mu, na ɔkra no ntumi nwu da anaa?

21 Na twerɛsɛm no kyerɛ sɛn, deɛ ɛka sɛ Onyankopɔn de Kerubim ne ogyaframa afena bɛsii Eden turo no anim apueɛ fam, ama yɛn awofoɔ a wɔdii kan no amfa mu ankɔdi nkwadua no aba no, na wɔantena ase afebɔɔ anaa? Na yei ma yɛhunu sɛ ɔkwan biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛtumi afa so atena ase afebɔɔ.

22 Afei Alma see no sɛ: Yei ne adeɛ anka merebɛkyerɛkyerɛ mu no. Afei yɛhunu sɛ Adam hwee ase ɛfiri sɛ ɔdii aba no a wɔbraa sɛ mma onni no, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm no teɛ no; na yei ma yɛhunu sɛ n’asehweɛ no nti, adasamma nyina ara bɛyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔayera na wɔahwe ase.

23 Na afei monhwɛ, Mese mo sɛ, sɛ anka Adam tumi dii nkwadua no aba no saa mmerɛ no a, anka owuo amma, anka asɛm no yɛɛ kwa, maa Onyankopɔn bɛyɛɛ ɔtorofoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ modi a ɔkwan biara so no mobɛwu.

24 Na yɛhunu sɛ owuo baa adasamma so, aane, owuo no a Amulek kaa sɛ ɛyɛ honam mu wuo no; nanso wɔama nnipa mmerɛ a ɔbɛtumi de asakyera; ɛno nti saa tebea yi bɛyɛɛ nsɔhwɛ mmerɛ tebea; mmerɛ a yɛde yɛ ahoboa hyia Onyankopɔn kwan; mmerɛ a yɛde yɛ ahoboa twɛn saa tebea no a ɛnni awieɛ no a yɛaka ho asɛm no a ɛwɔ awufoɔ wusɔreɛ akyiri no.

25 Afei, sɛ nnyɛ dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ no a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ fiti mmerɛ a wɔtoo wiase fapem no a, anka awufoɔ wusɔreɛ nni hɔ; na mmom wɔayɛ dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ ato hɔ, deɛ ɛbɛma awufoɔ wusɔreɛ no a yɛaka ho asɛm no aba mu.

26 Na afei monhwɛ, sɛ yɛn awofoɔ a wɔdii kan no tumi dii nkwadua no aba no bi a anka wɔbɛyɛ mmɔbɔ afebɔɔ, ɛfiri sɛ anka wɔrennya mmerɛ mfa nsiesie wɔn ho; na anka dima no nhyehyɛeɛ no bɛyɛ basaa, na anka Onyankopɔn asɛm no yɛɛ kwa, anka mfasoɔ biara amma so.

27 Mmom monhwɛ, ɛnte saa; na mmom wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ sɛ ɛtwa sɛ nnipa wu; na owuo no akyire no, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔba atɛmmuo ase, saa atɛmmuo no mpo a yɛaka ho asɛm no, deɛ ɛyɛ awieɛ no.

28 Na Onyankopɔn hyehyɛɛ saa nneɛma yi maa nnipa wieeɛ no, hwɛ, afei ɔhunuuɛ sɛ ɛyɛ sɛ nnipa bɛhunu nneɛma a wɔahyɛ ato hɔ ama wɔn no;

29 Ɛno nti ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔne wɔn bɛtwetwee nkɔmmɔ, na wɔmaa nnipa hunuu n’animuonyam.

30 Na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ firii saa mmerɛ no sɛ wɔrebɔ ne din; ɛno nti Onyankopɔn ne nnipa dii nkɔmmɔ, na ɔmaa wɔhunuu di a ɔbɛdi ama wɔn no ho nhyehyɛeɛ no a wasiesie fiti wiase fapem no; na ɔdaa yei adi kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn gyedie ne nsakyeraɛ ne wɔn nwuma kronkron teɛ.

31 Ɛno nti, ɔmaa nnipa mmaransɛm, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔadi kan ato mmaransɛm a ɛdi kan no a ɛfa nneɛma a ɛwɔ honam afa mu no, ama wɔahunu papa ne bɔne, wɔde wɔn agyina gyinabea a ɛbɛma wɔayɛ wɔn apɛdeɛ ne deɛ wɔn anigye ho, sɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔne anaa sɛ wɔbɛyɛ papa—

32 Ɛno nti Onyankopɔn maa wɔn mmaransɛm, mmerɛ a ɔdaa dima no ho nhyehyɛeɛ adi kyerɛɛ wɔn akyire no, sɛ mma wɔnyɛ bɔne, na asotweɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ ne owuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu, deɛ ɛyɛ owuo a ɛtehɔ daa wɔ nneɛma a ɛfa tenenee ho no; ɛfiri sɛ ɛfa saa adeɛ yi ho deɛ, dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ no nni tumi wɔ so, ɛfiri sɛ wɔrentumi nsɛe atɛntenenee nwuma no a ɛfa sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn kokoroko ne ne papayɛ te no.

33 Mmom Onyankopɔn frɛɛ nnipa wɔ ne Ba no din mu, (yei ne dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ a wayɛ ato hɔ no) see sɛ: Sɛ mobɛsakyera na mo anyɛ mo akoma den a, ɛnneɛ mɛhunu mo mmɔbɔ wɔ me Ba no a me woo no korɔ no mu;

34 Ɛno nti, obiara a ɔsakyera no, na wɔannyɛ n’akoma den no, wɔbɛtumi anya ahummɔborɔ afiri me Ba no a me woo no korɔ no mu; na wanya bɔnefakyɛ afiri ne bɔne ho; na yeinom na wɔbɛba m’ahomegyeɛ mu.

35 Na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ n’akoma den na wayɛ amumuyɛ no, hwɛ, mɛka ntam wɔ m’abufuhyeɛ mu sɛ ɔremma m’ahomegyeɛ mu.

36 Na afei me nuanom, monhwɛ mese mo sɛ, sɛ mo yɛ mo akoma den a, moremma Awurade ahomegyeɛ mu; ɛno nti mo amumuyɛ hyɛ n’abufuo ma, ma ɔde n’abufuhyeɛ ba mo so sɛdeɛ mohyɛɛ no abufuo a ɛdi kan no, aane, sɛdeɛ n’asɛm teɛ wɔ mmerɛ a wɔhyɛɛ no abufuo a etwa toɔ no, saa ara nso na abufuo a ɛdi kan no teɛ, sɛ mo akra a ɛsɛe bɛtena hɔ daa; ɛno nti, sɛdeɛ n’asɛm teɛ wɔ owuo a ɛtwa toɔ ho no, saa ara nso na ɛteɛ wɔ deɛ ɛdi kan no nso ho.

37 Na afei, me nuanom, moahunu sɛ yɛnim saa nneɛma yi, na ne nyina ara yɛ nokware no, ɛnneɛ momma yɛn nsakyeraɛ, na mo mma yɛn nnyɛ yɛn akoma den, amma yɛanhyɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn abufuo ama n’abufuhyeɛ amma yɛn so wɔ ne mmaransɛm a ɛtɔ so mmienu no a ɔde ama yɛn yi ho; na mmom momma yɛn mmera Onyankopɔn ahomegyeɛ no a wasiesie ato hɔ no mu sɛdeɛ n’asɛm teɛ no.
alma 13:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Onyankopɔn nam nnipa gyedie mmorosoɔ ne wɔn nwuma pa so frɛ wɔn sɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ—Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ mmaransɛm no—Wɔnam teneneeyɛ mu te wɔn ho na wɔba Awurade ahomegyeɛ mu—Na Melkisedek yɛ wɔn mu baako—Abɔfoɔ rebɔ asɛmpa a ɛyɛ dɛ no ho dawuro wɔ asaase nyina ara so—Wɔbɛda Kristo mmaeɛ no ankasa adi. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 82 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na bio me nuanom mɛpɛ sɛ metwe mo adwene kɔ mmerɛ a Awurade Nyankopɔn de saa mmaransɛm yi maa ne mma no; na mepɛ sɛ mobɛkae sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ asɔfoɔ wɔ ne nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no a ɛyɛ ne Ba no nhyehyɛeɛ no so, sɛ wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no saa nneɛma yi.

2 Na wɔhyɛɛ saa asɔfoɔ no wɔ ne Ba no nhyehyɛeɛ no so, wɔ ɛkwan bi so a ɛbɛma nkurɔfoɔ no ahunu ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so de ahwɛ ne Ba no anim wɔ dima ho.

3 Na yei ne ɔkwan a wɔnam so de hyɛɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ—na wɔfrɛɛ wɔn na wɔsiesiee wɔn fiti wiase fapem sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn nim dada no, ɛnam wɔn gyedie mmorosoɔ ne wɔn nwuma pa nti; deɛ ɛdi kan no wɔgyaee wɔn sɛ wɔnyi deɛ wɔpɛ, papa anaa sɛ bɔne; ɛno nti, wɔafa papa na wɔada gyedie kɛseɛ adi no nti, wɔanya ɔfrɛ kronkron, aane, ɔfrɛ kronkron no a wɔnam dima a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ wɔ mfitiaseɛ nhyehyɛeɛ so de ama wɔn no.

4 Na sei na wɔde ɔfrɛ kronkron yi afrɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn gyedie nti, wɔ mmerɛ a ebinom nso bɛpo Onyankopɔn Honhom, ɛnam wɔn akomaden ne wɔn adwene a ɛso akata nti, na sɛ anyɛ saa a anka wɔn nso nnya saa gyinabea soronko yi bi sɛdeɛ wɔn nuanom nyaeɛ no.

5 Anaa ne tiawa mu ara ne sɛ, deɛ ɛdi kan no, na wɔgyina saa gyinabea korɔ no a wɔn nuanom no gyina no pɛpɛɛpɛ; ɛno nti wɔasiesie saa ɔfrɛ kronkron yi fiti wiase fapem de ama wɔn a wɔnnyɛ wɔn akoma den, na wɔnam Ɔba no a Ɔwoo no Korɔ no mpata so asiesie no—

6 Na wɔde saa ɔfrɛ kronkron yi frɛɛ wɔn, na wɔhyɛɛ wɔn asɔfodie kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no mu, sɛ wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ ne mmaransɛm no nkyerɛ nnipa mma, ama wɔn nso wɔaba n’ahomegyeɛ no mu bi—

7 Saa asɔfodie kɛseɛ yi nam ne Ba no nhyehyɛeɛ so, deɛ wɔahyehyɛ fiti wiase fapem no; dibea no a, ɛnni mfitiaseɛ anaa awieɛ no, a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ fiti mmerɛ santene de kɔsi mmerɛ santene nyina ara no, sɛdeɛ ne nimdeɛ a ɔwɔ wɔ nneɛma a ɛnnya nsiiɛ nyina ara ho no—

8 Afei saa kwan yi so na wɔhyɛɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ—wɔde ɔfrɛ kronkron ayɛdeɛ no frɛɛ wɔn, na wɔfaa asɔfodie kɛseɛ no nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no too wɔn ho so, saa ɔfrɛ no ne ayɛdeɛ ne asɔfodie kɛseɛ no nni mfitiaseɛ anaa sɛ awieɛ—

9 Ɛno na ɛma wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ afebɔɔ, wɔ Ɔba no nhyehyɛeɛ so, Agya no ba a ɔwoo no korɔ no a ɔnni mfitiaseɛ anaa awieɛ no, deɛ adom ne kyɛpɛ ahyɛ no ma no. Na sei na ɛteɛ. Amen.

10 Afei, sɛdeɛ meka faa saa nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron no ho anaa asɔfodie kɛseɛ yi ho no, dodoɔ no ara wɔ hɔ a wɔhyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔbɛyɛɛ Onyankopɔn asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ; na ɛnam wɔn gyedie mmorosoɔ ne wɔn sakyeraɛ, ne wɔn teneneeyɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim nti no, wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛsakyera na wɔayɛ deɛ ɛtene kyɛn sɛ wɔbɛsɛe;

11 Ɛno nti wɔfrɛɛ wɔn wɔ saa nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron yi mu na wɔtee wɔn ho, na wɔsii wɔn ntaadeɛ maa ɛyɛɛ fitaa wɔ Adwammaa no mogya mu.

12 Afei, mmerɛ a Honhom Kronkron no tee wɔn ho wieeɛ, na ɛnam sɛ wɔn ntaadeɛ yɛɛ fitaa na nkekaawa biara nni mu wɔ Onyankopɔn anim no, wɔantumi annhwɛ bɔne anim anyɛ bɔne na mmom gye sɛ wɔkyiri; na wɔn a wɔtee wɔn ho na wɔbaa Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn ahomegyeɛ mu no dodoɔ no ara dɔɔso yie.

13 Na afei, me nuanom, mepɛ sɛ moberɛ mo ho ase wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, na mo aso aba akyerɛ sɛ moanya nsakyeraɛ, ama mo nso mo aba saa ahomegyeɛ no mu.

14 Aane mo mmerɛ mo ho ase mpo sɛ Melkisedek abrɛso nkurɔfoɔ no, deɛ na ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panin nso te sɛ saa dibea a maka ho asɛm yi, deɛ ɔno nso faa asɔfodie kɛseɛ no too ne ho so afebɔɔ no.

15 Na ɛyɛ saa Melkisedek yi na Abraham tuaa ntotosoɔ du du maa no no; aane, yɛn agya Abraham nso mpo tuaa nkyɛmuu du mu baako a ɛyɛ n’agyapadeɛ nyina ara mu du maa no.

16 Afei saa ayɛdeɛ yi ɛnam saa kwan yi so de maae, ama nkurɔfoɔ no afa so atumi ahwɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no kwan, na ɛyɛ ne dibea no bi, anaa sɛ na ɛyɛ ne dibea, na yei ama wɔde wɔn ani ato ne so de ahwehwɛ bɔnefakyɛ, ama wɔatumi aba Awurade ahomegyeɛ mu.

17 Afei saa Melkisedek yi na ɔyɛ ɔhene wɔ Salem asaase so; na ne nkurɔfoɔ no nyinii wɔ amumuyɛ mu ne akyiwasɛm mu; aane, na wɔn nyina ara afom ɔkwan no; na atirimuɔdensɛm ahodoɔ nyina ara ahyɛ wɔn ma;

18 Na ɛnam sɛ Melkisedek nyaa gyedie a ɛmu yɛ den, na ɔnyaa asɔfodie gyinabea a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn nhyehyɛeɛ kronkron yi mu no ɔkaa nsakyeraɛ ho nsɛm kyerɛɛ ne nkurɔfoɔ no. Na hwɛ, wɔsakyeraae; na Melkisedek maa asomdwoeɛ baa asaase no so wɔ ne berɛ so; ɛno nti wɔfrɛɛ no asomdwoeɛ hene; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔyɛ Salem hene; na ɔdii ɔhene hyɛɛ n’agya ase.

19 Afei, dodoɔ ara na ɛdii n’anim, ɛna dodoɔ ara nso dii n’akyi, na wɔn mu biara nni hɔ a na ɔyɛ kɛseɛ kyɛn no; ɛno nti, ɔno na wɔbɔ ne din kɛseɛ.

20 Afei ɛnhia sɛ mɛsan aka asɛm no bio; deɛ maka no ara dɔɔso. Mo nhwɛ twerɛsɛm no gu mo anim; sɛ mobɛdanedane ani a ɔsɛee ara na ɛbɛba mo soɔ.

21 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Alma kaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ wɔn wieeɛ no; ɔtenee ne nsa wɔ wɔn so na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: Afei mmerɛ no aduru sɛ mosakyera, ɛfiri sɛ nkwagyeɛ da no abɛn;

22 Aane, na Awurade nne nam abɔfoɔ ano reda no adi akyerɛ aman nyina ara; aane, ɔreda no adi, ama wɔn nsa aka ɛdɛ nsɛm kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ dɛ; aane, ɔrebɔ anigyesɛm no ho dawuro wɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ nyina ara mu; aane; akyerɛ wɔn mpo a wɔabɔ apete amannɔne wɔ asaase ani so; ɛno nti abɛduru yɛn so.

23 Na wɔada no adi pefee akyerɛ yɛn, ama yɛate aseɛ ama yɛamfom; na yei nam yɛn akyinkyinakyinkyini wɔ asaase foforɔ so nti; ɛno nti, yɛasɔ n’ani kɛse, ɛfiri sɛ wɔada anigyesɛm yi adi akyerɛ yɛn wɔ yɛn bobeturo mmea nyina ara.

24 Na mo nhwɛ, abɔfoɔ gu so reda no adi kyerɛ dodoɔ ara wɔ saa mmerɛ yi mu wɔ yɛn asaase yi so; de asiesie nnipa mma akoma ama sɛ mmerɛ no duru sɛ ɔreba n’animuonyam mu a wɔagye n’asɛm no adi.

25 Na afei twɛn na yɛretwɛn sɛ yɛbɛte anigyesɛm no a abɔfoɔ no de wɔn ano ada no adi akyerɛ dodoɔ no ara wɔ ne mmaeɛ no ho no, ɛfiri sɛ mmerɛ no reba, na yɛnnim mmerɛ no ntɛm a ɛreba. Anka mɛpɛ sɛ Nyankopɔn bɛma n’ayɛ m’aberɛso; na mmom anka ɛbɛyɛ seisei anaasɛ ɛbɛyɛ kakra a, ɛmu na mɛdi ahurisie.

26 Na abɔfoɔ de wɔn ano bɛda ne mmaeɛ mmerɛ no mu no adi akyerɛ nokwarefoɔ ne akronkronfoɔ sɛ yɛn agyanom nsɛm no bɛhyɛ mma, sɛdeɛ wɔnam nkɔmhyɛ honhom a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no so aka wɔ ne ho no.

27 Na afei, me nuanom, mefiri m’akoma mu too, aane, mede ahoyera ne yea kɛseɛ serɛ mpo sɛ montie me nsɛm yi na monyi mo bɔne mfiri mo so, na mma montu mo nsakyeraɛ mmerɛ no nhyɛ da foforɔ.

28 Na mmom mo mmerɛ mo ho ase wɔ Awurade anim, na mommɔ ne din kronkron no, na monwɛn na mommɔ mpaeɛ mmerɛ nyina ara, ama mo nsɔhwɛ ammoro deɛ mobɛtumi asoa so, na ama Honhom Kronkron no ama mo anya ahobraseɛ, ɔdwoɔ, asoɔmmerɛ, abotare, na ɔdɔ ahyɛ mo ma na aberɛ nyina ara no moanya abodwo-kyerɛ;

29 Monya gyedie wɔ Awurade mu; na moanya anidasoɔ sɛ mobɛnya nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ; na mo anya Onyankopɔn dɔ wɔ mo akoma mu, aberɛ nyina ara, ama wɔama mo so wɔ ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu na moaba n’ahomegyeɛ mu.

30 Na Awurade mma mo nsakyeraɛ, ama moantwe n’abufuhyeɛ amma mo so, ama asamando nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ankyekyere mo anto hɔ ama mo anwu ɛwuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu no.

31 Na Alma kaa nsɛm bebree kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no a wɔantwerɛ no wɔ nwoma yi mu.
alma 14:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔde Alma ne Amulek to afiase na wɔhwe wɔn—Wɔde egya hye agyedifoɔ no ne wɔn twerɛsɛm kronkron no—Awurade gye mogyadansefoɔ no wɔ animuonyam mu—Afiase afasuo no bu na ɛdwiri gu fam—Wɔgye Alma ne Amulek na wɔkum wɔn a wɔtaataa wɔn no. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 82–81 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔkasa kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no wieeɛ no, wɔn mu dodoɔ no gyee ne nsɛm no diiɛ, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔresakyera wɔn adwene, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrehwehwɛ twerɛsɛm no mu aniberɛso.

2 Na mmom wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara na wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔsɛe Alma ne Amulek; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn bo afu Alma, ɛnam sɛ ne nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ Seesrom no da adi pefee nti no; na wɔkaa nso sɛ Amulek adi atorɔ akyerɛ wɔn, na wakasa atia wɔn mmara ne wɔn mmaranimfoɔ ne atɛmmuafoɔ no nso.

3 Na wɔn bo fuu Alma ne Amulek nso; na ɛnam sɛ wɔdii adanseɛ pefee de tiaa wɔn atirimuɔdensɛm nti no, wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔkum wɔn ɛsumase.

4 Na mmom ɛbaa sɛ wɔanyɛ; na mmom wɔfaa wɔn na wɔde ntampehoma a ɛmu yɛ den kyekyeree wɔn, na wɔde wɔn kɔɔ ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin a ɔwɔ asaase no so no anim.

5 Na nkurɔfoɔ no kɔdii adanseɛ tiaa wɔn—wɔn adanseɛ ne sɛ wɔakasa atia mmara no, ne wɔn mmaranimfoɔ ne atɛmmuafoɔ a wɔwɔ asaase no so no, ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ asaase no so nso nyina ara; na wɔasan adi adanseɛ nso sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ baako pɛ, na ɔbɛsoma ne Ba no ama no aba nkurɔfoɔ yi mu, na mmom ɔrennye wɔn nkwa; na nsɛm pii a ɛtete sei no na nkurɔfoɔ no de dii adanseɛ tiaa Alma ne Amulek. Afei saa adeɛ yi na wɔyɛeɛ wɔ ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin a ɔwɔ asaase no so no anim.

6 Na ɛbaa sɛ Seesrom ho dwirii no wɔ nsɛm a wɔkaae no ho; na ɔnim nso sɛ atorɔsɛm a ɔkaaɛ no na afira nkurɔfoɔ no adwene; nti n’afɔdie ho adwendwene maa ne kra hyɛɛ aseɛ tutui; aane, asamando yea hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɛretwa ne ho ahyia.

7 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreteatea mu aka akyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ: Monhwɛ, medi fɔ na saa marima yi ho nni nkekaawa biara wɔ Onyankopɔn anim. Na ɔhyɛaseɛ sɛ ɔresrɛ ama wɔn fiti saa mmerɛ no derekɔ; na mmom wɔyeyɛɛ no kaa sɛ: Na wo nso honhom bɔne wɔ wo so anaa? Na wɔtee ntasuo guu ne so, na wɔyii no firi wɔn mu, na wɔn nso a wɔgyee nsɛm a Alma ne Amulek kaae no diiɛ no nso; wɔyii wɔn adi, na wɔsomaa marima sɛ wɔnkɔ si wɔn aboɔ.

8 Na wɔde wɔn yerenom ne wɔn mma bɔɔ mu baae, ne obiara a wagye adi anaa sɛ wakyerɛkyerɛ no sɛ ɔbɛgye Onyankopɔn asɛm no adi no sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ngu egya mu; na wɔde wɔn twerɛsɛm kronkron no nso baae na wɔto guu egya no mu, sɛ ɛbɛhyɛe na asɛe.

9 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔfaa Alma ne Amulek soaa wɔn de wɔn kɔɔ baabi a wɔkum wɔn a wɔdi asɛmpa no ho adanseɛ no, sɛ wɔbɛ hwɛ wɔn a egya no rehye wɔn no.

10 Na Amulek hunuu sɛ mmaa no ne nkwadaa no rehye wɔ egya no mu no, ɔno nso dii yea na ɔsee Alma sɛ: Adɛn nti na yɛbɛtumi ahwɛ adeɛ huhuu sei? Ɛno nti ma yɛn tene yɛn nsa mu na yɛn mfa Onyankopɔn tumi a ɛwɔ yɛn mu no nnye wɔn nkwa mfiri egyaframa yi mu.

11 Na mmom Alma kaa sɛ: Honhom no mma me kwan sɛ me ntene me nsa; na hwɛ Awurade regye wɔn ama ne ho, wɔ animuonyam mu; na ɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ saa adeɛ yi, anaa sɛ saa nkurɔfoɔ yi nyɛ wɔn saa adeɛ yi, sɛdeɛ wɔn akoma den teɛ no sɛ, atɛn a ɔde bɛbu wɔn wɔ n’abufuhyeɛ mu no ayɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ; na wɔn a wɔnni fɔ no mogya bɛsɔre adi adanseɛ atia wɔn, aane, na wɔatea mu dendennden atia wɔn wɔ ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu.

12 Afei Amulek ka kyerɛɛ Alma sɛ: Hwɛ, anhwɛ a na wɔahye yɛn nso.

13 Na Alma kaa sɛ: Ma Awurade pɛ ɛnyɛ hɔ. Na mmom hwɛ yɛnwiee yɛn adwuma; ɛno nti wɔrennhye yɛn.

14 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔn a wɔde wɔn guu egya mu no nipadua ne wɔn twerɛsɛm no nso a wɔde guu egya no mu bi no hye wieeɛ no, ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin a ɔwɔ asaase no so bɛgyinaa Alma ne Amulek anim, mmerɛ a na wɔrekyekyere wɔn no; na ɔde ne nsa bɔɔ wɔn aso mu, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Deɛ moahunu yi nyina ara akyiri yi no, mobɛka nsɛmpa akyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi bio ama wɔato wɔn agu ogya ne sɔfe tadeɛ mu anaa?

15 Monhwɛ, moahunu sɛ monni tumi a modebɛgye wɔn a wɔtoo wɔn guu egya mu no; saa ara nso na Onyankopɔn anye wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ mo gyedie no mu ara na wɔwɔ. Na atɛmmuafoɔ no bɔɔ wɔn sotorɔ bio, na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ: Moka deɛn ma mo ho?

16 Afei na saa ɔtɛmmuafoɔ no tesɛ Nehɔ nhyehyɛeɛ no ne gyedie deɛ ɔkumm Gideon no.

17 Na ɛbaa sɛ Alma ne Amulek anyi n’ano; na ɔbɔɔ wɔn bio, na ɔde wɔn maa ahwɛsofoɔ no sɛ wɔmfa wɔn nto afiase.

18 Na mmerɛ a wɔde wɔn too afiase nansa no, mmaranimfoɔ bebree, ne atɛmmuafoɔ, ne asɔfoɔ, ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ bebree a wɔyɛ Nehɔ akyitaafoɔ no bi baa hɔ, na wɔkɔɔ afiase hɔ sɛ wɔrekɔhwɛ wɔn, na wɔbisabisaa wɔn nsɛm a ɛfa nneɛma bebree ho; na mmom wɔanyi wɔn ano.

19 Na ɛbaa sɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no kɔgyinaa wɔn anim, na ɔkaa sɛ: Adɛn nti na mommua nkurɔfoɔ yi? Monnim sɛ mewɔ tumi sɛ mede mo gu ogyaframa no mu? Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkasa; na mmom wɔanka hwee.

20 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ wɔn kwan, na mmom adeɛ kyeeɛ no wɔsan baa hɔ bio; na ɔtɛmmuafoɔ no nso bɔɔ wɔn asom bio. Na dodoɔ no ara nso bɛbobɔɔ wɔn asotorɔ na wɔsee wɔn sɛ: Mobɛsɔre agyina bio abu nkurɔfoɔ yi atɛn, na moato yɛn mmara no atwene anaa? Sɛ mowɔ tumi kɛseɛ sei a adɛn na monye mo ho?

21 Na nneɛma ɛtete saa na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn, na wɔtwɛree wɔn se guu wɔn so, na wɔtee ntasuo guu wɔn so, na wɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ wɔbu yɛn fɔ a sɛn na nkurɔfoɔ bɛhwɛ yɛn afa?

22 Na nsɛm bebree a ɛtete sei, aane, nsɛm ahodoɔ nyina ara a ɛtete sei na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn; na wɔdii wɔn ho fɛw nna bebree. Na wɔamma wɔn aduane ne nsuo sɛdeɛ ɔkɔm ne nsukɔm bɛde wɔn; na wɔpaa wɔn ho ntoma maa wɔdaa adagya; na wɔde ntampehoma kyekyeree wɔn, na wɔde wɔn too afiase.

23 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔhunu amane nna bebree akyiri no, (na ɛyɛ da a ɛtɔ so dummienu, wɔ bosomee a ɛtɔ so edu no mu, wɔ atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie afe a ɛtɔso du wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so) na ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin a ɔhwɛ Amonaeha asaase so no ne wɔn akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no mu bebree ne wɔn mmaranimfoɔ no kɔɔ afiase hɔ baabi a wɔde ntampehoma akyekyere Alma ne Amulek no.

24 Na ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no bɛgyinaa wɔn anim, na ɔbɔɔ wɔn bio, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Sɛ mo wɔtumi a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn hɔ a mo nsane mo ho mfiri mpokyerɛ yi mu, na ɛno na yɛbɛgye adi sɛ Awurade bɛsɛe nkurɔfoɔ yi sɛdeɛ mo nsɛm teɛ no.

25 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn nyina ara kɔ kɔbobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔkaa saa nsɛm no ara kyerɛɛ wɔn, mpo de kɔsii deɛ ɔtwa toɔ no so; na mmerɛ a deɛ ɔtwa toɔ no kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn wieeɛ no, Onyankopɔn tumi baa Alma ne Amulek so, na wɔsɔre gyinaa wɔn nan so.

26 Na Alma teaa mu sɛ: Yɛnhunu amane kɛseɛ sei nkɔsi dabɛn, O Awurade? O Awurade, ma yɛn ahoɔden te sɛdeɛ yɛn gyedie a ɛwɔ Kristo mu teɛ no, na mpo gye yɛn. Na wɔtetee ntampehoma a wɔde akyekyere wɔn no mu; na mmerɛ a nkurɔfoɔ no hunuu saa no, wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔredwane, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔsɛeɛ ho suro aba wɔn so.

27 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn suro no yɛɛ kɛseɛ ara maa wɔhwehwee fam, nti wɔanuru afiase abɔntene pono no ho; na asaase wosoo dendennden, na afasuo a ɛwɔ afiase hɔ no mu paae mmienu, nti ɛmaa ɛdwiri guu fam; na ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no, ne mmaranimfoɔ no, ne asɔfoɔ, ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no a wɔbobɔɔ Alma ne Amulek no wuii wɔ afasuo no a adwiri no ase.

28 Na Alma ne Amulek firii afiase pueɛ a wɔampira; ɛfiri sɛ Awurade maa wɔn tumi sɛdeɛ wɔn gyedie a ɛwɔ Kristo mu teɛ no. Na wɔfirii afiase hɔ ntɛm paa ara; na wɔn mpokyerɛ no sanesane firii wɔn ho; na afiase hɔ dwirii guu fam, na nipa biara a na ɔwɔ afiase hɔ no gye sɛ Alma ne Amulek wuii; na wɔfirii hɔ ntɛm pa ara puei na wɔkɔɔ kuropɔn no mu.

29 Afei nkurɔfoɔ no tee dede kɛseɛ no nkurɔfoɔ akuokuo tutuu mmirika baae sɛ wɔrebɛhwɛ deɛ asie; na mmerɛ a wɔhunuu sɛ Alma ne Amulek firi afiase hɔ reba no, na afiase afasuo no nso adwiri agu fam no, ɛhuu kɛseɛ kaa wɔn, maa wɔdwane firii Alma ne Amulek anim sɛdeɛ abirekyie ne ne mma dwane firi gyata mmienu anim no; na sei na wɔdwane firii Alma ne Amulek anim.
alma 15:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma ne Amulek kɔ Sidom kɔte asɔre—Alma sa Seesrom yareɛ, na ɔbɛka asɔre no ho—Wɔbɔ dodoɔ no ara asu na asɔre no yɛ frɔmfrɔm—Alma ne Amulek kɔ Sarahɛmla. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 81 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔhyɛɛ Alma ne Amulek sɛ wɔmfiri kuropɔn no mu nkɔ; na wɔfirii hɔ, na wɔbaa Sidom asaase so; na hwɛ, ɛhɔ na wɔhunuu nkurɔfoɔ a wɔfirii Amonaeha asaase so no nyina ara a wɔyii wɔn adi na wɔsii wɔn aboɔ, ɛnam sɛ wɔgyee Alma nsɛm no diiɛ nti.

2 Na wɔkaa deɛ ɛtoo wɔn yerenom ne wɔn mma, ne deɛ ɛfa wɔn ho nso, ne tumi a wɔde agye wɔn ho kyerɛɛ wɔn.

3 Na atiridie yareɛ aka Seesrom ato hɔ wɔ Sidom, na deɛ ɛde yareɛ no baaɛ yɛ ɔhaw kɛseɛ a ɛreha n’adwene wɔ n’atirimuɔdensɛm ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdwenee sɛ Alma ne Amulek nni hɔ bio; na ɔdwenee sɛ wɔakum wɔn ɛnam n’amumuyɛ nti. Na saa bɔne kɛseɛ yi, ne ne bɔne bebree a ɛka ho no haa n’adwene ara kɔsii sɛ ɛmu yɛɛ den a wanya ɔgyeɛ; ɛno nti ne ho hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɛreyɛ hye.

4 Afei, mmerɛ a ɔtee sɛ Alma ne Amulek wɔ Sidom asaase so no, n’akoma hyɛɛ aseɛ tɔɔ ne yam; na ɔsomaa ntɛm pa ara ma wɔde nkra kɔmaa wɔn sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔba ne nkyɛn.

5 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔn nsa kaa nkra no, wɔkɔɔ Seesrom fie ntɛm pa ara; na wɔkɔtoo sɛ ɔyare da ne mpa so, na atiridie ama no ayɛ mmerɛ; na n’adwene nso haa no yie ɛnam n’amumuyɛsɛm nti; na mmerɛ a ɔhunuu wɔn no ɔtenee ne nsa, na ɔsrɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnsa no yareɛ.

6 Na ɛbaa sɛ Alma sɔɔ ne nsa na ɔsee no sɛ: Wogyedi sɛ tumi wɔ Kristo mu kɔ nkwagyeɛ mu?

7 Na ɔbuaa see sɛ: Aane, Megye nsɛm a wakyerɛ me no nyina ara di.

8 Na Alma see sɛ: sɛ wogye Kristo dima no di a, wobɛtumi anya ayaresa.

9 Na ɔsee sɛ: Aane, megye di sɛdeɛ wo nsɛm no teɛ no.

10 Na afei Alma su frɛɛ Awurade, sɛ: O Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn, hunu saa ɔbarima yi mmɔbɔ, na sa no yareɛ sɛdeɛ ne gyedie wɔ Kristo mu teɛ no.

11 Na mmerɛ a Alma kaa saa nsɛm yi wieeɛ no, Seesrom huri gyinaa ne nan so, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrenante; na saa adeɛ a ɛsiiɛ yi maa nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyina ara ho dwirii wɔn; na asɛm yi terɛɛ Sidom asaase so nyina ara.

12 Na Alma bɔɔ Seesrom asu wɔ Awurade mu; na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ saa mmerɛ no sɛ ɔreka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no.

13 Na Alma tee asɔre wɔ Sidom asaase no so, na ɔhyɛɛ asɔfoɔ, na ɔyii akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ wɔ asaase no so, sɛ wɔmmɔ obiara a ɔbɛnya ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɔ no asu no asu wɔ Awurade mu.

14 Na ɛbaa sɛ na wɔdɔɔso; ɛfiri sɛ wɔpue firii mmea mmea a atwa Sidom ho ahyia nyina ara, na wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu.

15 Na mmom ɛfa nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Amonaeha asaase no so deɛ, wɔdaa ho yɛɛ akomadenfoɔ ne ɛkɔnseneɛfoɔ; na wɔansakyeraɛ amfiri wɔn bɔne ho, na wɔkaa sɛ Alma ne Amulek tumi nyina ara firi ɔbonsam hɔ; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔne Nehɔ wɔ ekuo baako mu, na wɔanye anni sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔsakyeraae firi wɔn bɔne ho.

16 Na ɛbaa sɛ Alma ne Amulek, na Amulek agyae ne sika kɔkɔɔ, ne dwetɛ ne nneɛma a ɛsombo a na ɛwɔ Amonaeha asaase no so no ama Onyankopɔn asɛm no nti, wɔn a na wɔyɛ ne namfonom ne n’agya nso ne n’abusuafoɔ poo no.

17 Ɛno nti; mmerɛ a Alma tee asɔre wɔ Sidom wieeɛ no, ɔhwɛ siesiee na ɔhwɛ maa wɔgyaee biribiara yɛ, aane, ɔhwɛ maa wɔgyaee deɛ wɔka faa deɛ ɛfa nkurɔfoɔ no akoma a ahomasoɔ ayɛ ma no ho, na ɛmaa wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ brɛɛ wɔn ho ase wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ hyiaa mu wɔ wɔn kronkronbea hɔ sɛ wɔresom Onyankopɔn wɔ afɔrebukyia no anim, wɔwɛnn na wɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ aberɛ nyina ara, ama wɔagye wɔn afiri ɔbɔnsam ne owuo, ne ɔsɛee nsa mu—

18 Afei sɛdeɛ mekaae no, Alma hunuu saa nneɛma yi nyina ara, ɛno nti ɔfaa Amulek na ɔne no baa Sarahɛmla, na ɔde no kɔɔ ɔno ara ne fie, na ɔdii dwuma wɔ n’amanehunu no ho, na ɔhyɛɛ no den wɔ Awurade mu.

19 Na sei na afe a ɛtɔ so du wɔ atɛmmuafoɔ ahennie mu wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so no de baa awieɛ.
alma 16:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfoɔ sɛe Amonaeha nkurɔfoɔ—Soram di Nifaefoɔ anim ma wɔdi Lamanfoɔ so nkonim—Alma ne Amulek ne wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara nso ka asɛmpa no—Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ sɛ ne wusɔreɛ akyiri no Kristo bɛyi ne ho adi akyere Nifaefoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 81–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie so afe a ɛtɔ so dubaako wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so no, wɔ bosome mmienu da a ɛtɔ so num no, asomdwoeɛ baa Sarahɛmla asaase no so a, akokoakoko anaa sɛ apereapereɛ biara ansi ara maa mfie kakra twaa mu de kɔsi bosome mmienu da a ɛtɔ so dumienu mu no, na wɔtee ɛko nka wɔ asaase no so.

2 Na hwɛ, Lamanfoɔ asraafoɔ no baa asaase no fa a ɛne ɛserɛ no bɔ hyeɛ no, na wɔbaa Amonaeha kuropɔn no mu hɔ mpo, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrekumkum nkurɔfoɔ no na wɔasɛe kuropɔn no.

3 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ, ansa na Nifaefoɔ bɛtumi aboa asraafoɔ ano ama wɔapamo wɔn afiri asaase no so no, na wɔasɛe nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Amonaeha, ne wɔn nso a wɔwɔ nkuro a atwa Noa ho ahyia no, na wɔafa ebinom nso nnɔmum de wɔn kɔ ɛserɛ no so.

4 Afei ɛbaa sɛ na Nifaefoɔ no pɛ sɛ wɔkɔgye wɔn a wɔafa wɔn nnɔmum de wɔn akɔ ɛserɛ no so no.

5 Ɛno nti, deɛ wɔde no asi ɔsahene panin wɔ Nifaefoɔ asraafoɔ no so no, (na ne din de Soram, na ɔwɔ mmammarima mmienu, Lihae ne Aha)—afei Soram ne ne mmammarima mmienu no hunuu sɛ Alma yɛ ɔsɔfo panin wɔ asɔre no mu no, na wɔtee sɛ ɔwɔ nkɔmhyɛ honhom no, ɛno nti wɔkɔɔ ne hɔ kɔsee no sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhunu sɛ Awurade bɛpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ ɛserɛ no so kɔhwehwɛ wɔn nuanom no a Lamanfoɔ no afa wɔn nnɔmum akɔ ɛserɛ no so no.

6 Na ɛbaa sɛ Alma kɔbisaa Awurade wɔ saa asɛm no ho. Na Alma san bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monhwɛ, Lamanfoɔ no rebɛtwa asubɔntene Sidon wɔ ɛserɛ no anaafoɔ a atra ɛhyeɛ a ɛwɔ Mantae asaase so akyirikyiri no. Na monhwɛ ɛhɔ na mo bɛhyia wɔn, wɔ asubɔntene Sidon apueɛ, na ɛhɔ na Awurade bɛyi mo nuanom no a Lamanfoɔ afa wɔn nnɔmum no ama mo.

7 Na ɛbaa sɛ Soram ne ne mmammarima no ne n’asraafoɔ twaa asubɔntene Sidon, na wɔbɔɔ nsra de faa Mantae ɛhyeɛ so de kɔɔ ɛserɛ no anaafoɔ so, wɔ asubɔntene Sidon apueɛ.

8 Na wɔbɛpuee Lamanfoɔ asraafoɔ no so, na wɔbɔɔ Lamanfoɔ no petee na wɔpamo wɔn kɔɔ ɛserɛ no so; na wɔfaa wɔn nuanom no a Lamanfoɔ afa wɔn nnɔmum no, na akra a wɔfaa wɔn nnɔmum no mu baako mpo anyera. Na wɔn nuanom no de wɔn baae maa wɔbɛtenaa wɔn ankasa nsaase so.

9 Na sei na atɛmmuafoɔ no afe a ɛtɔ so dubaako no de baa awieɛ, na wɔpamoo Lamanfoɔ no firii asaase no so, na wɔsɛee nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Amonaeha no; aane, wɔsɛee ɔkra ɔteasefoɔ biara, ne wɔn kuropɔn kɛseɛ no nso a wɔkaa sɛ Onyankopɔn ntumi nsɛe no no, ɛnam ne kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ nti.

10 Na mmom hwɛ, da koro pɛ na ɛyɛɛ amanfo; na nkraman ne mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu wɔ ɛserɛ no so tetee wɔn funu.

11 Nanso, nna bebree akyiri no, wɔboaboaa wɔn funu ano wɔ asaase no so, na wɔde nnɛteɛ kakraabi kataa so. Na afei panpan no ano yɛɛ den ara maa nkurɔfoɔ no ankɔtena Amonaeha asaase no so hɔ maa mfie bebree twaa mu. Na wɔfrɛɛ hɔ Nehɔfoɔ Amanfo; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔne Nehɔfoɔ no wɔ ɛsom korɔ mu; na wɔn nsaase no bɛyɛɛ amanfo.

12 Na Lamanfoɔ no ne Nifaefoɔ ammɛko ara bio kɔsi afe a ɛtɔ so dunan mu wɔ atɛmmuafoɔ ahennie mu wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so. Na yei maa Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no nyaa asomdwoeɛ ara mfinhyia mmiɛnsa wɔ asaase no so nyina ara.

13 Na Alma ne Amulek kɔkaa nsakyeraɛ ho asɛm kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no wɔ wɔn tɛmpol no mu, ne wɔn kronkronbea, ne wɔn nhyiadan a wɔsisii sɛ Yudafoɔ deɛ no sɛso no mu.

14 Na dodoɔ no ara a wɔtiee wɔn nsɛm no, wɔn na wɔde Onyankopɔn asɛm no maa wɔn daa a wɔanhwehwɛ ani mu.

15 Na sei na Alma ne Amulek ne dodoɔ nso a wɔyii wɔn sɛ wɔn mmra mmɛyɛ adwuma no bi no nante kaa nsɛmpa no wɔ asaase no so nyina ara. Na asɔre no a ɔteeɛ no bɛgyinaa hɔ pintinn wɔ asaase no so nyina ara, ne nkuro a atwa wɔn ho ahyia nyina ara so, wɔ Nifaefoɔ nkurɔfoɔ no mu nyina ara.

16 Na nsonsonoɛ biara amma wɔn ntam; Awurade hwiee ne Honhom guu asaase no ani so nyina ara de siesiee nnipa mma adwene, anaa sɛ de siesiee wɔn akoma ama wɔagye asɛm a wɔbɛka akyerɛ wɔn wɔ mmerɛ a ɔbɛba no—

17 Sɛ wɔnyɛ asoɔden ntia asɛm no, na wɔanyɛ akyingyefoɔ, na wɔankɔ ɔsɛee mu, na mmom wɔde ɛdɛ agye asɛm no, na wɔayɛ sɛ mman a wɔde abata nokware bobe dua no ho ama wɔatumi aba Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn ahomegyeɛ no mu.

18 Afei saa asɔfoɔ no a wɔkɔɔ nkurɔfoɔ no mu no kɔ kaa nsɛmpa tiaa atorɔ nyina ara ne naadaa ne anibereɛ, ne akasakasa, ne adwene bɔne, ɛdinsɛeɛ, ne korɔnoo, ne yere a wɔyere nkurɔfoɔ gye wɔn nneɛma, adefom, awudie, adwamanmmɔ, ne akohwie ahodoɔ nyina ara, na wɔteaa mu kaa sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ saa nneɛma yi ba—

19 Na wɔdaa nneɛma a ɛrenkyɛ na aba no adi; aane, wɔdaa Onyankopɔn Ba no mmaɛ no, n’amanehunu ne ne wuo, ne awufoɔ wusɔreɛ no nso adi kyerɛɛ wɔn.

20 Na nkurɔfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no ara bisaa baabi a Nyankopɔn Ba no bɛba; na wɔkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ ne wusɔreɛ akyire yi no ɔbɛba wɔn nkyɛn; na yei na nkurɔfoɔ no, de ɛdɛ ne ahosɛpɛ kɛseɛ tieeɛ.

21 Na afei wɔtee asɔre no wɔ asaase no so nyina ara wieeɛ na wɔdii ɔbonsam so nkonim no, wɔkaa Nyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ ne korɔgyee mu a nkekaawa nni mu wɔ asaase no so nyina ara, na Awurade hwiee ne nhyira guu nkurɔfoɔ no so—sei na atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so dunan wɔ wɔn ahennie mu wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so no baa awieɛ.
alma 17:
Deɛ ɛfa Mosaya mmammarima a wɔpoo sɛ wɔbɛnya kyɛfa wɔ ahennie mu no, na mmom wɔfaa Onyankopɔn asɛm no, na wɔkɔɔ Nifae asaase so sɛ wɔrekɔka asɛmpa no akyerɛ Lamanfoɔ; wɔn amanehunu ne wɔngyeɛ—sɛdeɛ Alma twerɛtohɔsɛm no kyerɛ no.

Ne nyina ara wɔ ti 17 de kɔsi 27.

[center][font_size=26]Ti 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Mosaya mmammarima no wɔ nkɔmhyɛ honhom ne yikyerɛ honhom—Wɔpaepae mu na obiara fa ne kwan sɛ ɔrekɔbɔ asɛm no dawuro akyerɛ Lamanfoɔ no—Amon kɔ Ismael asaase so na ɔbɛyɛ ɔhene Lamonae somfoɔ—Amon gye ɔhene no nnwan nkwa na ɔkum n’atamfo wɔ Sebus asubɔntene ho. Nkyekyɛmu 1–3, bɛyɛ mfinhyia 77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo; nkyekyɛmu 4, bɛyɛ mfinhyia 91–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo; ne nkyekyɛmu 5–39, bɛyɛ mfinhyia 91 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Alma firii Gideon asaase so anaafoɔ so rekɔ Mantae asaase so no, hwɛ, anwanwasɛm, ɔhyiaa Mosaya mmammarima no sɛ wɔrekɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so.

2 Afei saa Mosaya mmammarima yi na na wɔka Alma ho wɔ mmerɛ a ɔbɔfoɔ yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn ahyɛaseɛ no; ɛno nti Alma dii ahurisie mmorosoɔ sɛ wahunu ne nuanom; na deɛ ɛmaa no yɛɛ no dɛ ne sɛ na wɔda so yɛ ne nuanom wɔ Awurade mu; aane, na wɔanya nokware no ho nimdeɛ kɛseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ mmarima a wɔwɔ nteaseɛ na wɔahwehwɛ twerɛsɛm no mu aniberɛso, ama wɔahunu Onyankopɔn asɛm no.

3 Na mmom nnyɛ ne nyina ara nie; wɔatu wɔn ho asi hɔ ama mpaebɔ ne akɔmkyene; ɛno nti wɔwɔ nkɔmhyɛ honhom, ne yikyerɛ honhom, na wɔkyerɛ adeɛ a wɔkyerɛ no wɔ Onyankopɔn tumi ne n’akwanya so.

4 Na na wɔaka Onyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ Lamanfoɔ no mu ara mfinhyia dunan, a wɔatumi de nkurɔfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no ara aba nokware nimdeɛ no ho; aane, ɛnam wɔn asɛm no mu tumi nti wɔde wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara baa Onyankopɔn afɔrebokyea no anim, sɛ wɔmmɔ ne din na wɔnka wɔn bɔne wɔ n’anim.

5 Afei saa nneɛma yi na ɛsisii wɔn akwan mu wɔ wɔn akwantuo mu, na amanehunu bebree baa wɔn so; na wɔhunuu amane pii wɔ honam ne adwene afa mu, te sɛ ɛkɔm, nsukɔm ne ɔberɛ, ne mperesoɔ wɔ honhom mu.

6 Afei sei na wɔn akwantuo no yɛɛe: Wɔne wɔn agya Mosaya dii nkera wɔ atɛmmuafoɔ no afe a ɛdi kan no mu, mmerɛ a wɔapo ahennie a wɔn agya pɛɛ sɛ ɔde ma wɔn no, na saa na na nkurɔfoɔ no nso adwene yɛ wɔn;

7 Nanso wɔfirii Sarahɛmla asaase so, na wɔfaa wɔn akofena ne wɔn pea, ne wɔn tadua, ne wɔn agyan, ne wɔn ntommoɔ; na wɔyɛɛ saa sɛ wɔbɛtumi apɛ aduane ama wɔn ho mmerɛ a wɔwɔ ɛserɛ no so no.

8 Na sei na wɔne ebinom nso a wɔyii wɔn kaa wɔn ho no firii hɔ kɔɔ ɛserɛ no so no sɛ wɔn nkɔ Nifae asaase so nkɔka Onyankopɔn asɛm no nkyerɛ Lamanfoɔ no.

9 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔnantee nna bebree wɔ ɛserɛ no so, na wɔkyenee ɛkɔm ara yie na wɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ ara nso yie sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a Awurade bɛma wɔn ne Honhom no kakra na ɔne wɔn akɔ na waka wɔn ho, ama wɔayɛ adwendideɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn nsam ama sɛ ɛbɛtumi a anka wɔn nuanom Lamanfoɔ no ahunu nokware no, na wɔahunu wɔn agyanom amammerɛ a ɛyɛ ɔbra bɔne no a ɛntene no.

10 Na ɛbaa sɛ Awurade maa ne Honhom no baa wɔn hɔ, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Momma mo werɛ nkyekyere na wɔn werɛ kyekyeree.

11 Na Awurade see wɔn bio sɛ: Monkɔ Lamanfoɔ no a wɔyɛ mo nuanom no mu, na monkɔda m’asɛm no adi; nanso monya abotare wɔ abodwokyerɛ mu ne amanehunu mu, ama moada nneyɛ pa a ɛwɔ me mu no adi akyerɛ wɔn, na mɛyɛ mo adwendideɛ wɔ me nsam ama akra bebree anya nkwagyeɛ.

12 Na ɛbaa sɛ Mosaya mmammarima no akoma, ne wɔn a wɔka wɔn ho no nso nyaa akokoɔduro sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Lamanfoɔ no mu akɔda Onyankopɔn asɛm no adi akyerɛ wɔn.

13 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔduruu Lamanfoɔ asaase no hyeɛso no na wɔpaepae wɔn mu maa obiara faa ne kwan, na wɔnyaa gyedie wɔ Awurade mu sɛ wɔbɛhyia bio wɔ mmerɛ a wɔde wɔn dwumadie no bɛba awieɛ no; ɛfiri sɛ na wɔnim sɛ dwumadie a wɔafa ato wɔn so no so.

14 Na nokware mu, na adwuma no so ampa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔafa ato wɔn ho so sɛ wɔbɛka Onyankopɔn asɛm no akyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn ani mmuaɛ na wɔayɛ wɔn aso den na wɔn ho yɛ hu na wɔdi atruturasɛm; nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn anigye sɛ wɔbɛkumkum Nifaefoɔ no, na wɔabɔ wɔn apoo na wɔafom wɔn nneɛma; na wɔn akoma di ahonyadeɛ akyiri, anaa sɛ sika ne dwetɛ, ne aboɔ a ɛsombo yie, nanso wɔnam awudie ne mfomoɛ so pɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛnya saa nneɛma yi, ama wɔammerɛ amfa wɔn nsa anyɛ adwuma anya.

15 Ɛno nti wɔyɛ anihafoɔ, wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara som ahonini, na Onyankopɔn nomee aba wɔn so ɛnam wɔn agyanom amammerɛ nti; yei nyina ara akyiri no Awurade bɔhyɛ no duruu wɔn so sɛ wɔbɛnya sakyeraɛ nko ara deɛ a.

16 Ɛno nti, yei ne sɛ nti a Mosaya mmammarima no faa saa dwumadie no too wɔn ho so no, sɛ ɛbia wɔbɛtumi ama wɔasakyera wɔn adwene a; ebia wɔbɛtumi ama wɔahunu dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ.

17 Ɛno nti wɔpaepae wɔn mu, na nipa biara kɔɔ no nkoronkoro sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm ne ne tumi a ɔde ama wɔn no teɛ.

18 Afei, Amon a na ɔyɛ panin wɔ wɔn mu no, ɔsomm wɔn, na ɔfirii wɔn mu, na ɔhyiaa wɔn wieeɛ no, sɛdeɛ wɔn dibre teɛ no, na ɔde Onyankopɔn asɛm no ama wɔn no, anaa sɛ ɔsomm wɔn ansa na ɔregya wɔn hɔ akɔ; na sei na wɔtuu wɔn akwan ahodoɔ no wɔ asaase no so nyina ara.

19 Na Amon kɔɔ Ismael asaase no so, asaase no a wɔde hɔ too Ismael mmamarima no, a wɔn nso wɔbɛyɛɛ Lamanfoɔ no.

20 Na mmerɛ a Amon duruu Ismael asaase so no, Lamanfoɔ no kyeree no kyekyeree no, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ wɔn amammerɛ no sɛ wɔkyekyere Nifaefoɔ a wɔn nsa bɛka wɔn no, na wɔde wɔn kɔ ɔhene no anim; na wɔgyaee wɔn ma ɔhene no sɛ ɔbɛkum wɔn anaa sɛ wɔbɛfa wɔn nnɔmum, anaa sɛ wɔde wɔn bɛto afiase, anaa sɛ ɔbɛpamo wɔn afiri n’asaase so, sɛdeɛ ne pɛ ne n’anigyeɛ teɛ.

21 Na ɛmaa wɔsoaa Amon kɔɔ ɔhene a ɔhwɛ Ismael asaase no so hɔ; na na ne din de Lamonae; na na wɔyɛ Ismael aseni.

22 Na ɔhene no pɛɛ sɛ ɔhunu sɛ Amon wɔ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛtena Lamanfoɔ no mu wɔ asaase no so anaa sɛ ɔbɛpɛ sɛ ɔbɛtena ne nkurɔfoɔ no mu.

23 Na Amon see no sɛ: Aane, mɛpɛ sɛ metena nkurɔfoɔ yi mu kakra; aane, na ɛbia na m’atena akɔsi ɛda a mɛwuo.

24 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene Lamonae anigyeɛ Amon ho, na ɔmaa wɔsanesanee ne mpokyerɛ no; na ɔpɛɛ sɛ Amon ware ne mmammaa no mu baako.

25 Nanso Amon see no sɛ: Daabi, mmom mɛyɛ wo somfoɔ. Ɛno nti Amon bɛyɛɛ ɔhene Lamonae somfoɔ. Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔde no kaa n’asomfoɔ binom ho sɛ wɔnhwɛ Lamonae nnwan so, sɛdeɛ Lamanfoɔ amammerɛ teɛ no.

26 Na ɔsomm ɔhene no bɛyɛ nansa akyiri no, mmerɛ a ɔne Lamanfoɔ asomfoɔ no faa wɔn nnwan no kɔɔ baabi a nsuo wɔ a wɔfrɛ hɔ Sebus nsuo no, na Lamanfoɔ no nyina ara de wɔn nnwan ba hɔ ma wɔbɛnom nsuo—

27 Ɛno nti, mmerɛ a Amon ne ɔhene no asomfoɔ no reka wɔn nnwan no aba saa baabi yi a nsuo wɔ no, hwɛ, Lamanfoɔ no mu bi a wɔne wɔn nnwan kɔɔ nsuo no ho sɛ wɔrekɔnom bi no sɔre gyinaae na wɔbɔɔ Amon ne ɔhene no ne n’asomfoɔ no nnwan no hwetee, na wɔbɔɔ wɔn hwetee ara maa wɔdwane faa akwan bebree so.

28 Afei ɔhene no asomfoɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ nwiinwii, kaa sɛ: Afei ɔhene no bɛkumkum yɛn, sɛdeɛ ɔde yɛɛ yɛn nuanom no, ɛfiri sɛ saa marima yi nam atirimuɔdensɛm so bɔɔ wɔn nnwan hwetee. Na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ suu dendennden na wɔkaa sɛ: Monhwɛ yɛn nnwan abɔ ahweteɛ dada.

29 Afei wɔsuui ɛfiri sɛ na wɔsuro sɛ wɔbɛkumkum wɔn. Afei mmerɛ a Amon hunuu sei no ɛdɛ hyɛɛ n’akoma mu ma; na ɔkaa sɛ, merebɛkyerɛ me tumi akyerɛ me mfɛfoɔ asomfoɔ yi, anaa sɛ mɛma ɔhene no nsa aka ne nnwan de akyerɛ tumi a ɛwɔ me mu, ama me mfɛfoɔ asomfoɔ yi agye me adi na ama m’atumi ama wɔagye me nsɛm no adi.

30 Na afei saa adwene yi na Amon nyaaɛ wɔ mmerɛ a ɔhunuu sɛ wɔn a ɔfaa wɔn sɛ ne nuanom no rehunu amane no.

31 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔde tɛkyerɛma dɛ see wɔn sɛ: Me nuanom, momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam, na moma yɛnkɔ hwehwɛ nnwan no, na yɛasan de wɔn aba baabi a nsuo wɔ no; ama yɛahwɛ nnwan no so yie ama ɔhene no, na ɛno mma no nkum yɛn.

32 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔkɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔhwehwɛ nnwan no, na wɔdii Amon akyiri na wɔkaa wɔn ho ntɛmntɛm kɔdii ɔhene no nnwan no anim, na wɔboaa wɔn ano bɔɔ mu bio kɔɔ baabi a nsuo no wɔ no.

33 Na saa marima no bɛgyinaa hɔ bio sɛ wɔrebɛbɔ wɔn nnwan no ahwete; na mmom Amon see ne nuanom no sɛ: Montwa nnwan no ho nhyia ama wɔanwane, na merekɔ ne wɔn a wɔbɔ yɛn nnwan hwete no de akɔsi ani.

34 Ɛno nti, wɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ Amon hyɛɛ wɔn no, na ɔkɔɔ sɛ ɔne wɔn a wɔgyina asubɔntene Sebus no ho no rekɔsi ani; na na wɔdɔɔso, na wɔnsua.

35 Ɛno nti wɔansuro Amon, ɛfiri sɛ wɔsusuu sɛ wɔn nkurɔfoɔ no mu baako bɛtumi akum no wɔ ɛkwan biara a wɔpɛ so, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔnnim sɛ Awurade ahyɛ Mosaya bɔ sɛ ɔbɛgye ne mmammarima no afiri wɔn nsa mu; ɛna na wɔnnim biribiara a ɛfa Awurade ho; ɛno nti wɔn anigyeɛ wɔn nuanom sɛee ho; na yei ho nti wɔgyinaae hɔ sɛ wɔrebɛbɔ ɔhene no nnwan no ahwete.

36 Na mmom Amon gyinaa hɔ na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔde ne ntomoɔ no retoto aboɔ abɔ wɔn; aane, ɔde tumi kɛseɛ paa wɔn aboɔ; na yei maa ɔkum wɔn mu bi, na ɛmaa wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ suroo ne tumi no; nanso wɔn bo fuui ɛnam wɔn nuanom a wɔakumkum wɔn no nti, na wɔwetaee so sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ ɔno nso tɔ; ɛno nti, mmerɛ a wɔhunuu sɛ wɔrentumi mfa wɔn aboɔ no mmɔ no no, wɔde wɔn nkɔntimmaa baa ne so sɛ wɔrebɛkum no.

37 Na mmom hwɛ, obiara a ɔmaa ne kɔntibaa so sɛ ɔde rebɛbɔ Amon no, ɔde n’akofena twaa n’abasa twenee; ɛfiri sɛ ɔtumi gyinaa wɔn twɛdeɛ ano de n’akofena twitwaa wɔn abasa ara yie maa wɔn ho hyɛɛ aseɛ dwirii wɔn; na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ dwane firii n’anim; aane, na wɔn dodoɔ nnyɛ kakraa bi; na ɛnam n’abasa den so maa wɔdwanee.

38 Afei wɔn mu nsia tɔɔe wɔ ntomoɔ no ano, na mmom wankum wɔn mu biara gye wɔn kandifoɔ no a na ɔde n’akofena no kumm no no; na ɔtwitwaa dodoɔ biara a wɔmaa wɔn abasa so wɔ ne so no twenee na wɔn dodoɔ no nnyɛ kakraabi.

39 Na wɔpamoo wɔn kɔɔ akyiri no, ɔsann n’akyiri baae, na wɔmaa wɔn nnwan nsuo maa wɔnommeɛ na wɔde wɔn san baa ɔhene no nnwan adidibea no so, na wɔkɔɔ ɔhene no hɔ a na wɔkura n’abasa no a Amon de n’akofena twitwaa firii wɔn a wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔkum no no; na wɔsoa de kɔɔ ɔhene no hɔ de kɔdii adanseɛ wɔ nneɛma a wɔayɛ ho.
alma 18:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ɔhene Lamonae susu sɛ Amon yɛ Honhom Kɛseɛ—Amon kyerɛkyerɛ ɔhene no deɛ ɛfa abɔdeɛ ho, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa di nkutaho, ne sɛdeɛ ɛnam Kristo so ma ɔdi ma yɛn—Lamonae gyedi na ɔhwe ase sɛ owufoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene Lamonae maa n’asomfoɔ no gyinaae dii adanseɛ wɔ nneɛma a wɔhunuiɛ nyina ara wɔ asɛm no ho.

2 Na mmerɛ a wɔn nyina ara dii adanseɛ wɔ nneɛma a wɔahunu no ho no, na ɔtee Amon nokwaredie a ɔdi de bɔɔ ne nnwan ho ban ne ne tumi kɛseɛ nso a ɔne wɔn a wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔkum no no de sii ani no, ne ho dwirii no yie, na ɔkaa sɛ: Ampa, yei so sene nnipa. Hwɛ, na nnyɛ yei ne Honhom Kɛseɛ no a ɔde asotweɛ baa saa nkurɔfoɔ yi so no, ɛnam wɔn awudie no nti?

3 Na wɔbuaa ɔhene no see no sɛ: Sɛ ɔno ne Honhom Kɛseɛ no, anaa sɛ ɔyɛ nnipa a, yɛnnim; na mmom sei na yɛnim sɛ, ɔhene no atamfo no rentumi nkum no; ɛna sɛ ɔka yɛn ho a wɔrentumi mmɔ ɔhene no nnwan mpete, ɛnam ne nimdeɛ ne n’ahoɔden kɛseɛ no nti; ɛno nti, yɛnim sɛ ɔyɛ ɔhene no adamfo. Na afei, O ɔhene, yɛnnye nni sɛ nnipa bɛtumi anya tumi kɛseɛ sei, ɛfiri sɛ yɛnim sɛ wɔrentumi nkum no.

4 Na afei, mmerɛ a ɔhene no tee saa nsɛm yi no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Afei menim sɛ ɔyɛ Honhom Kɛseɛ; na waba fam saa mmerɛ yi mu sɛ ɔrebɛbɔ mo nkwa ho ban, ama mankum mo sɛdeɛ mede yɛɛ mo nuanom no. Afei yei ne Honhom Kɛseɛ no a yɛn agyanom aka ne ho asɛm no.

5 Afei yei ne Lamonae amammerɛ a ɔnya firii n’agya hɔ sɛ Honhom Kɛseɛ bi wɔ hɔ. Yei nyina ara akyiri no wɔgyee Honhom Kɛseɛ dii, na wɔdwene sɛ biribiara a wɔyɛɛ no yɛ; nanso, ehuu kɛseɛ hyɛɛ aseɛ kaa Lamonae, ɔsuroo sɛ ebia wayɛ bɔne sɛ ɔkumm n’asomfoɔ no;

6 Na ɔkumm wɔn mu bebree ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nuanom bɔɔ wɔn nnwan no petee wɔ baabi a nsuo no wɔ no; na sei ɛnam sɛ wɔbɔɔ wɔn nnwan no petee nti, wɔkumm wɔn.

7 Afei yei yɛ adeɛ a Lamanfoɔ no taa yɛ sɛ wɔgyina asubɔntene Sebus ho na wɔbɔ nkurɔfoɔ no nnwan hwete ama wɔnam so aka dodoɔ no ara a wɔabɔ wɔn apete no akɔ wɔn ankasa wɔn asaase so, ɛfiri sɛ saa kwan yi so na wɔtaa fa de fom nnwan.

8 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene Lamonae bisaa n’asomfoɔ no sɛ: Barima no a ɔwɔ tumi kɛseɛ a ɛte sei yi no wɔ hene?

9 Na wɔbuaa no sɛ: Hwɛ, ɔrema wo mpɔnkɔ no aduane. Afei, na ansa na ɔhene no rebɛse n’asomfoɔ no sɛ wɔn nkɔma ne nnwan no nsuo no, na wɔase wɔn sɛ wɔnsiesie ne mpɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam, na wɔne no nkɔ Nifae asaase so; ɛnam sɛ na Lamonae agya a ɔyɛ ɔhene wɔ asaase no nyina ara so no ato pono kɛseɛ bi wɔ Nifae asaase no so hɔ.

10 Afei mmerɛ a ɔhene Lamonae tee sɛ Amon resiesie ne mpɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnam no ne ho dwirii no yie, ɛnam Amon nokwaredie nti, na ɔkaa sɛ: Ampa sɛ ɔsomfoɔ biara nni m’asomfoɔ yi mu a ɔyɛ nokwarefoɔ sɛ saa ɔbarima yi; ɛfiri sɛ ɔkae me mmaransɛm nyina ara na ɔdi so.

11 Afei menim ampa ara sɛ yei ne Honhom Kɛseɛ no, na mɛpɛ sɛ ɔbɛba me hɔ, na mmom me suro koraa.

12 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon yɛɛ mpɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam no krado de maa ɔhene no ne n’asomfoɔ no wieeɛ no, ɔkɔɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn, na ɔhunuu sɛ ɔhene no anim asesa; ɛno nti anka ɔrefiri n’anim asan akɔ.

13 Na ɔhene no asomfoɔ no mu baako see no sɛ, Rabbana, a asekyerɛ ne sɛ, otumfoɔ anaa sɛ ɔhene kɛseɛ, na wɔfa no sɛ wɔn ahemfo yɛ atumfoɔ; na yei maa ɔsee no sɛ: Rabana, ɔhene no pɛ sɛ wotwɛn.

14 Ɛno nti Amon danee ne ho hwɛɛ ɔhene no, na ɔsee no sɛ: O ɔhene ɛdeɛn na wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma wo? Na ɛbɛyɛ dɔnhwere baako ntam na ɔhene no mmuaa no, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmerɛ teɛ, ɛfiri sɛ na onnim asɛm a ɔnka nkyerɛ no.

15 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon see no bio sɛ; ɛdeɛn na wo rehwehwɛ afiri me hɔ? Nanso ɔhene no ammua no.

16 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon, ɛnam sɛ Onyankopɔn Honhom ahyɛ Amon ma nti, ɔhunuu ɔhene n’adwene. Na ɔsee no sɛ: Adɛn, wate sɛ me bɔɔ w’asomfoɔ ne wo nnwan ho ban anaa, na mede ntommoɔ ne akofena kumm wɔn nuanom mu nson na metwitwaa ebinom nso abasa firii hɔ, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma mabɔ wo ne w’asomfoɔ nnwan ho ban; hwɛ, yei na ama woho adwiri wo yi?

17 Mese wo sɛ, ɛdeɛn na ama wo ho adwiri wo kɛseɛ sei yi? Hwɛ, meyɛ nnipa, na meyɛ wo somfoɔ; ɛno nti; biribiara a wopɛ a ɛyɛ no, ɛno na mɛyɛ.

18 Afei mmerɛ a ɔhene no tee saa nsɛm yi no, ne ho dwirii no bio, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu sɛ Amon ahunu n’adwene; na mmom yei nyina ara akyiri no ɔhene Lamonae buee n’ano mu na ɔsee no sɛ: Wo ne hwan? Wo ne saa Honhom Kɛseɛ no a ɔnim adeɛ nyina ara no?

19 Amon bua see no sɛ: Ɛnnyɛ me a.

20 Na ɔhene no kaa sɛ: ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wo hunuu m’akoma mu nsusuɛ? Wo bɛtumi akasa akokoɔduro so, na waka deɛ ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho akyerɛ me; na afei nso ka tumi a wo nam so de kumiɛ na wode twitwaa me nuanom no a wɔbɔɔ me nnwan hweteeɛ no abasa firii hɔ no kyerɛ me—

21 Na afei, sɛ wo bɛka deɛ ɛfa saa nneɛma yi ho akyerɛ me a, ɛnneɛ biribiara a wopɛ no mede bɛma wo; na sɛ wo bɛhia mpo a mɛma m’asraafoɔ abɔ wo ho ban; nanso menim sɛ wo wɔ tumi kɛseɛ kyɛn wɔn nyina ara; nanso biribiara a wopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma wo no mɛyɛ ama wo.

22 Afei ɛnam sɛ Amon yɛ nyansafoɔ, nanso ne ho dwo nti no, ɔsee Lamonae sɛ: Na sɛ meka tumi a menam so de yɛ saa nneɛma yi kyerɛ wo a, wo bɛtie m’asɛm? Na yei ne adeɛ a merehwehwɛ afiri wo hɔ.

23 Na ɔhene no buaa no sɛ: Aane, mɛgye wo nsɛm nyina ara adi: Na sei na ɔde ne nyansa nyaa no.

24 Na Amon hyɛɛ aseɛ de akokoɔduro kasa kyerɛɛ no, na ɔsee no sɛ: Wogyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ?

25 Na ɔbuaa see no sɛ: Mente deɛ woreka no ase.

26 Na Amon kaa sɛ: Na wogyedi sɛ Honhom Kɛseɛ bi wɔ hɔ?

27 Na ɔkaa sɛ Aane.

28 Na Amon kaa sɛ: Yei ne Onyankopɔn no. Na Amon see no bio sɛ: Na wogyedi sɛ saa Honhom Kɛseɛ yi a, ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn no na ɔbɔɔ nneɛma nyina ara a ɛwɔ ɔsoro ne asaase so no anaa?

29 Na ɔkaa sɛ: Aane, megyedi sɛ ɔno na ɔbɔɔ nneɛma a ɛwɔ asaase so nyina ara; na mmom mennim ɔsoro hɔ.

30 Na Amon buaa no sɛ: Ɔsoro hɔ ne baabi a Onyankopɔn ne n’abɔfoɔ kronkron nyina ara teɛ no.

31 Na ɔhene Lamonae buaa sɛ: ɛwɔ asaase no soro anaa?

32 Na Amon kaa sɛ: Aane, na ɔhwɛ nnipa mma nyina ara so wɔ fam; na ɔnim adwene ne nsusuɛ a ɛwɔ akoma nyina ara mu; ɛfiri sɛ ɛnam ne nsa so na ɛfiri ahyɛaseɛ no ɔde bɔɔ wɔn nyina ara.

33 Na ɔhene Lamonae kaa sɛ: Megye deɛ waka no nyina ara di. Na Onyankopɔn na ɔsomaa wo anaa?

34 Amon buaa no sɛ: Mɛyɛ nnipa; na ahyɛaseɛ no wɔbɔɔ nnipa wɔ Onyankopɔn sɛso, na ne Honhom Kronkron no na ɛfrɛɛ me sɛ me mɛkyerɛkyerɛ saa nneɛma yi nkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi, ama wɔabɛhunu deɛ ɛtene ne nokware;

35 Na saa Honhom no mu bi te me mu, a ɛma me nimdeɛ, ne tumi nso sɛdeɛ me gyedie ne mɛpɛ a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn mu teɛ no.

36 Afei mmerɛ a Amon kaa saa nsɛm yi no, ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kaa sɛdeɛ wɔsi bɔɔ wiase, ne sɛdeɛ wɔsi bɔɔ Adam nso, na ɔkaa sɛdeɛ esi maa adasamma hwee ase kyerɛɛ no, na ɔsii nsɛm no so bio na ɔde twerɛtohɔsɛm no ne twerɛsɛm kronkron no a wɔatwerɛ a ɛfa nkurɔfoɔ no ho no a nkɔmhyɛfoɔ aka ho asɛm no, mpo de rekɔsi mmerɛ no a wɔn agya, Lihae, firii Yerusalem no.

37 Na ɔsan nso bobɔɔ so bio kyerɛɛ wɔn (de maa ɔhene no ne n’asomfoɔ) wɔn agyanom akwantuo wɔ ɛserɛ no so, ne wɔn amanehunu a ɛfa ɔkɔm ne nsukɔm ho, ne wɔn berɛ, ne deɛ ɛkeka ho.

38 Na ɔbobɔɔ deɛ ɛfa Laman ne Lemuel, ne Ismael mmammarima no atuateɛ ho asɛm so kyerɛɛ wɔn, aane wɔn atuateɛ nyina ara no ɔkakyerɛɛ wɔn; na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ twerɛtohɔsɛm ne twerɛsɛm no nyina ara mu yie kyerɛɛ wɔn, fiti mmerɛ a Lihae firii Yerusalem de bɛsi saa mmerɛ yi mu.

39 Mmom nnyɛ ne nyina ara nie; ɛfiri sɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ ma dima no mu yie kyerɛɛ wɔn, deɛ wasiesie ato hɔ fiti wiase fapem no; na ɔsan maa wɔn hunuu deɛ ɛfa Kristo mmaeɛ no nso ho, na Awurade nwuma nyina ara nso no, ɔdaa n’adi kyerɛɛ wɔn.

40 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔkaa saa nsɛm yi nyina ara wieeɛ no, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ mu yie kyerɛɛ ɔhene no, ɔhene no gyee nsɛm no nyina ara diiɛ.

41 Na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔresu afrɛ Awurade sɛ: O Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ; sɛdeɛ w’ahummɔborɔ dodoɔ no a wode hunuu Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no mmɔbɔ teɛ no, hunu me nso me ne me nkurɔfoɔ mmɔbɔ.

42 Na afei, mmerɛ a ɔkaa saa no, ɔhwee fam sɛdeɛ wawuo no.

43 Na ɛbaa sɛ n’asomfoɔ no maa no so soaa no de no kɔmaa ne yere, na wɔde no too mpa so; na ɔdaa hɔ te sɛdeɛ wɔawuo no bɛyɛ naanu ntam, adekyeɛ ne anadwo mmienu; na ne yere, ne ne mmammarima, ne ne mmammaa suu no, sɛdeɛ Lamanfoɔ yɛ no, na wɔbɔɔ abooboo yie wɔ ne wuo no ho.
alma 19:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamonae nya nkwa a ɛtehɔ daa hann no na ɔhunu Odimafoɔ no—Ne fiefoɔ kɔ tebea a wɔn ani nna hɔ, na dodoɔ hunu abɔfoɔ—Ɔkora Amon anwanwa kwan so—Ɔbɔ dodoɔ no ara asu na ɔte asɔre wɔ wɔn mu. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ naanu ne anadwo mmienu akyiri no na anka wɔrebɛfa ne funu akɔto nna a wɔayɛ sɛ wɔde bɛsie wɔn awufoɔ no mu.

2 Afei mmerɛ a ɔhemaa no tee Amon nka no, ɛno nti ɔsomaa sɛ wɔnkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔba bɛhunu no.

3 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon yɛɛ sɛdeɛ wɔahyɛ no no, na ɔkɔɔ ɔhemaa no hɔ, na ɔbisaa no deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ma no.

4 Na ɔsee no sɛ: Me kunu asomfoɔ no ama m’ahunu sɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn nkɔmhyɛni kronkron, na wowɔ tumi bi a wode di dwuma akɛseɛ beberee wɔ ne din mu;

5 Ɛno nti, sɛ sei na ɛteɛ deɛ a mɛpɛ sɛ wokɔhunu me kunu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔde no ato ne mpa so naanu ne anadwo mmienu ntam; na ebinom se onnwuii, ɛna ebinom nso se wawu na mpo ɔbɔn, nti ɛwɔ sɛ wɔde no kɔto nna mu; na mmom me deɛ, me nko ara deɛ ɔmmɔn mma me.

6 Afei, yei ne deɛ na Amon rehwehwɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim sɛ Onyankopɔn tumi na ahyɛ ɔhene Lamonae so; ɔnim sɛ ɔreyi akyinnyeɛ nkatanim sum no afiri n’adwene mu, na hann a ɛhyerɛn wɔ n’adwene mu no yɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam, a ɛyɛ ne papayɛ hann a ɛyɛ nnwanwa no—aane, saa hann yi de ɛdɛ a ɛte sei aba ne kra mu, na ayi ɛbɔ kabii no afiri hɔ, na nkwa a ɛtehɔ daa hann no asɔ wɔ ne kra mu, aane, ɔnim sɛ yei na ahyɛ ne honamdua so, na Onyankopɔn honhom no hyɛɛ no ma—

7 Ɛno nti, deɛ ɔhemaa no rehwehwɛ afiri ne hɔ no ne adeɛ a ɔno nso rehwehwɛ, ɛno nti, ɔkɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔhwɛ ɔhene no sɛdeɛ ɔhemaa no rehwehwɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no; na ɔhunuu ɔhene no, na ɔhunuu sɛ ɔnwuui.

8 Na ɔsee ɔhemaa no sɛ: Ɔnwuii, na wada wɔ Onyankopɔn mu, na adeɛkye a ɔbɛsɔre bio; ɛno nti mma monsie no.

9 Na Amon see no sɛ: Wogye yei di? Na ɔsee no sɛ: Menni adanseɛ biara ka w’asɛm ne yɛn asomfoɔ asɛm ho; nanso megyedi sɛ ɛbɛyɛ hɔ sɛdeɛ waka no.

10 Na Amon see no sɛ: Nhyira ne wo, ɛnam wo gyedie mmorosoɔ nti; Mese wo sɛ, ɔbaa, gyedie kɛseɛ a ɛte sei yi bi nni Nifaefoɔ nkurɔfoɔ yi nyina ara mu biara.

11 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔwɛn ne kunu mpa no, firi saa mmerɛ no ara de kɔsii adekyeɛ no a Amon hyɛɛ sɛ ɔbɛsɔre no.

12 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔsɔree, sɛdeɛ Amon kaae no; na mmerɛ a ɔsɔree no, ɔtenee ne nsa wɔ ɔbaa no so, na ɔkaa sɛ: Nhyira nka Onyankopɔn din, na nhyira ne wo.

13 Na sɛ ɛyɛ ampa sɛ wote ase yi, hwɛ, mahunu me Dimafoɔ no; na ɔbɛba, na ɔbaa awo no, na ɔbɛdi ama adasamma nyina ara a wɔbɛgye ne din adi no. Afei, mmerɛ a ɔkaa saa nsɛm no wieeɛ no, n’akoma pentenee wɔ ne mu, na ɔde ɛdɛ hwee fam bio; na ɔhemaa no nso hwee fam, a na Honhom no ahyɛ wɔn so.

14 Afei Amon hunuu sɛ Awurade Honhom nam ne mpaeɛ a ɔbɔɔe maa Lamanfoɔ a wɔyɛ ne nuanom no a ɛnam wɔn nti suu kɛseɛ aba Nifaefoɔ mu no, anaa sɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ nyina ara mu ɛnam wɔn amumuyɛsɛm ne wɔn amamerɛ nti, ɔbuu nkotodwe, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔde ne kra nyina ara rebɔ mpaeɛ na ɔdaa Onyankopɔn ase wɔ deɛ wɔayɛ ama ne nuanom no nti; na ɛdɛ hyɛɛ ɔno nso so ma; na yei maa wɔn mmiɛnsa nyina ara hwee fam.

15 Afei, mmerɛ a ɔhene no asomfoɔ no hunuu sɛ wɔahwe fam no, wɔn nso hyɛɛ aseɛ su frɛɛ Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ na Awurade ho suro aba wɔn so, na wɔn na wɔgyinaae ɔhene no anim na wɔdii adanseɛ wɔ tumi kɛseɛ a Amon wɔ no ho.

16 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔde wɔn ahoɔden bɔɔ Awurade din ara kɔsii sɛ wɔn nyina ara hwehwee ase maa ɛkaa Lamanni baa baako bi a na ne din de Abis, ɔno na wɔasakyera aba Awurade hɔ bɛyɛ mfie bebree, ɛnam n’agya yikyerɛ a na ɛda nso nti—

17 Na mmerɛ a ɔsakyera baa Awurade hɔ no, wɔanka ankyerɛ obiara no, ɛno nti mmerɛ a ɔhunuu sɛ Lamonae asomfoɔ no nyina ara ahwehwe ase na n’awuraa nso, a ɔne ɔhemaa no, ne ɔhene no, ne Amon butubutu hɔ kagyaa wɔ fam no, ɔhunuu sɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn tumi; na ɔsusuu sɛ ɔrebɛfa yei so ama nkurɔfoɔ no ahunu deɛ asi wɔ wɔn mu, ama sɛ wɔbɛhunu wɔn anisoadeɛ yi a ama wɔagye Onyankopɔn tumi no adi ɛno nti ɔtutuu mmirika kɔɔ afiefie mu, kɔkaa deɛ asi kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no.

18 Na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreboa wɔn ano abɔ mu wɔ ɔhene no fie hɔ. Na nkurɔfokuo baa hɔ, na deɛ ɛyɛɛ wɔn nnwa koraa ne sɛ wɔhunuu sɛ ɔhene no, ne ɔhemaa no, ne wɔn asomfoɔ no deda ayeya kagyaa wɔ fam, na wɔn nyina ara deda hɔ sɛdeɛ wɔawuwuo no; na wɔhunuu Amon nso, na hwɛ na ɔyɛ Nifaeni.

19 Na afei nkurɔfoɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ nwiinwii wɔ wɔn mu; ebinom kaa sɛ bɔne kɛseɛ bi na aba wɔn so, anaa sɛ aba ɔhene no ne ne fiefoɔ soɔ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔama Nifaefoɔ abɛtena asaase no so.

20 Mmom ebinom nso kasa tiaa wɔn sɛ: Ɔhene no ara na watwe bɔne sei aba ne fie, ɛfiri sɛ ɔkumm n’asomfoɔ no a wɔbɔɔ ne nnwan hwetee wɔ asubɔntene Sebus no ho no.

21 Na marima no a wɔgyinaae asubɔntene Sebus ho na wɔbɔɔ ɔhene no nnwan no hwetee no nso kasa tiaa wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn bo afu Amon ɛnam wɔn nuanom mu binom a ɔkumm wɔn wɔ asubɔntene Sebus ho no, mmerɛ a na ɔrebɔ ɔhene no nnwan ho ban no.

22 Afei, wɔn mu baako a Amon de n’akofena kumm ne nua barima no, ɛnam sɛ ne bo afu Amon dodo nti no, ɔtwee n’akofena kɔɔ sɛ ɔderekɔkum Amon; na mmerɛ a ɔmaa akofena no so sɛ ɔde rekum no no, hwɛ, ɔhwee fam wuii.

23 Afei yɛhunu sɛ obiara ntumi nkum Amon, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade aka akyerɛ n’agya Mosaya sɛ: Mɛgyae no, na ɛbɛyɛ hɔ ama no sɛdeɛ wo gyedie teɛ no—ɛno nti, Mosaya tuu no hyɛɛ Awurade nsa—

24 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a nkurɔfokuo no hunuu sɛ ɔbarima no a ɔtwee akofena sɛ ɔde rekum Amon no atwa ahwe awu no, ɛhuu kaa wɔn nyina ara, na wɔantumi antene wɔn nsa amfa anka no anaa sɛ wɔn a wɔahwehwe fam no mu biara; na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ bio de ahodwiri bisabisaa wɔn ho sɛ, saa tumi kɛseɛ yi firi hene, anaa sɛ saa nneɛma yi nyina ara kyerɛ sɛn?

25 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara no kaa sɛ Amon ne Honhom Kɛseɛ no, na nkaaɛ no nso se Honhom Kɛseɛ no na ɛsomaa no;

26 Na mmom ebinom nso kasa tiaa wɔn nyina ara, sɛ ɔyɛ aboa kɛseɛ huhuu bi na Nifaefoɔ asoma no sɛ ɔmera mɛteetee wɔn.

27 Na wɔn mu bi nso se Honhom Kɛseɛ no na ɛsomaa Amon sɛ ɛnam wɔn amumuyɛsɛm nti wɔmera mɛha wɔn; na saa Honhom Kɛseɛ no na ɔhwɛɛ Nifaefoɔ so mmerɛ nyina ara, ɔno na mmerɛ nyina ara no ɔgyee wɔn firii wɔn nsa mu; na wɔkaa sɛ ɛyɛ saa Honhom Kɛseɛ yi na ɔsɛe wɔn nuanom Lamanfoɔ no mu bebree.

28 Na akasakasa hyɛɛ aseɛ yɛɛ den yie wɔ wɔn mu. Na mmerɛ a wɔrekasakasa no, ɔsomfoɔ baa no a ɔmaa nkurɔfokuo no boaa wɔn ano no baae, na mmerɛ a ɔhunuu akasakasa a ɛwɔ nkurɔfokuo no mu no, ne werɛ hoo yie mpo maa ɔsuui.

29 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔkɔsɔɔ ɔhemaa no nsa, sɛ ɛbia na watumi ama no so afiri fam; na ɔsɔɔ ne nsa mu ara pɛ na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ: O Yesu a nhyira aka no, wɔagye me afiri asamando huhuu no mu! O Nyankopɔn a nhyira aka wo, hu nkurɔfoɔ yi mmɔbɔ!

30 Na mmerɛ a ɔkaa sei no, ɛdɛ hyɛɛ no ma, ma ɔbɔɔ ne nsa mu, na ɔkaa nsɛm bebree a obi ntumi nte aseɛ; na mmerɛ a ɔyɛe sei no, ɔsɔɔ ɔhene Lamonae nsa, na ɔhunuu sɛ wasɔre agyina ne nan so.

31 Na ntɛm pa ara no, ɔhunuu akasakasa a ɛwɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ no mu, na ɔkɔɔe na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka wɔn anim, na wakyerɛkyerɛ wɔn nsɛm a ɔte firii Amon ano no; na dodoɔ no ara a wɔtee ne nsɛm no gye dii, na wɔsakyeraae baa Awurade hɔ.

32 Mmom dodoɔ nso wɔ wɔn mu a wɔnmpɛ sɛ wɔbɛtie ne nsɛm no; ɛno nti wɔkɔɔ wɔn kwan.

33 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon sɔree no, ɔno nso somm wɔn, na Lamonae asomfoɔ no nyina ara nso yɛɛ saa ara; na wɔn nyina ara kaa saa nsɛm korɔ no ara sɛ wɔanya nsesaɛ wɔ wɔn akoma mu; na wɔnni ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔne bio.

34 Na hwɛ, dodoɔ no ara kakyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ wɔahunu abɔfoɔ na wɔne wɔn akasa; na wɔaka nneɛma a ɛfa Nyankopɔn ho ne ne teneneeɛ ho asɛm akyerɛ wɔn.

35 Na ɛbaa sɛ dodoɔ ara na ɛgyee wɔn nsɛm no diiɛ; na dodoɔ no ara a wɔgyee diiɛ no, wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu; na wɔbɛyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ ateneneefoɔ, na wɔtee asɔre wɔ wɔn mu.
