36 Na sei na Awurade adwuma hyɛɛ aseɛ wɔ Lamanfoɔ no mu; sei na Awurade hyɛɛ aseɛ hwiee ne Honhom guu wɔn so; na yɛhunu sɛ watrɛ n’abasa mu ama nnipa biara a ɔbɛsakyera na wagye ne din adi.
alma 20:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Awurade soma Amon kɔ Midonae sɛ ɔnkɔyi ne nuanom a wɔwɔ afiase no—Amon ne Lamonae hyia Lamonae agya a ɔyɛ hene wɔ asaase no nyina ara so—Amon hyɛ ɔhene akɔkora no sɛ ɔmma kwan mma ɔnyi ne nuanom mfiri afiase. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔtee asɔre no bi wɔ saa asaase no so no ɔhene Lamonae pɛɛ sɛ Amon ne no kɔ Nifae asaase no so, ama ɔde no akyerɛ n’agya.

2 Na Awurade nne baa Amon hɔ sɛ: Ɛnkɔ Nifae asaase no so, ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ, ɔhene no rehwehwɛ wo kra ayi afiri hɔ; na mmom kɔ Midonae asaase so; na hwɛ, wo nua Aaron ne Muloki nso ne Ama da afiase.

3 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon tee yei no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Lamonae sɛ: Hwɛ, me nua ne anuanom gu afiase wɔ Midonae, na merekɔ na m’akɔyi wɔn.

4 Afei Lamonae ka kyerɛɛ Amon sɛ: Menim sɛ wobɛtumi ayɛ adeɛ nyina ara. Na mmom hwɛ, me ne wo bɛkɔ Midonae asaase so; ɛfiri sɛ ɔhene a ɔwɔ Midonae asaase so no a ne din de Antiomno no, yɛ m’adamfo; ɛno nti merebɛkɔ Midonae asaase no so na mede kɛterɛmadɛ akasa akyerɛ ɔhene no a ɔwɔ asaase no so no, na ɔbɛyi wo nuanom no afiri afiase. Afei Lamonae ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwan na ɔkakyerɛɛ wo sɛ wo nuanom gu afiase?

5 Na Amon see no sɛ: Obiara nka nkyerɛɛ me, gye sɛ Onyankopɔn nko ara; na ɔsee me sɛ—Kɔ na kɔyi wo nuanom no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔda afiase wɔ Midonae asaase so.

6 Afei mmerɛ a Lamonae tee yei no ɔmaa n’asomfoɔ no yɛɛ n’apɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛ nam krado.

7 Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Amon sɛ: Bra, me ne wo bɛkɔ Midonae asaase so, na ɛhɔ na mɛkoto aserɛ ɔhene no ama wɔayi wo nuanom afiri afiase.

8 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon ne Lamonae retu kwan akɔ hɔ no, wɔhyiaa Lamonae agya no a ɔyɛ ɔhene wɔ asaase no so nyina ara no.

9 Na hwɛ, Lamonae agya see no sɛ: Adɛn nti na wo amma aponotoɔ no ase saa da kɛseɛ no, mmerɛ a metoo pono maa me mmammarima no, ne me nkurɔfoɔ no?

10 Na ɔsan bisaa no sɛ: ɛhene na wone saa Nifaeni yi a ɔyɛ nkontompofoɔ asefoni yi mu baako rekɔ?

11 Na ɛbaa sɛ Lamonae kyerɛɛ no baabi a ɔrekɔ no yie, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔsuro sɛ ɔbɛfom no.

12 Na ɔsan nso kaa deɛ amma wantumi amfiri ɔno ara n’aheman mu no nyina ara kyerɛɛ no, na ɛno nti amma wantumi ankɔ n’agya aponotoɔ no ase no kyerɛɛ no.

13 Na afei mmerɛ a Lamonae bobɔɔ saa nneɛma yi nyina ara so kyerɛɛ no no, hwɛ, deɛ ɛyɛɛ no nnwa koraa ne sɛ n’agya bo fuu no, na ɔkaa sɛ: Lamonae, worekɔyi Nifaefoɔ yi a wɔyɛ nkontompofoɔ asefoɔ yi. Hwɛ, ɔyeree yɛn agyanom gyee wɔn ho nneɛma; na afei ne mma nso aba yɛn mu ama wɔde wɔn naadaa ne wɔn nkontoposɛm abɛdaadaa yɛn, ama wɔn nso wɔabɛyere yɛn nso bio agye yɛn agyapadeɛ.

14 Afei Lamonae agya hyɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa n’akofena nkum Amon. Na ɔsan nso hyɛɛ no sɛ mma ɔnkɔ Midonae asaase so, na mmom ɔne no nsankɔ Ismael asaase so.

15 Na mmom Lamonae see no sɛ: merenkum Amon, ɛna me nsan m’akyiri nkɔ Ismael asaase so, na mmom mɛkɔ Midonae asaase so akɔyi Amon nuanom afiri efiase, na menim sɛ wɔyɛ nokwarefoɔ ne nokware Nyankopɔn no nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron.

16 Afei mmerɛ a n’agya tee saa nsɛm yi no, ne bo fuu no, na ɔtwee n’akofena sɛ ɔde rebɛtwitwa no agu fam.

17 Na mmom Amon baa n’anim na ɔsee no sɛ: Hwɛ, nkum wo babarima; ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ sɛ ɔbɛtɔ kyɛn sɛ wo bɛto, na hwɛ, wasakyera afiri ne bɔne ho; na mmom sɛ wo tɔ saa mmerɛ yi mu wɔ w’abufuo mu a, wo kra nnya nkwagyeɛ.

18 Na bio nso, ɛhia sɛ wogyae deɛ wopɛ sɛ wo yɛ no; ɛfiri sɛ sɛ wokum wo babarima no a, ɔno a ɔyɛ nnipa a ɔnnifɔ no a ne mogya bɛsu afiri fam afrɛ Awurade ne Nyankopɔn, ama awerɛtɔ aba wo so; ɛfiri sɛ ɔnni fɔ na anhwɛ a na w’ayera wo kra.

19 Afei mmerɛ a Amon kaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ no no, ɔbuaa no sɛ: Menim sɛ sɛ mekum me babarima a, na maka mogya a edi bem agu; ɛfiri sɛ wo na wohwehwɛɛ sɛ wo bɛsɛe no.

20 Na ɔtenee ne nsa sɛ ɔrebɛkum Amon. Na mmom Amon gyinaa ne twɛdeɛ no anim na ɔsan nso twaa ne nsa ama wantumi amfa anyɛ hwee bio.

21 Afei mmerɛ a ɔhene no hunuu sɛ Amon bɛtumi akum no no, ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekoto aserɛ Amon sɛ ɔmfa ne nkwa nkyɛ no.

22 Mmom Amon pagyaa n’akofena, na ɔsee no sɛ: Hwɛ, mɛtwitwa wo, gye sɛ wo ma kwan sɛ wɔnyi me nuanom no mfiri afiase.

23 Afei ɛnam sɛ ɔhene no suro sɛ ɔbɛhwere ne nkwa nti no, ɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ w’ankum me a biribiara a wobɛbisa me no mɛyɛ ama wo, de akɔsi m’ahennie fa mpo so.

24 Afei mmerɛ a Amon hunuu sɛ ne nsa aka deɛ ɔrehwehwɛ afiri ɔhene akɔkora no nkyɛn no, ɔsee no sɛ: Sɛ wo bɛma wɔayi me nuanom no afiri afiase, na wama Lamonae nso ada ho adi adeɛ wɔ n’aheman mu, na wobo mmfu no, na mmom wama no kwan ama wayɛ deɛ ɔno ara nim sɛ ɛyɛ na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ a ɛnneɛ merenkum wo; anyɛ saa deɛ a, mɛbɔ wo ahwe fam.

25 Afei mmerɛ a Amon kaa saa nsɛm yi no, ɔhene no ani hyɛɛ aseɛ gyee ɛnam ne nkwa nti.

26 Na mmerɛ a ɔhunuu sɛ Amon mpɛ sɛ ɔsɛe no no, na ɔsan hunuu ɔdɔ kɛseɛ nso a ɔwɔ ma ne babarima Lamonae no, ne ho dwirii no mmorosoɔ, na ɔsee no sɛ: Ɛnam sɛ yei ara na wahwehwɛ, sɛ mɛyi wo nuanom no, na mɛma me babarima Lamonae akɔ so adi n’adeɛ wɔ n’aheman mu no, hwɛ, mɛma me babarima no afa n’aheman no fiti saa mmerɛ yi de akɔsi afebɔɔ; na merenni ne so bio—

27 Na mɛma wɔayi wo nuanom no afiri afiase, na wone wo nuanom no bɛtumi aba me nkyɛn wɔ m’aheman mu; ɛfiri sɛ mɛpɛ pa ara sɛ mɛhunu wo. Na ɔhene no ho dwirii no yie wɔ nsɛm a ɔkaaɛ no ho, ne nsɛm nso a ne babarima Lamonae kaae no, ɛno nti na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔsua nsɛm no.

28 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon ne Lamonae toaa wɔn akwantuo no so sɛ wɔrekɔ Midonae asaase so. Na Lamonae nyaa ɔhene no a ɔwɔ asaase no so anim animuonyam; ɛno nti wɔyii Amon nuanom no firii afiase.

29 Na mmerɛ a Amon hyiaa wɔn no ne werɛhooe yie, ɛfiri sɛ hwɛ na wɔda adagya na wɔn honam nso atwitwatwitwa ɛnam ntampehoma denden a na wɔde akyekyere wɔn no nti. Na ɔkɔm ne nsukɔm nso ade wɔn, ne amanehunu ahodoɔ nyina ara bi nso; nanso ne nyina ara akyiri no wɔnyaa abotarɛ wɔ wɔn amanehunu nyina ara mu.

30 Na sɛdeɛ ɛsiiɛ no, na ɛyɛ wɔn nkrabea sɛ wɔbɛkɔ akɔdi nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ akomadenfoɔ ne ɛkɔnseneɛfoɔ kɛseɛ no nsa mu; ɛno nti wɔantie wɔn nsɛm no, na wɔyii wɔn firii mu, na wɔhwee wɔn, na wɔpamoo wɔn firii afiefie mu ne meamea so kɔsii sɛ wɔduruu Midonae asaase so; na ɛhɔ na wɔkyeree wɔn de wɔn kɔguu afiase, na wɔde ntampehoma denden kyekyeree wɔn, na wɔmaa wɔdaa afiase nna bebree na Lamonae ne Amon kɔgyee wɔn.
alma 21:
Sei na Aaron, ne Muloki, ne wɔn nuanom kaa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ Lamanfoɔ no.

Ne nyina ara wɔ ti 21 de kɔsi 26 mu.

[center][font_size=26]Ti 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aaron ka Kristo ne ne mpata no ho asɛm kyerɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ—Wɔde Aaron ne ne nuanom to afiase wɔ Midonae—Wɔyii wɔn firii afiase akyire yi no wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ nhyiadan mu na wɔsakyera akra bebree—Lamonae de ɔsom ho fawohodie ma nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Ismael asaase so no. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei mmerɛ a Amon ne ne nuanom dii mpaepaemu wɔ Lamanfoɔ asaase no hyeɛso hɔ no, hwɛ Aaron sii mu sɛ ɔrekɔ asaase a Lamanfoɔ frɛ hɔ Yerusalem no a wɔde too asaase no a wɔwoo wɔn agyanom wɔ so no; na ɛne Mormon hyeɛso bɔ mu wɔ akyiri kakra.

2 Afei Lamanfoɔ ne Amalɛkaefoɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Amulɔn akyekyere kuropɔn kɛseɛ, a wɔfrɛ no Yerusalem.

3 Afei Lamanfoɔ no ankasa yɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn aso yɛ den ara yie deɛ, nanso na Amalɛkaefoɔ no ne Amulɔnfoɔ no yɛ asoɔdenfoɔ kyɛn wɔn; ɛno nti wɔhyɛɛ Lamanfoɔ no nso sɛ wɔbɛyɛ wɔn akoma den ama wɔanyini wɔ atirimuɔdensɛm ne wɔn akyiwasɛm mu.

4 Na ɛbaa sɛ Aaron baa Yerusalem kuropɔn no mu, na ɔdii kan sɛ ɔreka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ no. Na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn nhyiadan no mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔasisi nhyiadan sɛdeɛ Nehor kuo no nhyehyɛeɛ teɛ, ɛfiri sɛ na Amalɛkaefoɔ ne Amulɔnfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no ara ka Nehor kuo no nhyehyɛeɛ ho.

5 Ɛno nti, mmerɛ a Aaron kɔɔ nkurɔfoɔ no nhyiadan baako mu sɛ ɔrekɔka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn, na mmerɛ a ɔgu so rekasa akyerɛ wɔn no, hwɛ Amalɛkaeni bi a ɔwɔ hɔ sɔree na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔne no represo, kaa sɛ: ɛdeɛn na wadi ho adanseɛ yi? Wahunu ɔsoro bɔfoɔ anaa? Adɛn nti na yɛn deɛ abɔfoɔ nnyi wɔn ho adi nkyerɛ yɛn yi? Hwɛ nti saa nkurɔfoɔ yi nnyɛ apapafoɔ te sɛ wo nkurɔfoɔ yi anaa?

6 Woreka nso sɛ, gye sɛ yɛsakyerae anyɛ saa yɛbɛyera. Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wo hunuu yɛn adwene ne yɛn akoma mu nsusuɛ? Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wohunuu sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ yɛsakyera? Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wohunuu sɛ yɛnnyɛ ateneneefoɔ? Hwɛ, yɛasisi kronkronbea, na yɛka yɛn ho bɔ mu hyia mu som Onyankopɔn. Yɛgyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛgye nnipa nyina ara nkwa.

7 Afei Aaron see no sɛ: Wo gyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn Ba no bɛba abɛdi ama adasamma wɔ wɔn bɔne ho anaa?

8 Na ɔbarima no see no sɛ: Yɛnnye nni sɛ wonim adeɛ a ɛte sei. Yɛnnye saa nkwasea amamerɛ yi nni. Yɛnnye nni sɛ wonim nneɛma a ɛbɛba, ɛna yɛnnye nni nso sɛ mo agyanom ne yɛn agyanom nso nim biribi a ɛfa nneɛma a wɔkaa sɛ ɛbɛba no ho nsɛm.

9 Afei Aaron hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrebuebue twerɛsɛm no ani so akyerɛ wɔn, wɔ nneɛma a ɛfa Kristo mmaeɛ ho, ne deɛ ɛfa awufoɔ wusɔreɛ nso ho, na biribiara nni hɔ a ɛbɛtumi adi ama adasamma gye sɛ ɛnam Kristo wuo, n’amanehunu, ne ne mogya mpata so.

10 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ saa nneɛma yi mu akyerɛ wɔn no, wɔn bo fuu no; na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔregoro ne ho; na wɔantie nsɛm a na ɔreka no.

11 Ɛno nti, mmerɛ a ɔhunuu sɛ wɔrentie ne nsɛm no, ɔfirii wɔn hyiadan no mu, na ɔbaa akuraa bi wɔfrɛ hɔ Ani-Anti, na ɛhɔ na ɔhunuu sɛ Muloki reka nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn; ne Ama ne ne nuanom nso. Na wɔne dodoɔ no ara peree so wɔ asɛm no ho.

12 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔhunuu sɛ nkurɔfoɔ no bɛyɛ wɔn akoma den, ɛno nti wɔfirii hɔ baa Midonae asaase so. Na ɔkaa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ dodoɔ no ara, na kakraabi na ɛgyee nsɛm a wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛe wɔn no diiɛ.

13 Nanso, wɔde Aaron ne ne nuanom no mu binom too efiase, na wɔn a wɔkaae no dwane firii Midonae asaase so kɔɔ amantam a atwa hɔ ahyia no.

14 Na wɔn a wɔde wɔn too afiase no hunuu amane bebree, na Lamonae ne Amon bɛgyee wɔn, na wɔmaa wɔn aduane dii na wɔfiraa wɔn ntama.

15 Na wɔsan kɔɔ bio sɛ wɔrekɔka nsɛmpa no, na saa na wɔde yii wɔn firii afiase sɛdeɛ ɛdi kan no; na yei maa wɔhunuu amane.

16 Na wɔkɔɔ baabiara a Awurade Honhom no de wɔn kɔɔɛ, maa wɔkɔkaa Onyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ Amalɛkaefoɔ hyiadan biara mu, anaa sɛ wɔ baabi a Lamanfoɔ hyia mu biara a wɔgye wɔn no.

17 Na ɛbaa sɛ Awurade hyɛɛ aseɛ hyiraa wɔn ara maa wɔmaa dodoɔ no ara bɛhunuu nokware no ho nimdeɛ; aane, wɔmaa dodoɔ no ara gyaee wɔn bɔne, ne wɔn agyanom amammerɛ a na ɛnnyɛ nokware no mu.

18 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon ne Lamonae sann wɔn akyiri firii Midonae asaase so baa Ismael asaase so, deɛ ɛyɛ wɔn ankasa agyapadeɛ asaase no.

19 Na ɔhene Lamonae amma kwan sɛ Amon nsom no, anaa sɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne somfoɔ.

20 Mmom ɔmaa wɔsisii nhyiadan wɔ Ismael asaase so; na ɔmaa ne nkurɔfoɔ, anaasɛ wɔn a ɔdi wɔn so no boaboaa wɔn ano hyiaa mu.

21 Na wɔn nti ɔdii ahurisie, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nneɛma bebree. Na ɔsan nso kakyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔhyɛ n’ase na wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔde wɔn fawohodie ama wɔn, na wɔayi wɔn afiri n’agya a ɔyɛ ɔhene no nhyɛ ase; ɛfiri sɛ n’agya ama no kwan sɛ ɔni hene wɔ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Ismael asaase ne asaase a atwa ho ahyia no nyina ara so.

22 Na ɔsan nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔwɔ fawohodie sɛ wɔsom Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ wɔn pɛ so, wɔ baabiara a wɔwɔ, sɛ ɛyɛ nsaase a ɛhyɛ ɔhene Lamonae ahennie ase mpo.

23 Na Amon kaa nsɛmpa no kyerɛɛ ɔhene Lamonae nkurɔfoɔ no; na ɛbaa sɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn nneɛma a ɛfa tenenee ho nyina ara. Na ɔtuu wɔn fo aniberɛso da biara; na wɔtiee n’asɛm, na wɔpenee so sɛ wɔbɛdi Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm so.
alma 22:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Aaron kyerɛ Lamonae agya deɛ ɛfa Abɔdeɛ ho, Adam ahweaseɛ ne dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛnam Kristo mu no ho asɛm—Ɔhene no ne ne fiefoɔ nyina ara nya adwene sakyera—Wɔkyerɛ sedeɛ wosi kyɛ asaase no mu ma Nifaefoɔ ne Lamanfoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei, mmerɛ a Amon gu so rekyerɛkyerɛ Lamonae nkurɔfoɔ no mmerɛ nyina ara no, yɛbɛsan yɛn akyiri akɔtoa Aaron ne ne nuanom no ho nsɛm no so; na mmerɛ a ɔfirii Midonae asaase so no, Honhom no de no kɔɔ Nifae asaase so, de no kɔɔ ɔhene no a ɔhwɛ asaase a ɛwɔ hɔ nyina ara so no fie gye Ismael asaase no, na ɔne Lamonae agya.

2 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔne ne nuanom kɔɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn wɔ n’ahemfie hɔ, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase wɔ ɔhene no anim na ɔsee no sɛ: Hwɛ, O ɔhene, yɛyɛ Amon nuanom no a woyii yɛn firii afiase no.

3 Na afei O ɔhene, sɛ wo de yɛn nkwa kyɛ yɛn a yɛbɛyɛ wo asomfoɔ. Na ɔhene no see wɔn sɛ: Monsɔre na mede mo nkwa bɛkyɛ mo, na meremma kwan sɛ monyɛ me somfoɔ; mmom mɛhwɛ sɛ mo bɛyɛ m’apɛdeɛ ama me; ɛfiri sɛ mo nua barima Amon ayamuyɛ ne ne nsɛm akɛseɛ no ama m’adwene aha me, na mepɛ sɛ mehunu deɛ nti a ɔne mo amfiri Midonae amma ha.

4 Na Aaron see ɔhene no sɛ: Hwɛ, Awurade Honhom no afrɛ no wɔ baabi foforɔ, ɔkɔ Ismael asaase so rekɔkyerɛkyerɛ Lamonae nkurɔfoɔ no.

5 Afei ɔhene no see wɔn sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ne saa Awurade Honhom yi a moaka ho asɛm yi? Monhwɛ, yei ne adeɛ a ɛha me no.

6 Na ɛdeɛn nso ne asɛm a Amon aka yi—Sɛ wo bɛsakyera w’adwene a, wobɛnya nkwagyeɛ, na sɛ wansakyeraɛ w’adwene a wɔbɛtwa wo atwene ɛda a ɛdi akyire no.

7 Na Aaron buaa no see no sɛ: Wogyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ anaa? Na ɔhene no kaa sɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ no ka sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, na mama wɔn kwan sɛ wɔnsisi kronkronbea, ama wɔaboa wɔn ano ahyia mu asom no. Na afei woreka sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ a, hwɛ mɛgye adi.

8 Na afei mmerɛ a Aaron tee saa asɛm yi no, n’akoma hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɛredi dɛ na ɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ; mesi so dua sɛ mmerɛ a wote ase yi deɛ, O ɔhene, Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.

9 Na ɔhene no kaa sɛ: Onyankopɔn ne saa Honhom Kɛseɛ no a ɔde yɛ agyanom firii Yerusalem asaase so baae no anaa?

10 Na Aaron see no sɛ: Aane, ɔne saa Honhom Kɛseɛ no, na ɔno na ɔbɔɔ nneɛma a ɛwɔ ɔsoro ne asaase so nyina ara. Wogye yei di anaa?

11 Na ɔkaa sɛ: Aane, megye di sɛ Honhom Kɛseɛ no na ɔbɔɔ nneɛma nyina ara, na mepɛ sɛ woka saa nneɛma yi ho nsɛm kyerɛ me, na ama magye wo nsɛm adi.

12 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Aaron hunuu sɛ ɔhene no bɛgye ne nsɛm adi no, ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kenkann twerɛsɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔhene no fiti mmerɛ a wɔbɔɔ Adam—sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa tesɛ ne sɛso, na Onyankopɔn maa no mmaransɛm, na ɛnam mmaratoɔ nti adasamma hwee ase.

13 Na Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ no twerɛsɛm no mu fiti mmerɛ a ɔbɔɔ Adam, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ no adasamma ahweaseɛ, ne wɔn honam tebea mu ne dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ no nso mu, deɛ wɔsiesiee too ho fiti wiase ahyɛaseɛ wɔ Kristo mu, ama obiara a ɔbɛgye ne din adi.

14 Na ɛnam sɛ adasamma ahwe ase nti, ɔno ara ntumi nnyɛ biribiara ɛsɔ ani mma ɔno ara ankasa ne ho; mmom Kristo amanehunu ne ne wuo no yɛ mpata ma wɔn bɔne, ɛnam gyedie ne nsakyeraɛ, ne deɛ ɛkeka ho biara mu; na ɔbubu owuo mpokyerɛ mu, na wumena nnya nkonimdie biara, na ama animuonyam mu anidasoɔ amene owuo ano borɔ; na Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ saa nneɛma yi nyina ara mu kyerɛɛ ɔhene no.

15 Na ɛbaa sɛ Aaron kyerɛkyerɛɛ saa nneɛma yi mu kyerɛɛ no wieeɛ no, ɔhene no kaa sɛ: ɛdeɛn na menyɛ a mɛnya saa nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ yi a waka ho asɛm yi? Aane, ɛdeɛn na mɛyɛ ama Onyankopɔn awo me, na watutu saa atirimuɔden honhom a agye nhini wɔ me bo so yi, na manya ne honhom, ama ɛdɛ ahyɛ me ma, ama wantwa me antwenee wɔ ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu? Hwɛ, ɔse, mɛgyae m’ahodeɛ nyina ara mu, aane, mede m’ahennie bɛto hɔ, ama manya saa ɛdɛ kɛseɛ yi.

16 Mmom Aaron see no sɛ: Sɛ wopɛ saa adeɛ yi a, na sɛ wobɛbɔ wo mu ase wɔ Onyankopɔn anim a, aane, sɛ wo bɛsakyera afiri wo bɔne nyina ara ho, na wabɔ wo mu ase wɔ Nyankopɔn anim, na wabɔ ne din wɔ gyedie mu, na wagye adi sɛ wo nsa bɛka a, ɛnneɛ wo nsa bɛka anidasoɔ no a worehwehwɛ no.

17 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Aaron kaa saa nsɛm yi no, ɔhene no bɔɔ ne mu ase wɔ Awurade anim, wɔ ne nkotodwe anim; aane, ɔdaa fam mpo, na ɔsuui dendennden kaa sɛ:

18 O Onyankopɔn, Aaron aka akyerɛ me sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ; na sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ deɛ a, na sɛ wo ne Nyankopɔn no a, yi wo ho adi kyerɛ me, ɛnneɛ na mɛpo me bɔne nyina ara ama mahunu wo, ama wanyane me afiri owuo mu, na wagye me nkwa nna a ɛdi akyire no. Na afei mmerɛ a ɔhene no kaa saa nsɛm yi no, ɔhwee hɔ sɛdeɛ wawuo no.

19 Na ɛbaa sɛ n’asomfoɔ no tuu mmirika kɔkaa deɛ ato ɔhene no nyina ara kyerɛɛ ɔhemaa no. Na ɔbaa ɔhene no hɔ; na mmerɛ a ɔhunuu no sɛ ɔda hɔ sɛdeɛ wawuo no, na Aaron nso ne ɔnuanom gyina hɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn na wɔayɛ ama wahwe ase no, ne bo fuu wɔn, na ɔhyɛɛ n’asomfoɔ anaa sɛ ɔhene n’asomfoɔ no sɛ wɔmfa wɔn nkɔ kum wɔn.

20 Afei na asomfoɔ no ahunu deɛ ɛmaa ɔhene no hwee ase no, ɛno nti wɔampɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa bɛka Aaron ne ne nuanom no; na wɔsrɛɛ ɔhemaa no sɛ: ɛdeɛn nti na wɔahyɛ yɛn sɛ yɛn nkum saa mmarima yi, na hwɛ wɔn mu baako mpo ne branee nkyɛn yɛn nyina ara? Ɛno nti yɛbɛtotɔ wɔ wɔn anim.

21 Afei mmerɛ a ɔhemaa no hunuu sɛ asomfoɔ no suro no, ɛhuu kɛseɛ hyɛɛ aseɛ kaa ɔno nso, anyɛ a mmusuo bi aba ne so. Na ɔhyɛɛ n’asomfoɔ no sɛ wɔnkɔ nkɔfrɛ nkurɔfoɔ mmra ama wɔatumi akum Aaron ne ɔnuanom.

22 Afei mmerɛ a Aaron hunuu sɛ ɔhemaa no awe ataa so no, na ɔno nso nim nkurɔfoɔ no akoma den no, ɔsurooe sɛ anhwɛ a nkurɔfokuo no bɛboa wɔn ano aba, ama apereapereɛ ne basabasayɛ aba wɔn mu; ɛno nti ɔtenee ne nsa wɔ ɔhene no so maa no so firii fam hɔ, na ɔsee no sɛ: Sɔre. Na ɔgyinae ne nan so, na ɔnyaa ahoɔden.

23 Afei ɔyɛe saa adeɛ yi wɔ ɔhemaa no ne asomfoɔ no mu bebree anim. Na mmerɛ a wɔhunuu saa no, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn yie, na ɛhuu hyɛɛ aseɛ kaa wɔn. Na ɔhene no sɔre gyinaa hɔ, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn. Na ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn ara maa ne fiefoɔ nyina ara sakyera baa Awurade hɔ.

24 Afei na nkurɔfokuo aboa wɔn ano wɔ hɔ ɛnam ɔhemaa no mmara no nti, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ nwiinwii keseɛ ara yie wɔ wɔn mu ɛnam Aaron ne ne nuanom nti.

25 Na mmom ɔhene no sɔre gyinaa wɔn mu na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn. Na wɔnyaa abodwoɛ maa Aaron ne wɔn a wɔka neho no ho.

26 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a ɔhene no hunuu sɛ nkurɔfoɔ no bo adwoɔ no, ɔsee Aaron ne ne nuanom no sɛ wɔn mmra mmɛgyina nkurɔfokuo no mfimfini na wɔnka nsɛm no nkyerɛ wɔn.

27 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene no soma maa wɔbɔɔ dawuro wɔ asaase no so nyina ara, wɔne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ n’asaase no so nyina ara a atwa wɔn ho ahyia nyina ara mu, apueɛ ne atɔeɛ afa mu deɛ ɛkyɛ Sarahɛmla asaase mu a ɛyɛ ɛserɛ teaa a ɛtrɛ fiti ɛserɛ no apueɛ mpo de rekɔ ɛpo no atɔeɛ afa mu, ne mpoano hyeɛso hɔ, ne ɛserɛ a ɛda Sarahɛmla asaase no atifii afa mu de fa Mantae hyeɛ so wɔ asubɔntene Sidon tiri, fiti apueɛ tene kɔ atɔɛ—na sei na ɔde kyɛɛ Lamanfoɔ ne Nifaefoɔ mu mmienu.

28 Afei Lamanfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no a wɔyɛ anihafoɔ no tenaa ɛserɛ no so, na wɔte ntomadan mu; na wɔabɔ apete wɔ ɛserɛ no atɔeɛ hɔ, wɔ Nifae asaase so; aane, ne Sarahɛmla asaase no atɔeɛ hɔ nso, wɔ mpoano hyeɛso hɔ, ne Nifae asaase no atɔɛ afa mu hɔ, wɔ baabi a ahyɛaseɛ no na ɛyɛ wɔn agyanom agyapadeɛ asaase a ɛdi kan no, na yei ne ɛhyeɛ a ɛda mpoano hɔ.

29 Na Lamanfoɔ dodoɔ no ara nso wɔ mpoano apueɛ afa mu hɔ, baabi a Nifaefoɔ pamoo wɔn no. Na yei na ɛmaa ɛkaa kakra ara bi na anka Lamanfoɔ no atwa Nifaefoɔ no ho ahyia; nanso Nifaefoɔ no afa nsaase a ɛwɔ atifi afa mu hɔ a atwa ɛserɛ no ho ahyia nyina ara, wɔ asubɔntene Sidom atifi afa mu, fiti apueɛ de kɔpem atɔeɛ, de twa ɛserɛ no afa mu hɔ ahyia, fiti atifi, mpo debɛsi asaase a wɔfrɛ hɔ Dodoɔ no so.

30 Na ɛda asaase a wɔfrɛ no Amanfo no hyeɛ so, ɛda atifi afa mu yie ara maa mpo ɛba asaase a anka nnipa bebree wɔ so na wɔasɛe wɔn no a yɛaka wɔn nnompe ho asɛm dada no, deɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔfiri Sarahɛmla kɔpuee hɔ no, baabi a wɔdii kan soeɛ no.

31 Na wɔfirii hɔ baa ɛserɛ no anaafoɔ afa mu hɔ. Ɛno na ɛmaa wɔfrɛɛ asaase a ɛda atifi afa mu hɔ no Amanfo no, na asaase a ɛda anaafoɔ hɔ no wɔfrɛɛ no Dodoɔ, na ɛhɔ yɛ ɛserɛ a ɛwura mu mmoa akɛseɛ a wɔyɛ kekakeka ahodoɔ nyina ara wɔ, wɔn mu bi firi asaase a ɛde rekɔ atifi afa mu hɔ bɛhwehwɛ aduane.

32 Na afei Nifaeni de da koro ne ɛfa pɛ na ɛtu kwan fiti Dodoɔ hɔ akɔ Amanfo so hɔ, fiti apueɛ de kɔ ɛpo a ɛwɔ atɔeɛ hɔ; na aka kakra ara bi ama nsuo atwa Nifaefoɔ asaase ne Sarahɛmla asaase so ahyia, ɛhɔ na asaase ketewa bi da asaase a ɛwɔ atifi ne asaase a ɛwɔ anaafoɔ nta mu.

33 Na ɛbaa sɛ Nifaefoɔ no kɔtenaa Dodoɔ asaase no so, mpo fiti apuɛ de kɔsi ɛpo no atɔeɛ afa mu, na sei na Nifaefoɔ no firi wɔn nyansa mu, ne wɔn awɛnfoɔ ne wɔn asraafoɔ mu, sii Lamanfoɔ no kwan wɔ anaafoɔ afa mu hɔ ama yei amma wɔn nsa anka asaase a ɛda atifi afa mu ama wɔantrɛ ankɔ atifi afa mu hɔ.

34 Ɛno nti Lamanfoɔ no nsa ntumi nka asaase biara bio gye sɛ Nifae asaase no so, ne ɛserɛ a atwa ho ahyia no. Afei yei ne Nifaefoɔ nyansa, ɛfiri sɛ na Lamanfoɔ no yɛ wɔn atamfo, wɔrenhwɛ mma wɔn nnhunu amane wɔ kwan biara so, na afei nso ama wɔn anya ɔman a wɔbɛdwane akɔ so, sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ.

35 Na afei me, maka sei awie no, mɛsane akɔ Amon ne Aaron, Omna ne Himnae, ne wɔn nuanom asɛmpatrɛ no ho nsɛm so bio.
alma 23:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Wɔbɔ som ho fawohodie dawuro—Lamanfoɔ a wɔwɔ nsaase ne nkuropɔn nson mu sakyera—Wɔfrɛ wɔn ho Anti-Nifae-Lihaefoɔ na wɔyi wɔn firi nomee no mu—Amalɛkaefoɔ ne Amulɔnfoɔ po nokware no. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɛbaa sɛ Lamanfoɔ hene no maa wɔbɔɔ dawuro wɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ nyina ara mu, sɛ ɛmma wɔmfa wɔn nsa nka Amon, anaa Aaron, anaa Omna, anaa Himnae, anaa wɔn nuanom no a wɔbɛkɔ akɔka Onyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ baabiara a wɔbɛkɔ biara, wɔ asaase no afa mu baabiara.

2 Aane, ɔhyɛɛ mmara maa wɔn, sɛ mma wɔmfa wɔn nsa nka wɔn nnkyekyere wɔn, anaa mma wɔmfa wɔn ngu afiase; anaa wɔnto ntasuo ngu wɔn so, anaa wɔmmo wɔn, anaa wɔmpamo wɔn mfiri wɔn nhyiadan mu, anaa wɔntwa wɔn mpiren; na wɔnsi wɔn aboɔ nso, na mmom wɔmma wɔn kwan ma wɔmera wɔn afiefie, ne wɔn tɛmpol no nso mu, ne wɔn kronkronbea mu.

3 Na yei bɛma wɔatumi akɔ baabiara a wɔpɛ akɔka asɛm no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhene no asakyera aba Awurade hɔ, ne ne fiefoɔ nyina ara; ɛno nti ɔmaa wɔbɔɔ dawuro wɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ no mu wɔ asaase no so nyina ara, ama biribiara ansi Nyankopɔn asɛm no kwan, na mmom akɔ asaase no so nyina ara, ama ne nkurɔfoɔ no atumi ahunu deɛ ɛfa wɔn agyanom atirimuɔden amammerɛ no, na ama wɔn ahunu sɛ wɔn nyina ara yɛ anuanom, na ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔdi awu anaa wɔfom adeɛ anaa wɔbɔ korɔnoo, anaa wɔbɔ adwamman, anaa wɔyɛ atirimuɔdensɛm biara.

4 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a ɔhene no maa wɔbɔɔ saa dawuro no, Aaron ne ne nuanom asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no firii kuropɔn koro so kɔ kuropɔn koro so, firii asɔrefie koro mu kɔ koro mu, tetee nsɔre, na wɔsii asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ wɔ Lamanfoɔ no mu wɔ asaase no so nyina ara, sɛ wɔnka nyamesɛm na wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ wɔn mu; na sei na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔredi nkonim.

5 Na wɔtwee mpempem maa wɔbɛhunuu Awurade ho nimdeɛ, aane, wɔmaa mpempem bɛgyee Nifaefoɔ amammerɛ no diiɛ, na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn twerɛtohɔsɛm ne mkɔmhyɛ a wɔde gyaa wɔn firi tete de bɛsi saa mmerɛ no mu.

6 Na sɛ ɛyɛ nokware sɛ Awurade te ase yi saa ara nso na ɛyɛ nokware sɛ dodoɔ no ara a wɔgyee diiɛ no, anaa sɛ dodoɔ ara a wɔnam Amon ne ne nuanom asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no nsɛmpa a wɔreka no so nyaa nokware no ho nimdeɛ, sɛdeɛ yikyerɛ honhom ne nkɔmhyɛ, ne Onyankopɔn tumi a ɛreyɛ nkɔnyaa wɔ wɔn mu teɛ no—aane, Mese mo sɛ, sɛ Awurade te ase yi, Lamanfoɔ dodoɔ ara a wɔgyee wɔn nsɛm no diiɛ no na wɔsakyeraae baa Awurade hɔ na wanyae ara da.

7 Na wɔbɛyɛɛ ateneneefoɔ; na wɔde wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde tee atua no guu fam, sɛ wɔrenko ntia Onyankopɔn anaa wɔn nuanom no mu biara bio.

8 Afei yeinom ne wɔn a wɔsakyeraae baa Awurade hɔ.

9 Lamanfoɔ nkurɔfoɔ no a na wɔwɔ Ismael asaase so no;

10 Na afei nso Lamanfoɔ nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Midonae asaase so no;

11 Na afei nso Lamanfoɔ nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Nifae kuropɔn no mu no;

12 Na afei nso Lamanfoɔ nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Silom asaase so, ne wɔn a na wɔwɔ Semlon asaase so, ne Lemuel, kuropɔn no mu, ne Simnilom kuropɔn no mu.

13 Na yeinom ne Lamanfoɔ no a wɔsakyeraae na wɔbaa Awurade hɔ no ne wɔn nkuropɔn din; na yeinom ne wɔn a wɔde wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde tee atua guu fam, aane, wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde kɔ ako; na wɔn nyina ara yɛ Lamanfoɔ.

14 Na Amalɛkaefoɔ no ansakyera, gye sɛ nnipa baako pɛ; ɛna Amulɔnfoɔ no mu biara nso ansakyeraɛ; na mmom wɔyɛɛ wɔn akoma den, na Lamanfoɔ no nso a wɔte asaase no baabi a wɔte no nso pirimm wɔn akoma, aane, ne wɔn nkuraase nyina ara ne wɔn nkuropɔn nyina ara mu.

15 Ɛno nti yɛabobɔ Lamanfoɔ nkuropɔn a wɔsakyeraaeɛ na wɔbɛhunuu nokware nimdeɛ no, na wɔasesaae no nyina ara din.

16 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene no ne wɔn a wɔasesa no pɛɛ sɛ wɔnya din, ama nsonsonoɛ aba wɔne wɔn nuanom ntam; ɛno nti ɔhene no ne Aaron ne wɔn asɔfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no kaa wɔn tiri bɔɔ mu dwendwenee ɛdin a wɔmfa nto wɔn so, ama wɔabɛyɛ soronko.

17 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔfrɛɛ wɔn din Anti-Nifae-Lihaefoɔ; na saa din yi na wɔde frɛɛ wɔn na wɔamfrɛ wɔn Lamanfoɔ bio.

18 Na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔpɛ adwumaden, aane, na wɔne Nifaefoɔ no bɛnyaa ayɔnkofa; ɛno nti, wɔne wɔn dii nkutaho, na Onyankopɔn nomee no anni wɔn akyiri bio.
alma 24:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfoɔ no ba Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ so—Anti-Nifae-Lihaefoɔ no di dɛ wɔ Kristo mu na abɔfoɔ bɛsera wɔn. Wɔpɛ sɛ wɔwu kyɛn sɛ wɔbɛko agye wɔn ho—Lamanfoɔ no mu bebree sesaae. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ ne Amulɔnfoɔ ne Lamanfoɔ a na wɔwɔ Amulɔn asaase so, ne Helam asaase so nso no, ne wɔn a na wɔwɔ Yerusalem asaase so no, na ne tiatwa mu ne sɛ, nsaase a atwa ho ahyia no nyina ara a wɔnyaa nsesaɛ no na wɔamfa Anti-Nifae-Lihae din anto wɔn so no, Amalɛkaefoɔ ne Amulɔnfoɔ kanyan wɔn maa wɔn bo fuu wɔn nuanom.

2 Na ɛtan a wɔtan wɔn no yɛɛ kɛseɛ mmorosoɔ, mpo maa wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ tee wɔn hene no so atua, maa wɔampɛ sɛ ɔbɛdi wɔn so hene, ɛno nti, wɔfaa wɔn akodeɛ kɔɔ Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no so.

3 Afei ɔhene no de ahennie no maa ne babarima, na ɔfrɛɛ no Anti-Nifae-Lihae.

4 Na ɔhene no wuii wɔ saa afe no a Lamanfoɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreboaboa wɔn ho ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ abɛko no mu.

5 Afei mmerɛ a Amon ne ne nuanom ne wɔn a wɔne wɔn baaɛ no hunuu sɛ Lamanfoɔ no reboaboa wɔn ho de akɔsɛe wɔn nuanom no, wɔbaa Midian asaase so na Amon hyiaa ne nuanom nyina ara; na wɔfiri hɔ no, wɔbaa Ismael asaase so sɛ wɔne Lamonae ne ne nua barima Anti-Nifae-Lihae nso rebɛtu agyina na wɔadwendwene adeɛ a wɔbɛyɛ de abɔ wɔn ho ban wɔ Lamanfoɔ no ho.

6 Na na ɔkra baako mpo nni nkurɔfoɔ a na wɔasesa aba Awurade hɔ no mu nyina ara mu no ampɛ sɛ ɔbɛfa akodeɛ na ɔne ne nuanom akɔko; daabi, wɔampɛ mpo sɛ wɔbɛyɛ ahoboa biara de akɔko; aane, na wɔn hene nso hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ mma wɔnnyɛ.

7 Na, yei ne nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkurɔfoɔ no a ɛfa asɛm yi ho: Meda me Nyankopɔn ase, me nkurɔfoɔ adɔfoɔ, sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn kokoroko nam n’adɔyɛ so asoma yɛn nuanom Nifaefoɔ yi ama wɔaba yɛn nkyɛn sɛ wɔmmɛka nsɛmpa no nkyerɛ yɛn ama yɛahunu yɛn agyanom atirimuɔden amammerɛ no.

8 Na hwɛ, meda me Nyankopɔn kokoroko no ase sɛ wama yɛn ne honhom no kakra ama ayɛ yɛn akoma mmerɛ, ama yɛne yɛn nuanom Nifaefoɔ yi ahyɛ aseɛ redi nkutaho.

9 Na hwɛ, me nso meda me Nyankopɔn ase sɛ wabue saa nkutahodie kwan yi ato hɔ na yɛahunu yɛn bɔne ne awudie bebree a yɛadi.

10 Na meda me Nyankopɔn ase bio, aane, me Nyankopɔn kokoroko no, sɛ wama yɛasakyera wɔ saa nneɛma yi ho, na ebio nso sɛ ɔde yɛn bɔne bebree yi ne awudie a yɛadi akyɛ yɛn, na ɔnam ne Ba no ahoteɛ so ayi yɛn afɔdie afiri yɛn akoma mu.

11 Na afei monhwɛ, me nuanom, akɔyɛ sɛdeɛ yɛbɛtumi ayɛ nyina ara ne sɛ (ɛfiri sɛ na yɛn na adasamma mu no, yɛayera paa) yɛbɛsakyera wɔ yɛn bɔne nyina ara ho ne awudie bebree a yɛadi ho, na yɛama Onyankopɔn ayi afiri yɛn akoma mu, ɛfiri sɛ yei ara na yɛbɛtumi ayɛ de asakyera yie wɔ Onyankopɔn anim ama no ayi yɛn ho nkekaawa afiri hɔ—

12 Afei me nuanom adɔfoɔ pa, ɛnam sɛ Onyankopɔn ayi yɛn nkekaawa afiri hɔ yi, na yɛn akofena ho ate yi, ɛnneɛ momma yɛmfa yɛn nuanom mogya nkeka yɛn akofena ho bio.

13 Hwɛ mese mo sɛ, Daabi, moma yɛmfa yɛn akofena nsie amma yɛn nuanom mogya ankeka so; ɛfiri sɛ ɛbia na sɛ yɛma nkekaawa ba yɛn akofena no so bio a, ɛrentumi nhohoro mma ɛho nte bio wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn kokoroko no Ba no mogya a ɔbɛhwie agu de ayɛ mpata ama yɛn bɔne no.

14 Na Onyankopɔn kokoroko no ahunu yɛn mmɔbɔ, na wama yɛahunu saa nneɛma yi ama yɛanyera; aane, na wama yɛahunu saa nneɛma yi dada, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdɔ yɛn akra nso sɛdeɛ ɔde dɔ yɛn mma no; ɛno nti, ɔnam n’ahummɔborɔ so ama n’abɔfoɔ abɛsera yɛn, ama yɛahunu nkwagyeɛ ho nhyehyɛeɛ no na daakye nso yɛn abusuasantene ahunu.

15 O, yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ mmɔborɔhunufoɔ! Na afei monhwɛ, ɛnam sɛ yɛberɛɛ yie ansaa na yɛretumi ayi yɛn nkekaawa afiri yɛn ho no, na yɛn akofena so ate yi, momma yɛmfa nsie ama ɛho akɔ so ate ama adi adanseɛ akyerɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu, anaasɛ wɔ ɛda a wɔde yɛn bɛba abɛgyina n’anim ama wabu yɛn atɛn no, sɛ yɛamfa yɛn nuanom mogya ankeka yɛn akofena so fiti mmerɛ a ɔde n’asɛm no maa yɛn ma ɛnam so tee yɛn ho no.

16 Na afei, me nuanom, sɛ yɛn nuanom no rehwehwɛ sɛ wɔbɛsɛe yɛn a,monhwɛ, yɛde yɛn akofena bɛsie, aane, yɛbɛsie no wɔ ɛfam fee, ama ɛho adaso ate, ama adi adanseɛ sɛ yɛamfa anyɛ hwee da, wɔ ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu, na sɛ yɛn nuanom sɛe yɛn a, monhwɛ yɛbɛkɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na ɔbɛgye yɛn nkwa.

17 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a ɔhene no kaa nsɛm yi wieeɛ no, na nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara boaa wɔn ano no, wɔfaa wɔn akofena, ne wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde kaa nnipa mogya guiɛ no nyina ara, na wɔsiee no fam fee.

18 Na wɔyɛɛ yei, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔn adwene mu no na ɛyɛ adansedie ma Onyankopɔn, ne nnipa nso sɛ wɔremfa akodeɛ nka nnipa mogya nngu bio da; na wɔyɛɛ yei, de yɛɛ awerɛhyɛm ne apam kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn, sɛ mmom sɛ wɔbɛka wɔn yɔnko mogya agu deɛ a, ɛneɛ wɔbɛgyae wɔn ankasa wɔn nkwa mu; na sɛ wɔbɛgye afiri ɔnua bi nsam deɛ a, ɛneɛ anka wɔn ankasa de bɛma no; na sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wɔn nna wɔ aniha mu deɛ, wɔde wɔn nsa bɛyɛ adwuma mmorosoɔ.

19 Na yei ma yɛhunu sɛ, mmerɛ a Lamanfoɔ no gye diiɛ no na wɔhunuu nokware no, wɔgyinaa pintinn na wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛhunu amaneɛ de akɔ owuo mu mpo sene sɛ wɔbɛyɛ bɔne; na yɛhunuu sɛ wɔsiee wɔn asomdwoeɛ akodeɛ anaa sɛ wɔsiee wɔn akodeɛ, anaa sɛ wɔsiee wɔn akodeɛ de hwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ.

20 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn nuanom, Lamanfoɔ no boaboaa wɔn ho sɛ wɔrekɔko, na wɔbaa Nifae asaase so sɛ wɔrebɛsɛe ɔhene no, na wɔde foforɔ asi n’anan mu, na wɔasɛe Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no nso afiri asaase no so.

21 Afei mmerɛ a nkurɔfoɔ no hunuu sɛ wɔreba wɔn so no, wɔkɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔhyia wɔn kwan, na wɔdaa fam wɔ wɔn anim, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrebɔ Awurade din; na sei na na wɔdeda fam hɔ na Lamanfoɔ no baaɛ na wɔbɛto hyɛɛ wɔn so, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn akofena rekumkum wɔn.

22 Na sɛ wɔne wɔn ampere so no nti no, wɔkumm wɔn mu apem ne enum; na yɛnim sɛ wahyira wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔne wɔn Nyankopɔn akɔtena.

23 Afei mmerɛ a Lamanfoɔ no hunuu sɛ wɔn nuanom no nne mfiri wɔn akofena ano anaa sɛ wɔn nnane wɔn ho nkɔ wɔn nsa nifa anaasɛ wɔn bɛnkum so, na mmom wɔda fam hɔ kɔsii sɛ wɔbɛyera, na mmerɛ a wɔreyera wɔ akofena ano no mpo na wɔreyi Nyankopɔn ayɛ—

24 Afei mmerɛ a Lamanfoɔ no hunuu saa no wɔgyaee sɛ wɔrekumkum wɔn; na wɔn dodoɔ no ara na awerɛhoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn akoma mu ma wɔ wɔn nuanom a wɔatɔ wɔ akofena ano no, na wɔnyaa adwene sakyera wɔ nneɛma a wɔayɛ no ho.

25 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔtoo wɔn akodeɛ no guui, na wɔampɛ sɛ wɔbɛfa bio, ɛfiri sɛ na awerɛhoɔ aka wɔn wɔ awudie a wɔadi no ho; na wɔdaa fam mpo te sɛdeɛ wɔn nuanom no ayɛ no hwɛɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔamema wɔn nsa so de rekumkum wɔn no bɛnya ahummɔborɔ anaa.

26 Na ɛbaa sɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔbɛkaa Nyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ ho no dɔɔso kyɛn wɔn a wɔakum wɔn no; na wɔn a wɔakum wɔn no yɛ ateneneefoɔ, ɛno nti akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho, yɛnim sɛ wɔagye wɔn nkwa.

27 Na atirimuɔdenni biara nni wɔn a wɔkum wɔn no mu; mmom nnipa a wɔboro apem na wɔnyaa nokware no ho nimdeɛ; yei ma yɛhunu sɛ Awurade nam akwan bebree so ma ne nkurɔfoɔ nya nkwagyeɛ.

28 Afei Lamanfoɔ a wɔkumm wɔn nuanom no mu dodoɔ no ara yɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ ne Amulɔnfoɔ, na wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara na dɔm Nehor kuo no.

29 Afei wɔn a wɔbɛkaa Awurade nkurɔfoɔ no ho no mu biara nni hɔ a na ɔyɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ anaa Amulɔnfoɔ, anaa wɔka Nehɔ kuo no ho, mmom wɔn a wɔyɛ Laman ne Lemuel asefoɔ.

30 Na yei ma yɛhunu no pefee sɛ nkurɔfoɔ a Onyankopɔn Honhom ama wɔn adwene mu abue pɛn, na wɔanya nimdeɛ kɛseɛ wɔ nneɛma a ɛfa tenenee ho no, sɛ wɔhwe ase wɔ bɔne ne mmaratoɔ mu a; wɔn akoma yɛ den mmorosoɔ, na wɔn tebea bɛsɛe kyɛn sɛ anka wɔnnim saa nneɛma yi da koraa.
alma 25:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfoɔ atirimuɔdensɛm trɛ—Noa asefoɔ asɔfoɔ no yera sɛdeɛ Abinadae hyɛ ho nkɔm no—Lamanfoɔ bebree sakyera na wɔkɔka Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no ho—Wɔgye Kristo di na wɔdi Mose mmara so. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na hwɛ afei ɛbaa sɛ saa Lamanfoɔ no bo fuu mmorosoɔ ɛfiri sɛ wɔakumkum wɔn nuanom; ɛno nti wɔkaa ntam sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Nifaefoɔ no bi ahyɛ anan mu; na wɔankum Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no wɔ saa mmerɛ no mu bio.

2 Mmom wɔfaa wɔn asraafoɔ na wɔkɔɔ Sarahɛmla asaase no ahyeɛso, na wɔkɔɔ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ Amonaeha asaase so no so na wɔsɛee wɔn.

3 Na ɛno akyiri no, wɔne Nifaefoɔ no kɔɔ ako bebree, na ɛno mu na wɔpamoo wɔn na wɔkumm wɔn.

4 Na ɛreyɛ akɔyɛ sɛ Lamanfoɔ no a wɔkum wɔn no mu dodoɔ no ara yɛ Amulɔn ne ne nuanom asefoɔ, a wɔyɛ Noa asɔfoɔ, na wɔwuwuui wɔ Nifaefoɔ nsa ano.

5 Na nkaeɛ no dwane kɔɔ ɛserɛ no apueɛ fam, wɔn na wɔnyaa tumi ne akwanya wɔ Lamanfoɔ no so, na wɔmaa wɔde ogya hyee Lamanfoɔ no mu dodoɔ no ara ɛnam wɔn gyedie nti—

6 Na wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara hweree wɔn nkurɔfoɔ bebree na wɔhunu amane pii akyire no, wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrekanyan wɔn ama wɔakae nsɛm a Aaron ne ne nuanom kakyerɛɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn asaase no so no; ɛno nti wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrennye wɔn agyanom amammerɛ nni, na wɔbɛgye Awurade adi, na ɔno na ɔde tumi kɛseɛ maa Nifaefoɔ no; na yei maa wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara sakyeraae wɔ ɛserɛ no so.

7 Na ɛbaa sɛ ahwɛsofoɔ no a wɔyɛ Amulɔn mma no nkaaɛ no hyɛɛ mmara sɛ wɔnkum wɔn a wɔgye saa nneɛma yi di no nyina ara.

8 Afei saa mogyadansesɛm yi maa wɔn nuanom no mu dodoɔ no ara bo fuuɛ; na apereapereɛ hyɛɛ aseɛ wɔ ɛserɛ no so; na Lamanfoɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrehwehwɛ Amulɔn ne ne nuanom asefoɔ no akyiri kwan, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔrekumkum wɔn; na wɔdwane kɔɔ ɛserɛ no apueɛ.

9 Na hwɛ Lamanfoɔ no gu so rehwehwɛ wɔn de bɛsi nnɛda yi. Yei ama Abinadae nsɛm no aba mu, deɛ ɔkaaɛ a ɛfa asɔfoɔ no a wɔmaa wɔde ogya hyee no ne wɔn asefoɔ ho no.

10 Ɛfiri sɛ ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Deɛ mo de bɛyɛ me yi bɛyɛ nneɛma bi a ɛbɛsi dabi.

11 Na afei Abinadae ne deɛ ɔdii kan a wɔde egya hyee no ɛnam ne gyedie a ɛwɔ Nyankopɔn mu nti; afei yei ne deɛ na ɔrekyerɛ, sɛ dodoɔ no ara na wɔde egya bɛhye wɔn akum wɔn, te sɛdeɛ wɔde yɛɛ no no.

12 Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Noa asɔfoɔ no asefoɔ no sɛ wɔn asefoɔ no bɛma wɔakumkum nnipa bebree, sɛdeɛ wɔdeyɛɛ no no, na ama wɔabɔ wɔn apete amannɔne na wɔakumkum wɔn, te sɛ nnwan a wɔnni hwɛfoɔ a mmoa akɛseɛ repamo wɔn na wɔrekumkum wɔn mpo; na afei hwɛ, saa nsɛm yi aba mu pefee, ɛfiri sɛ Lamanfoɔ no apamo wɔn ahwehwɛ wɔn na wɔakum wɔn.

13 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Lamanfoɔ no hunuu sɛ wɔrentumi nni Nifaefoɔ so nkonim no, wɔsan wɔn akyi baa wɔn ara ankasa asaase so bio; na wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara bɛtenaa Ismael asaase ne Nifae asaase so, na wɔde wɔn ho kɔbɔɔ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no ho.

14 Na wɔn nso siee wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde kɔ ako sɛdeɛ wɔn nuanom no yɛɛe no, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreyɛ ateneneefoɔ; na wɔnantee Awurade akwan so, na ɔhwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛdi ne mmaransɛm ne ne nhyehyɛeɛ so.

15 Aane, na wɔdii Mose mmara so; na na ɛhohia sɛ wɔdi Mose mmara so saa mmerɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ nnyɛ ne nyina ara na ɛbaa mu. Nanso Mose mmara no nyina ara akyiri no, wɔhwɛɛ Kristo mmaeɛ no nso kwan, wɔfaa no sɛ Mose mmara no yɛ ne mmaeɛ no ho bi, na wɔgye dii sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔdi saa adeyɛ no a ɛda adi wɔ abɔntene no so kɔpem mmerɛ a wɔbɛda no adi akyerɛ wɔn.

16 Afei wɔansusu sɛ nkwagyeɛ nam Mose mmara so na ɛbaaeɛ; mmom Mose mmara no na ɛhyɛ wɔn gyedie den wɔ Kristo mu; na yei maa wɔnam gyedie so nyaa anidasoɔ, de kɔɔ nkwagyeɛ a ɛnniawieɛ mu, wɔde wɔnho tweree honhom nkɔmhyɛ a ɛkaa nneɛma a ɛbɛba ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no.

17 Na afei hwɛ, Amon, ne Aaron, ne Omna, ne Himnae, ne wɔn nuanom anigyeɛ mmorosoɔ; ɛnam nkonim a wɔnyaa wɔ Lamanfoɔ no mu nti, na wɔhunuu sɛ Awurade ayɛ deɛ wɔbɔɔ ho mpaeɛ no ama wɔn, na wada n’asɛm nso adi wɔ wɔn mu wɔ akwan nyina ara mu.
alma 26:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Amon kamfo ne ho wɔ Awurade mu—Awurade hyɛ wɔn a wɔdi nokware no den na ɔma wɔn nimdeɛ—Nnipa bɛtumi afa gyedie so de akra mpempem aba nsakyeraɛ mu—Nyankopɔn wɔ tumi nyina ara na ɔte nneɛma nyina ara ase. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na afei yei ne nsɛm a Amon ka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom, ɛka sɛ: Me nuammarima ne me nuanom asɛmpatrɛfoɔ,monhwɛ mese mo sɛ, adɛn nti na ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛn anigye; na anka yɛbɛsusu sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛma yɛn nhyira kɛseɛ a ɛte sei wɔ mmerɛ a yɛsii mu firii Sarahɛmla asaase so no anaa?

2 Na afei, mebisa, ɛdeɛn nhyira kɛseɛ na ɔanhwie nguu yɛn so? Mobɛtumi aka?

3 Hwɛ, mereyi ano ama mo; ɛnam sɛ na yɛn nuanom Lamanfoɔ no wɔ ɛsum mu, aane, na wɔwɔ ɛsum kabii mu mpo, nanso hwɛ, wɔn mu dodoɔ sɛn na wɔabɛhunu Onyankopɔn hann a ɛyɛ nnwanwa no! Na yei ne nhyira a Onyankopɔn ahwie agu yɛn so, ama yɛayɛ adwendideɛ wɔ ne nsam ama ɔde yɛn adi dwuma kɛseɛ yi.

4 Hwɛ, wɔn mu mpempem redi ahurisie, na wɔde wɔn aba Onyankopɔn nkuo no mu.

5 Hwɛ, nnɔbaɛ no abere, na nhyira ne mo, ɛfiri sɛ motoo kantankrankyi, na mode mo ahoɔden twitwaae, aane, moayɛ adwuma ɛda mu no nyina ara; na monhwɛ mo afiafi dodoɔ! Na wɔbɛboaboa ano de akɔgu pata so, ama ansɛe.

6 Aane, ahum remmɔ wɔn nhwe fam ɛda a ɛdi akyire no; aane, ɛna kyinhyia mframa renhu wɔn nkɔ soro; na mmom sɛ ahum bɔ a, wɔbɛboa wɔn ano abɔ mu wɔ wɔn baabi, ama ahum no antumi anwura wɔn mu; aane, ɛna mframa denden nso rentumi nhu wɔn nkɔ baabi ara a atamfo no pɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn kɔ.

7 Mmom hwɛ, wɔwɔ Awurade a ɔyɛ ɔtwafoɔ no nsam, na wɔyɛ ne deɛ; na ɔbɛma wɔn so ɛda ɛdi akyire no.

8 Nhyira nka yɛn Nyankopɔn din; momma yɛnto dwom nyi n’ayɛ, aane, moma yɛmfa naaseɛ mma ne din kronkron no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ deɛ ɛtene afebɔɔ.

9 Na sɛ yɛamfiri Sarahɛmla asaase so amma a anka yɛn nuanom adɔfo yi a wɔdɔ yɛn soronko yi, bɛda so de yɛn ho tan ahyɛ wɔn mu, aane, na anka wɔbɛda so nso ayɛ ahɔhoɔ ama Onyankopɔn.

10 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon kaa saa nsɛm yi no, ne nuabarima Aaron kaa n’anim, kaa sɛ: Amon, Me suro sɛ w’ahurusidie de wo bɛkɔ ntuho mu.

11 Na Amon see no sɛ: Nnyɛ me ara m’ahoɔden, anaa me ara me nyansa mu na meretu me ho; na mmom hwɛ, m’ahurusie ahyɛ ma, aane, ahurusie ahyɛ m’akoma mu ma, na mɛdi ahurusie wɔ me Nyankopɔn mu.

12 Aane, menim sɛ mensɛ hwee; na ɛfa m’ahoɔden mu deɛ meyɛ mmerɛ; ɛno nti merentu me ho, mmom mɛtu meho wɔ me Nyankopɔn mu, ɛfiri sɛ n’ahoɔden mu na mɛtumi ayɛ nneɛma nyina ara; aane, hwɛ, yɛayɛ nkɔnyaa akɛseɛ bebree wɔ asaase yi so, na yei nti yɛbɛtontom ne din afebɔɔ.

13 Monhwɛ, yɛn nuanom mpempem bebree na wayi wɔn afiri asamando yea mu; na wɔde wɔn aba sɛ wɔn mmɛto ɔdɔ dima nwom, na ɛnam n’asɛm no tumi a ɛwɔ yɛn mu no nti, ɛno nti adɛn nti ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛgye yɛn ani?

14 Aane, yɛwɔ deɛ nti a ɛwɔ sɛ yɛyi no ayɛ afebɔɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔne ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn, na wasane yɛn nuanom afiri asamando mpokyerɛ mu.

15 Aane, esum a ɛtehɔ daa ne ɔsɛee twaa wɔn ho hyiaae; na mmom hwɛ, ɔde wɔn aba ne hann a ɛtehɔ daa no mu, aane, nkwagyeɛ a ɛtehɔ daa no mu; na ne dɔ kɛseɛ no ɛso bi nni hɔ no atwa wɔn ho ahyia; aane na yɛayɛ adwendideɛ wɔ ne nsam a ɔnam so di saa dwumadie kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ nnwanwa yi.

16 Ɛno nti, moma yɛn nya animuonyam, aane, yɛbɛnya animuonyam wɔ Awurade mu; aane, yɛbɛdi dɛ, ɛfiri sɛ yɛn ahurusie ayɛ ma; aane, yɛbɛyi yɛn Nyankopɔn ayɛ afebɔɔ. Hwɛ, hwan na bɛtumi anya animuonyam kɛseɛ wɔ Awurade mu? Aane, hwan na ɛbɛtumi aka ne tumi kɛseɛ ne mmɔborɔhunu, ne n’abodwokyerɛ a ɔwɔ wɔ nnipa mma ho asɛm? Monhwɛ, mese mo sɛ, mentumi nka atenka kakra a menya mpo ho asɛm.

17 Hwan na ɛdwene sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛhunu yɛn mmɔbɔ ara akɔsi sɛ ɔbɛtwe yɛn afiri yɛn tebea a ɛyɛ hu, na bɔne ahyɛ ma, na aporɔ no mu?

18 Monhwɛ, yɛde abufuhyeɛ kɛseɛ mpo ne ahunahuna kɛseɛ na ɛkɔɔe sɛ yerekɔsɛe n’asɔre no.

19 O, ɛnneɛ, adɛn nti na wanyae yɛn amma yɛankɔ ɔsɛee a ɛyɛ hu mu, aane, adɛn nti na wamma n’akofena no a ɛyɛ atɛntenenee no anma yɛn so, na amfa yɛn ankɔ nitan a ɛnniawieɛ mu?

20 O, me kra anka sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ biara firi saa adwendwene yi ho. Hwɛ, wanni n’atɛntenenee no wɔ yɛn so, na mmom ɔnam n’ahummɔborɔ kɛseɛ no so de yɛn atra saa owuo a ɛtehɔ daa ne mmɔborɔyɛ ekunu no mpo so ama yɛn akra nya nkwagyeɛ.

21 Na afei monhwɛ, me nuanom, nipa a ɔwɔ honam mu bi wɔ hɔ a ɔnim saa nneɛma yi anaa? Mese mo sɛ, obiara nni hɔ a ɔnim saa nneɛma yi, gye sɛdeɛ wanya adwene sakyera.

22 Aane, deɛ wasakyera na ɔma ne gyedie yɛ adwuma na ɔyɛ nwumapa, na ɔbɔ mpaeɛ mmerɛ biara a ɔnnyae da—nnipa a ɔte sei, ɛna ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔhunu Onyankopɔn asumasɛm; aane, saa nnipa yi na wɔbɛma wayi nneɛma a wɔnnyi nkyerɛ da no akyerɛ; aane, na ɔbɛma saa nipa no atwe akra mpempem aba nsakyeraɛ mu, mpo sɛdeɛ wɔama yɛatwe saa yɛn nuanom yi aba nsakyeraɛ mu.

23 Afei mokae, me nuanom, sɛ yɛka kyerɛɛ yɛn nuanom wɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so sɛ yɛrekɔ Nifae asaase so akɔka nsɛmpa akyerɛ yɛn nuanom Lamanfoɔ no na wɔseree yɛn, tweetwee yɛn.

24 Na wɔsee yɛn sɛ: Mosusu sɛ mobɛtumi atwe Lamanfoɔ aba nokware no ho? Mosusu sɛ mobɛtumi ama Lamanfoɔ no ate aseɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom amammerɛ no nyɛ nokware, nkurɔfoɔ ɛkɔnseneɛfoɔ sei; wɔn a wɔn akoma mu anigyeɛ ara ne mogya kaguo; wɔn a wɔasɛe wɔn nna nyina ara wɔ amumuyɛ kɛseɛ mu; wɔn a wɔn akwan ayɛ mmaratofoɔ akwan fiti ahyɛaseɛ yi? Afei me nuanom, monkae sɛ yei ne nsɛm a wɔkaae.

25 Na wɔkaa nso sɛ: Momma yɛmfa akodeɛ nkɔ wɔn so, ama yɛasɛe wɔn ne wɔn amumuyɛsɛm afiri asaase yi so ama wɔammɛbu amfa yɛn so ansɛe yɛn.

26 Nanso monhwɛ, me nuanom adɔfoɔ, yɛamma ɛserɛ yi so sɛ yɛrebɛsɛe yɛn nuanom, mmom yɛadwene ne sɛ ebia na yɛatumi agye wɔn mu bi akra nkwa.

27 Afei mmerɛ a yɛn akoma brɛɛ ase, na anka yɛresan yɛn akyiri no, monhwɛ Awurade kyekyeree yɛn werɛ, na ɔkaa sɛ: Monkɔ mo nuanom Lamanfoɔ no mu, na momfa abotare nsɔ mo amanehunu ano, na mɛma mo nkonimdie.

28 Na afei monhwɛ yɛaba, na yɛabɛka wɔn ho; na yɛnyaa abotare wɔ yɛn amanehunu mu, na yɛahunu amane wɔ nneɛma a ɛhia wɔ abrabɔ mu nyina ara mu; aane, yɛakɔ afiefie mu, atwere wiase ahummɔborɔ—nyɛ wiase ahummɔborɔ nko ara, mmom Onyankopɔn ahummɔborɔ nso.

29 Na yɛawura wɔn afie mu na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ wɔn, na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn abɔntene so; aane, na yɛakyerɛkyerɛ wɔn wɔ wɔn pampa so; na yɛawura wɔn tɛmpol ne wɔn nhyiadan mu akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn; na wɔayi yɛn atwene, na wɔasi yɛn atwetweɛ, na wɔate ntasuo agu yɛn so, wɔabɔ yɛn sotorɔ; na wɔapa yɛn aboɔ, na wɔfaa yɛn de ntampehoma denden kyekyeree yɛn, na wɔde yɛn to afiase; na ɛnam Onyankopɔn tumi ne ne nyansa so yii yɛn firii mu bio.

30 Na yɛahunu amane wɔ amanehunu ahodoɔ nyina ara mu, na yei nyina ara mu, sɛ ɛbia na ɛnam yɛn so akra binom anya nkwa; na yɛsusu sɛ yɛahurusie bɛhyɛ ma sɛ ɛbia na ɛnam yɛn so ama akra binom anya nkwa.

31 Afei monhwɛ, yɛbɛtumi ahwɛ na yɛahunu yɛn berɛ no mu aba; na ɛsua anaa? Mese mo sɛ, Daabi ɛdɔɔso; aane, na yɛbɛtumi adi wɔn nokwaredie ho adanseɛ, ɛnam ɔdɔ a wɔwɔ de ma wɔn nuanom ne yɛn nso nti.

32 Na hwɛ, wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nkwa bɛbɔ afɔreɛ sen sɛ wɔbɛyi wɔn atamfoɔ nkwa afiri hɔ; na wɔasie wɔn akodeɛ a wɔde kɔ ako ɛfam fee, ɛnam ɔdɔ a wɔwɔ ma wɔn nuanom nti.

33 Na afei monhwɛ mese mo sɛ, ɔdɔ a ɛso sei wɔ asaase nyina ara so anaa? Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ, Daabi, ɛbi nni hɔ, ɛbi nni Nifaefoɔ no mu mpo.

34 Na monhwɛ, wɔbɛfa akodeɛ akɔ wɔn nuanom so; wɔn mma wɔn ho kwan sɛ wɔnkum wɔn. Mmom monhwɛ, wɔn mu dodoɔ sɛn na ɛde wɔn nkwa ato hɔ; na yɛnim sɛ wɔkɔ wɔn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, ɛnam wɔn dɔ ne bɔne a wɔmpɛ nti.

35 Afei yɛnni ho kwan sɛ yɛani gye anaa? Aane, mese mo sɛ, fiti mmerɛ a wiase hyɛɛ aseɛ no, nnipa biara nni hɔ a wɔn ani agye kɛseɛ sei da sɛ yɛn; aane, m’ahurusie aboro so ara ama meretu me ho mpo wɔ me Nyankopɔn mu; fiti sɛ ɔwɔ tumi nyina ara, nyansa nyina ara, ne nteaseɛ nyina ara; ɔte nneɛma nyina ara ase, na ɔyɛ Mmɔborɔhunufoɔ, mpo kɔ nkwagyeɛ mu ma wɔn a wɔsakyera na wɔgye ne din di no.

36 Afei sɛ yei yɛ ntuho a, ɛnneɛ na saa ara mpo na mɛtu me ho; ɛfiri sɛ yei ne me nkwa ne me hann, m’ahurusie ne me nkwagyeɛ ne me dima firi mmusuo a ɛtehɔ daa mu. Aane, nhyira nka me Nyankopɔn din, deɛ ɔkae saa nkurɔfoɔ a ɔyɛ Israel dua no mman, na wɔayera afiri ne dua no ho wɔ asaase foforɔ so; Aane, mese nhyira nka me Nyankopɔn din, deɛ ɔkae yɛn a yɛyɛ akyinkyiniakyinkyinifoɔ wɔ asaase foforɔ so.

37 Afei me nuanom, yɛhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn kae nnipa biara, wɔ asaase biara so; aane ahummɔborɔ yɛfuno kata asaase so nyina ara. Afei yei ne m’ahurusie die, ne m’aseda kɛseɛ; aane, na mɛda me Nyankopɔn ase afebɔɔ. Amen.
alma 27:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Awurade hyɛ Amon sɛ ɔnni Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ anim nkɔ baabi pa—Ɔhyiaa Alma no, Amon ɛdɛ ma ɔyɛ mmerɛ—Nifaefoɔ de Yesɔn asaase no ma Anti-Nifae-Lihaefoɔ—Wɔfrɛ wɔn Amon nkurɔfoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 90–77 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a saa Lamanfoɔ no a wɔkɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔko atia Nifaefoɔ no hunuu sɛ wɔn mmɔden a wɔbɔɔɛ nyina ara akyiri no wɔrentumi nsɛe wɔn no, wɔsann wɔn akyiri kɔɔ Nifae asaase so bio.

2 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amalɛkaefoɔ no bo fuu yie ɛnam wɔn nkoguo no nti; Na wɔhunuu sɛ wɔrentumi nya werɛtɔ mfiri Nifaefoɔ no hɔ no nti no, wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ kanyan nkurɔfoɔ no ara maa wɔn bo fuu wɔn nuanom, Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no; ɛno nti wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ bio sɛ wɔresɛe wɔn.

3 Afei saa nkurɔfoɔ yi ampɛ sɛ wɔbɛfa wɔn akodeɛ bio, nti wɔmaa ho atamfoɔ no kwan maa sɛ wɔkumkum wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn ara pɛ.

4 Afei mmerɛ a Amon ne ne nuanom hunuu saa ɔsɛee adwuma a ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ wɔn mmorosoɔ, na wɔn nso wɔdɔ wɔn mmorosoɔ no mu no—ɛfiri sɛ wɔfaa wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ abɔfoɔ a Onyankopɔn asoma wɔn sɛ wɔmmɛgye wɔn mfiri ɔsɛee a ɛtehɔ daa mu—ɛno nti mmerɛ a Amon ne ne nuanom hunuu saa ɔsɛee dwumadie kɛseɛ yi no, wɔyɛɛ wɔn mmɔbɔ, na wɔsee ɔhene no sɛ:

5 Momma yɛmmoaboa Awurade nkurɔfoɔ yi ano, na momma yɛnkɔ yɛn nuanom Nifaefoɔ hɔ wɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so, na yɛn nwanne mfiri yɛn atamfo nsa mu, ama wɔansɛe yɛn.

6 Nanso ɔhene no see wɔn sɛ: Hwɛ, Nifaefoɔ no bɛsɛe yɛn, ɛnam awudie bebree ne bɔne a yɛayɛ atia wɔn no nti.

7 Na Amon kaa sɛ: Mɛkɔ akɔbisa Awurade, na sɛ ɔse yɛn sɛ, yɛnkɔ yɛn nuanom no nkyɛn a mobɛkɔ anaa?

8 Na ɔhene no see no sɛ: Aane, sɛ Awurade se yɛn sɛ, monkɔ deɛ a, yɛbɛkɔ yɛn nuanom nkyɛn, na yɛbɛyɛ wɔn nkoa akɔsi sɛ yɛbɛsom de atua awudie ne bɔne bebree a yɛayɛ atia wɔn no ka.

9 Nanso Amon see no sɛ: Ɛtia yɛn nuanom mmara a m’agya hyehyɛ too hɔ sɛ mma wɔnnya nkoa biara wɔ wɔn mu; ɛno nti momma yɛnkɔ hɔ na yɛn mfa yɛn ho nto yɛn nuanom ahummɔborɔ so.

10 Na mmom ɔhene no see no sɛ: Bisa Awurade, na sɛ ɔse yɛn sɛ yɛnkɔ a, yɛbɛkɔ; anyɛ saa a yɛbɛsɛe wɔ asaase no so.

11 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon kɔ kɔbisaa Awurade, na Awurade see no sɛ:

12 Ma saa nkurɔfoɔ yi mfiri asaase yi so, ama wɔansɛe; ɛfiri sɛ Satan kuta Amalɛkaefoɔ akoma mu dendennden, ama ɛno nti ɔkanyan Lamanfoɔ no ma wɔn bo fu wɔn nuanom no sɛ wɔbɛkumkum wɔn; ɛno nti momfiri asaase yi so; na nhyira aka saa nkurɔfoɔ yi a wɔwɔ saa awoɔntoatoasoɔ yi mu yi, na mɛkora wɔn.

13 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ Amon kɔkaa nsɛm a Awurade aka akyerɛ no no nyina ara kyerɛɛ ɔhene no.

14 Na wɔboaboaa wɔn nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara ano, aane, Awurade nkurɔfoɔ nyina ara, na wɔboaboaa wɔn nnwan ne wɔn anantwie nyina ara ano, na wɔfirii asaase no so, na wɔbaa ɛserɛ a ɛtwa Nifae asaase ne Sarahɛmla asaase ntam no so, na wɔbɛbɛnee asaase no hyeɛ so.

15 Na ɛbaa sɛ Amon see wɔn sɛ: Monhwɛ, me ne me nuanom asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no bɛkɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so, na mobɛtwɛn wɔ ha kɔpem sɛ yɛbɛsan; na yɛrekɔhwɛ yɛn nuanom akoma ahwɛ sɛ wɔbɛpɛ sɛ mobɛba wɔn asaase so a.

16 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon rekɔ asaase no so no na ɔne ne nuanom hyiaa Alma, wɔ baabi a wɔaka ho asɛm no so; na hwɛ, yei yɛɛ anigyeɛ nhyiam.

17 Afei Amon nyaa ɛdɛ maa ɛboro so mpo; aane, ɔnyaa ɛdɛ ara wɔ ne Nyankopɔn mu ara maa n’ahoɔden saae; maa ɔhwee fam bio.

18 Afei yei nnyɛ ɛdɛ mmorosoɔ anaa? Hwɛ, yei yɛ ɛdɛ a obiara nnya, gye sɛdeɛ ɔnu ne ho nokware mu ne nsakyeraɛ mu ɔde ahobraseɛ hwehwɛ anigyeɛ.

19 Afei ɛdɛ a Alma nyaaɛ mmerɛ a ɔhyiaa ne nuanom no, nokware mu ni, na ɛso, na Aaron nso ɛdɛ saa ara, ne Omna, ne Himnae nso; na mmom hwɛ wɔn ɛdɛ anyɛ deɛ ɛboro wɔn ahoɔden so.

20 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ Alma dii ne nuanom asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no anim ne wɔn san kɔɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so; kɔɔ ɔno ara mpo fie. Na wɔkɔkaa deɛ ɛsii wɔ wɔn ne wɔn nuanom, Lamanfoɔ ntam wɔ Nifae asaase so nyina ara kyerɛɛ ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no.

21 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no maa wɔbɔɔ dawuro wɔ asaase no nyina ara so sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ nkurɔfoɔ no kyerɛ wɔn adwene sɛ wɔpene so sɛ wɔnnye wɔn nuanom a wɔyɛ Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no.

22 Na ɛbaa sɛ nkurɔfoɔ no kyerɛɛ wɔn adwene, sɛ: Hwɛ, yɛde Yɛsɔn asaase a ɛda ɛpo no atɔɛ afam no, deɛ ɛbɔ Dodoɔ asaase no a ɛwɔ Dodoɔ asaase no anaafoɔ no bɛma wɔn; na saa Yɛsɔn asaase yi na yɛde bɛma yɛn nuanom no ama ayɛ wɔn awunyadeɛ.

23 Na hwɛ, yɛde yɛn asraafoɔ bɛtena Yɛsɔn asaase ne Nifae asaase ntam hɔ, ama yɛatumi abɔ yɛn nuanom ho ban wɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so; na yei na yɛbɛyɛ ama yɛn nuanom ɛnam sɛ wɔsuro sɛ wɔbɛfa akodeɛ ako atia wɔn nuanom ama wɔanyɛ bɔne; na wɔnyaa suro kɛseɛ yi ɛnam nsakyeraɛ kɛseɛ a wɔnyaa wɔ wɔn awudie bebree ne wɔn atirimuɔden kɛseɛ no nti.

24 Na afei hwɛ, yei na yɛbɛyɛ ama yɛn nuanom, sɛ wɔbɛfa Yɛsɔn asaase no; na yɛde yɛn asraafoɔ bɛbɔ wɔn ho ban afiri wɔn atamfoɔ nsa mu, sɛ wɔbɛma yɛn wɔn ahodeɛ kakra de aboa yɛn ama yɛatumi de ahwɛ yɛn asraafoɔ no.

25 Afei; ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon tee sei no, ɔsann n’akyiri kɔɔ Anti-Nifae-Lihae nkurɔfoɔ no hɔ, na Alma nso ne no kɔɔ ɛserɛ no so wɔ baabi a wɔasisi wɔn ntomadan, na ɔdaa nneɛma yi nyina ara adi kyerɛɛ wɔn. Na Alma nso kaa ɔne Amon ne Aaron, ne ne nuanom nsakyeraɛ ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wɔn.

26 Na ɛbaa sɛ yei de ɛdɛ kɛseɛ baa wɔn mu. Na wɔkɔɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so, na wɔkɔfaa Yɛsɔn asaase no; na Nifaefoɔ no frɛɛ wɔn Amon nkurɔfoɔ; ɛno nti saa din no hyɛɛ wɔn nso ɛfiri saa da no de rekorɔ.

27 Na wɔbɛkaa Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no ho, na wɔkann wɔn nso fraa nkurɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn asɔremma no ho. Na na wɔda nso wɔ Onyankopɔn mmɔdenmɔ ne nnipa nso ho; na wɔdii nokware ara yie na wɔyɛɛ tenenee wɔ nneɛma nyina ara mu; na wɔgyinaa pintinn wɔ gyedie mu wɔ Kristo mu, mpo de kɔɔ awieɛ.

28 Na sɛ wɔbɛka wɔn nuanom mogya agu no yɛɛ akyiwasɛm kɛseɛ wɔ wɔn ani so; na biribi ara antumi amma wɔamfa akodeɛ anko antia wɔn nuanom da; na owuo anyɛ adeɛ a ɛyɛ hu wɔ wɔn ani so, ɛnam wɔn anidasoɔ ne sɛdeɛ wɔte Kristo ne owusɔreɛ ase nti; ɛno nti wɔhunuu sɛ Kristo nkonimdie no amene owuo ama wɔn.

29 Ɛno nti wɔpɛɛ owuo a emu yɛ den na ahoyera wɔ mu, a wɔn nuanom de bɛyɛ wɔn ansa na wɔafa akofena anaa sɛ sekan koaɛ de akum wɔn.

30 Na sei na ɛmaa wɔyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a ahokeka wɔ wɔn mu na wɔwɔ dɔ, nkurɔfoɔ a Awurade anigye wɔn ho mmorosoɔ.
alma 28:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Lamanfoɔ di nkoguo wɔ ɛko kɛseɛ mu—Wɔkum mpem mpem—Atirimuɔdenfoɔ bɛkɔ mmusuo a ɛnni awieɛ tebea mu; na ateneneefoɔ anya anigyeɛ a ɛnni awieɛ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 77–76 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon nkurɔfoɔ no ase timm wɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so no, na wɔtee asɔre nso wɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so, na Nifaefoɔ asraafoɔ no twaa Yɛsɔn asaase ho hyiaae no, aane, wɔ ɛhyeɛ a atwa Sarahɛmla asaase ho ahyia nyina ara akyire no; hwɛ Lamanfoɔ asraafoɔ no dii wɔn nuanom akyiri kɔɔ ɛserɛ no so.

2 Na yei maa ɛko kɛseɛ bi baae; aane, deɛ ɛte sei bi a ɛnsii wɔ nnipa nyina ara mu da wɔ asaase no so fiti mmerɛ a Lihae de firii Yerusalem; aane, na Lamanfoɔ no mu ɔpedu mpemdu na wɔkum wɔn petee amannɔne.

3 Aane, na wɔkumm dodoɔ no ara nso wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no mu; nanso wɔpamoo Lamanfoɔ no na wɔbɔɔ wɔn petee, na Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no sann wɔn akyiri kɔɔ wɔn asaase no so bio.

4 Na afei ɛbɛyɛɛ mmerɛ a wɔtee ɛsu ne abooboo kɛse wɔ asaase no nyina ara mu, wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara mu—

5 Aane, akunafoɔ a wɔresu ma wɔn kununom, ne agyanom nso a wɔresu ma wɔn mmammarima, ne ɔbabaa a ɔde rema ne nuabarima, aane, nuabarima de rema n’agya; na sei na ɛmaa wɔtee suu wɔ wɔn nyina ara mu, na wɔsu maa wɔn abusuafoɔ a wɔakumkum wɔn no.

6 Na afei nokware, na saa da yi yɛɛ awerɛhoɔ da; aane, komm yɛ mmerɛ, ne mmerɛ a ɛyɛ akɔmkyene na wɔbɔɔ mpaebɔ kɛseɛ.

7 Na saa na atɛmmuafoɔ a wɔhwɛ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so no ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so dunum wɔ wɔn ahennie mu no de baa awieɛ.

8 Na yei ne nsɛm a ɛfa Amon nuanom ho, wɔn akwantuo wɔ Nifae asaase so, wɔn amanehunu wɔ asaase no so, wɔn awerɛhoɔ, ne wɔn haw, ne wɔn ɛdɛ a yɛnteaseɛ, ne sɛdeɛ wɔsi gyee anuanom asomdwoeɛ mu wɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so. Na afei Awurade no a ɔyɛ nnipa nyina ara Dimafoɔ no nhyira wɔn akra afebɔɔ.

9 Na yei ne deɛ ɛfa akokoakoko ne apereapereɛ a ɛsii Nifaefoɔ mu, ne ako nso a ɛsii Nifaefoɔ ne Lamanfoɔ ntam; na atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so dunum wɔ wɔn ahennie mu no baa awieɛ.

10 Na ɛfiri afe a ɛdi kan no de kɔsi dunum no mu no ama akra mpempem asɛe; aane, ama mogya hwieguo huhuu asi.

11 Na mpempem bebree no ara funu na akɔhyɛ asaase mu, ɛna mpempem bebree nso funu ano aboa akuokuo reprɔ wɔ asaase ani so; aane, na mpempem bebree nso redi suu ɛnam wɔn abusuafoɔ a wɔn awuwu no nti, ɛfiri sɛ Awurade ahyɛ wɔn bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma wɔakɔ mmusuo a ɛnni awieɛ tebea mu, ɛno nti ɛho hiaa sɛ wɔsuro.

12 Mmerɛ a mpempem dodoɔ no redi suu nokware mu ma wɔn abusuafoɔ a wɔahwere wɔn nkwa no, na wɔdaso nso gye wɔn ani wɔredi ahurisie wɔ anidasoɔ mu, mpo wɔnim sɛdeɛ Awurade bɔhyɛ teɛ, sɛ wɔbɛnyane wɔn ama wɔakɔtena Onyankopɔn nsa nifa so wɔ anigyeɛ a ɛnni awieɛ tebea mu.

13 Na yei ma yɛhunu sɛdeɛ ɛhia sɛ nnipa nyina ara nnyɛ pɛ, ɛnam bɔne ne mmaratoɔ nti, ne ɔbonsam tumi a ɛnam naadaa nhyehyɛeɛ a ɔde abɔpɔ sɛ ɔde bɛsum nnipa akoma afidie.

14 Na yei ma yɛhunu sɛ ɛhia kɛseɛ sɛ nnipa bɛbɔ mmɔden ayɛ adwuma wɔ Awurade bobeturo no mu; na yei ma yɛhunu sɛdeɛ nti a yɛdi awerɛhoɔ kɛseɛ, na yɛn anigye nso—awerɛhoɔ ba ɛnam owuo ne ɔsɛee a ɛsi nnipa mu nti, na ɛdɛ nso ba ɛnam Kristo kanea a ɛma nkwa no nti.
alma 29:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma wɔ pɛ sɛ ɔde abɔfoɔ ahokeka bɔ nsakyeraɛ ho dawuro—Awurade de akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ma aman nyina ara—Alma de Awurade adwuma ne Amon ne ne nuanom nkonimdie ho nya animuonyam. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 76 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 O na anka meyɛ ɔbɔfoɔ, na matumi anya m’akoma mu apɛdeɛ, na matumi de Onyankopɔn totorobɛnto akɔkasa, mede nne akasa ama asaase awoso, na matea mu aka nsakyeraɛ ho asɛm akyerɛ nnipa biara!

2 Aane, anka mede nne a ɛte sɛ apranaa aka nsakyeraɛ ne dima ho nhyehyɛeɛ ho asɛm akyerɛ akra biara ama wɔasakyera aba yɛn Nyankopɔn hɔ, ama awerɛhoɔ amma asaase nyina ara ani so bio.

3 Na hwɛ, meyɛ nnipa, na menam mepɛ mu yɛ bɔne; ɛfiri sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ m’ani sɔ nneɛma a Awurade de ama me no.

4 Ɛnsɛ sɛ meyɛ me ara m’apɛdeɛ, deɛ ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn nokwarefoɔ no mmara a ɛsi pi no, ɛfiri sɛ menim sɛ ɔma nnipa deɛ wɔpɛ, sɛ ɛyɛ owuo anaa sɛ nkwa; aane, menim sɛ wahyɛ mmara ama nnipa a ɛnsesa, sɛdeɛ wɔn pɛ teɛ, sɛ ɛkɔ nkwagyeɛ mu anaa sɛ ɛkɔ ɔsɛee mu.

5 Aane, na menim sɛ papa ne bɔne aba nnipa nyina ara hɔ; deɛ ɔnnim nsonsonoɛ a ɛda papa ne bɔne ntam no nni fɔ; na mmom deɛ ɔnim papa ne bɔne no, ɔno na wɔma no deɛ ɔpɛ, sɛ ɔpɛ papa anaasɛ bɔne, nkwa anaa sɛ owuo, ɛdɛ anaa sɛdeɛ ɔbɛnu ne ho wɔ n’adwene mu.

6 Afei, ɛnam sɛ menim saa nneɛma yi nti, ɛdeɛn na merepɛ bio ka deɛ ɛwɔ sɛ meyɛ ho, sɛ mɛyɛ adwuma a wɔafrɛ me sɛ me nyɛ ho?

7 Adɛn nti na mepɛ sɛ meyɛ sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ ama m’atumi akasa akyerɛ obiara wɔ wiase awieɛ nyina ara?

8 Na hwɛ, Awurade ama aman nyina ara kwan sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ankasa wɔn man ne ne kasa nkyerɛkyerɛ n’asɛm, aane, wɔ nyansa mu de deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔnya biara ama wɔn; ɛno nti yɛhunu sɛ Awurade tu fo wɔ ne nyansa mu, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ tenenee ne nokware teɛ.

9 Menim deɛ Awurade ahyɛ me sɛ me nyɛ, na mehyɛ me ho animuonyam wɔ mu. Mennhyɛ me ho animuonyam wɔ me ara me mu, na mmom mehyɛ meho animuonyam wɔ deɛ Awurade ahyɛ me ho; aane, na yei ne m’animuonyam, ama mpo ebia na mayɛ adwendadeɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn nsa mu, de atwe akra aba nsakyeraɛ ho, na yei ne m’ɛdɛ.

10 Na hwɛ, sɛ mehunu me nuanom bebree a wɔasakyera nokware mu na wɔaba Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn hɔ a, na ɛdɛ ahyɛ me kra ma; afei na ama makae deɛ Awurade ayɛ ama me, aane, sɛ watie me mpaebɔ mpo; aane, afei na ama makae n’ahummɔborɔ abasa a ɔtenee wɔ me so no.

11 Aane, na makae m’agyanom nnɔmum no; ɛfiri sɛ menim ampa ara sɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn, Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak ne Yakob Nyankopɔn, no na oyii wɔn firii nkoasom mu.

12 Aane, mekaae m’agyanom nnɔmum no mmerɛ nyina ara; na saa Onyankopɔn korɔ no ara a ɔyii wɔn firii Misraimfoɔ nsa mu no, na ɔyii wɔn firii nkoasom mu.

13 Aane, na saa Onyankopɔn korɔ no ara na ɔtee n’asɔre wɔ wɔn mu; aane, na saa Onyankopɔn korɔ no ara na ɔfrɛɛ me ɔfrɛ kronkron, sɛ menka asɛm no nkyerɛ saa nkurɔfoɔ yi, na wɔama me nkonimdie kɛseɛ, na ama m’ɛdɛ ahyɛ ma.

14 Na mmom menni dɛ wɔ me ara me nkonimdie nko ara ho, na mmom m’ɛdɛ hyɛ ma ɛnam me nuanom nso a wɔkɔɔ Nifae asaase so no wɔn nkonimdie nti.

15 Hwɛ, wɔayɛ adwuma mmorosoɔ, na wɔaso aduaba pii, na wɔn akatua bɛyɛ kɛseɛ!

16 Afei, sɛ medwene me nuanom yi nkonimdie a, ɛde me kra kɔ akyiri, ama ate ne ho koraa, mpo afiri me honamdua ho, sɛdeɛ m’ɛdɛ kɛseɛ teɛ.

17 Na afei Onyankopɔn mma me nuanom yi ntena Onyankopɔn aheman no mu; aane, ne wɔn nso a wɔyɛ wɔn adwuma mu aduaba nyina ara nso ntena hɔ a wɔremfiri adi bio, na mmom wɔbɛtontom no afebɔɔ. Na Onyankopɔn ma ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ me nsɛm teɛ, mpo sɛdeɛ maka no. Amen.
alma 30:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Korihɔ, a ɔyɛ anti-Kristo, di Kristo, Mpata no, ne nkɔmhyɛ honhom no ho fɛw—Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ, adasamma ahweaseɛ biara nni hɔ, bɔne ho asotweɛ biara nni hɔ, ɛna Kristo nni hɔ—Alma di adanseɛ sɛ Kristo bɛba na nneɛma nyina ara kyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ—Korihɔ bisa nsɛnkyerɛnee na ɔtɔre mmum—Ɔbonsam yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ Korihɔ sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ no, na ɔkyerɛɛ no deɛ ɔnka—Wɔtiatia Korihɔ so na ɔwu. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 76–74 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Hwɛ, afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Amon nkurɔfoɔ no tintimm wɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so no, aane, na wɔpamoo Lamanfoɔ nso firii asaase no so, na nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ asaase no so siee wɔn awufoɔ.

2 Afei wɔantumi ankan wɔn awufoɔ no dodoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔdɔɔso; ɛna wɔantumi ankan Nifaefoɔ awufoɔ nso—nanso ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔsiee wɔn awufoɔ akyire yi no, ne akɔmkyerɛ ne suu, na ɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ akyire yi no, (na ɛyɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie mu bosomee dunsia wɔ Nifae nkurɔfoɔ so) asomdwoeɛ hyɛɛ aseɛ toaso saa ara baa asaase no nyina ara so.

3 Aane, na nkurɔfoɔ no bɔɔ mmɔden dii Awurade mmaransɛm so; na wɔhwɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛdi Onyankopɔn ayɛdeɛ no so pɛpɛɛpɛ sɛdeɛ Mose mmara no teɛ no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnndi Mose mmara no so ara nkɔsi sɛ ɛbɛhyɛ ma.

4 Na yei na amma basabasa biara ansi wɔ nkurɔfoɔ no ahennie mu wɔ mfie dunsia no nyina ara mu wɔ mmerɛ a atɛmmuafoɔ no dii Nifae nkurɔfoɔ no so no.

5 Na ɛbaa sɛ atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie afe a ɛtɔ so dunson no mu no mfitiaseɛ no na asomdwoeɛ da so wɔ hɔ.

6 Nanso ɛbaa sɛ ɛrekɔ afe a ɛtɔ so dunson no awieɛ no, ɔbarima bi baa Sarahɛmla asaase so a, na ɔyɛ Anti-Kristo, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka nsɛm a etia nkɔmhyɛ a nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no aka a ɛfa Kristo mmaeɛ ho no kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ no.

7 Afei na mmara biara nni hɔ a ɛtia nnipa biara gyedie; ɛfiri sɛ etia Onyankopɔn mmara dendennden sɛ mmara bi bɛwɔ hɔ a ɛbɛma nsonsonoɛ aba nnipa mu.

8 Na sei na twerɛsɛm no ka: Monyi ɛnnɛ da yi, deɛ mobɛsom no.

9 Afei sɛ nnipa bi pɛ sɛ ɔsom Onyankopɔn a, ɔwɔ ho kwan, anaa sɛ, sɛ ɔgye Onyankopɔn di a ɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ ɔsom no; mmom sɛ ɔnnye no nni a, mmara biara nni hɔ sɛ wɔtwe n’aso.

10 Nanso sɛ ɔdi awu a, wɔkum no bi; na sɛ ɔbɔ korɔnoo a, ɔno nso nya asotweɛ; na sɛ ɔsɛe awareɛ a, ɛno nso nya asotweɛ; aane, na wɔnyaa asotweɛ wɔ saa atirimuɔdensɛm yi nyina ara ho.

11 Na na mmara bi wɔ hɔ sɛ wɔbu nnipa atɛn sɛdeɛ wɔn bɔne teɛ. Nanso, mmara biara nni hɔ a etia obi gyedie; ɛno nti, nnipa nya asotweɛ wɔ bɔne a ɔyɛ no nko ara ho; ɛno nti nnipa nyina ara gyinabrɛ yɛ pɛ.

12 Na saa Anti-Kristo yi a na ne din de Korihɔ yi, (na mmara no ntumi nkyekyere no) hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no sɛ Kristo biara nni hɔ. Na ɔkwan yei so na ɔfa de kaa sɛ:

13 O mo a wɔakyekyere mo ahyɛ nkwasea anidasoɔ hunu ase, adɛn nti na mo de nkwaseasɛm a ɛte sei ayɛ kɔnua akyekyere mo ho? Adɛn nti na mohwɛ Kristo bi kwan? Na obiara ntumi nhunu biribi a ɛreba.

14 Hwɛ, deɛ mofrɛ no nkɔmhyɛ nyina ara a mose nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron na aka ato hɔ no, hwɛ, ɛyɛ mo agyanom nkwasea amamerɛ.

15 Ɛyɛ dɛn na mohunu sɛ ɛyɛ nokware? Hwɛ, montumi nnhunu nneɛma a monhunu; ɛno nti montumi nhunu sɛ Kristo bi bɛba.

16 Mohwɛ kwan na mo ka sɛ mo hunu sɛ mo anya bɔnefakyɛ wɔ mo bɔne ho. Mmom hwɛ, ɛyɛ abɔdamdwene; na mo adwene a ayɛ basabasa yi firi mo agyanom amammerɛ no a ɛtwe mo ma monya gyedie wɔ nneɛma a ɛnte saa mu no.

17 Na nsɛm a ɛtete saa pii na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ mpata biara nni hɔ a ɛbɛtumi de nnipa bɔne akyɛ wɔn; mmom deɛ ɛba nnipa biara so no firi ɔno ara n’abrabɔ; ɛno nti nipa biara yɛ frɔmfrɔm a na ɛfiri ɔno ara ne nyansa, na nnipa biara nam n’ahoɔden so na ɔdi nkonim; na biribi ara a nnipa bɛyɛ no nnyɛ bɔne.

18 Na sei na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn, de twee dodoɔ no ara akoma, maa wɔn ani anwu wɔ wɔn atirimuɔdensɛm mu, aane, ɔtwee mmaa bebree ne marima bebree nso maa wɔbɔɔ adwaaman—na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ nipa wu a ɛno ara ne no.

19 Afei saa barima yi kɔɔ Yɛsɔn asaase so nso, sɛ ɔrekɔka saa nsɛm yi wɔ Amon nkurɔfoɔ a mmerɛ bi na wɔyɛ Lamanfoɔ nkurɔfoɔ no.

20 Nanso, hwɛ, wɔyɛ anyansafoɔ kyɛn Nifaefoɔ no mu bebree; na wɔsɔɔ ne mu kyekyeree no de no kɔɔ Amon a ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panin wɔ saa nkurɔfoɔ no so no anim.

21 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔmaa wɔsoaa no firii asaase no so. Na ɔbaa Gideon asaase so, na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔrekasa akyerɛ wɔn nso; na ɛha deɛ nneɛma ankɔ yie amma no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔfaa no kyekyeree no na wɔsoaa no kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin no, ne ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no a ɔhwɛ asaase no so no anim.

22 Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔsɔfo panin no see no sɛ: Adɛn nti na wonenam redanedane Awurade akwan yi? Adɛn nti na woka kyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi sɛ Kristo biara remma; de si wɔn anigyeɛ ho kwan? Adɛn nti na wokasa tia nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron no nkɔmhyɛ nyina ara yi?

23 Afei na ɔsɔfo panin no din de Gidona. Na Korihɔ see no sɛ: Ɛnam sɛ menkyerɛkyerɛ mo mo agyanom nkwasea amammerɛ no, na ɛnam sɛ menkyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ yi mma wɔn nkyekyere wɔn ho nhyɛ nkwasea ayɛyɛdeɛ ne adeyɔ a tete asɔfoɔ ahyɛ ato hɔ ase, ama wɔde anya tumi ne akwanya wɔ wɔn so, ama wɔn atena tebea a wɔnim hwee mu, ama wɔamma wɔn tiri so, na mmom, wɔabrɛ wɔn ase sɛdeɛ wo nsɛm teɛ.

24 Mo se saa nkurɔfoɔ yi yɛ fawohodiefoɔ. Hwɛ, mese wɔwɔ nkoasom mu. Mo se saa tete mmerɛ mu nkɔmhyɛ yi yɛ nokware. Monhwɛ mese monnim sɛ ɛyɛ nokware.

25 Mo se nkurɔfoɔ yi yɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔdi fɔ na wɔahwease, ɛnam awofoɔ baako mmeratoɔ nti: Monhwɛ, mese ɛba nnifɔ ɛnam n’awofoɔ ho nti.

26 Na mo se Kristo nso bɛba. Mmom monhwɛ, me se monnim sɛ Kristo bi bɛba. Na mo ka nso sɛ wɔbɛkum no ɛnam wiase bɔne nti.

27 Na saa na modi nkurɔfoɔ yi anim ma wɔn dii mo agyanom nkwasea amammerɛ akyiri, ne mo ara mopɛ akyiri, na moka wɔn hyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔwɔ nkoasom mu no, ama mo de mo abrabɔ a sika sɛee wɔ mu ato wɔn nsa ano adwuma so, ama wɔantumi anya akokoɔduro, na wɔsuro mpo sɛ wɔbɛfa deɛ ɛsɛ wɔn ne deɛ ɛyɛ wɔn deɛ.

28 Aane, wɔsuro sɛ wɔde deɛ ɛyɛ wɔn ankasa wɔn deɛ bɛyɛ wɔn ho, sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔmfom wɔn asɔfoɔ no a wɔde kɔnnua to wɔn so sɛdeɛ wɔn pɛ teɛ no, na wɔama wɔn anya gyedie wɔ wɔn amammerɛ ne wɔn adayɛsoɔ mu ne wɔn adwene bɔne ne wɔn anisoadehunu ne wɔn ahintasɛm a wɔyɛ wɔn ho sɛ wɔhunu, a sɛ wɔanyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn nsɛm teɛ a, wɔbɛfom nnipa bi a wɔnnim no a wɔse ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn—nipa bi a obiara nhunuu no da anaa sɛ obiara nnim no, obi a onni hɔ da na ɔremma da.

29 Afei mmerɛ a ɔsɔfo panin no ne ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no hunuu sɛdeɛ n’akoma ayɛ den no, aane, mmerɛ a wɔhunuu sɛ ɔbɛka nsɛm bɔne atia Onyankopɔn mpo no, wɔammua ne nsɛm a ɔkaaɛ no mu biara; mmom wɔmaa wɔkyekyeree no; na wɔde no hyɛɛ asraafoɔ mpanimfoɔ nsa ma wɔde no kɔɔ Sarahɛmla asaase so, de no kɔɔ Alma, ne ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no a ɔyɛ ammrado wɔ asaase no nyina ara so no anim.

30 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a wɔde no baa Alma ne ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no anim no, ɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ deɛ ɔyɛe wɔ Gideon asaase so no ara wɔ hɔ nso; aane, ɔkɔɔ so kaa abususɛm

31 Na ɔkasaa dendennden wɔ Alma anim, na ɔkaa nsɛm bɔne tiaa asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no nso, sɛ wɔn na wɔatwe nkurɔfoɔ no ama wɔn akɔdi wɔn agyanom nkwasea amammerɛ no akyiri; ɛnam wɔn abrabɔ a sika sɛee wɔ mu no ato nkurɔfoɔ no nwuma so nti.

32 Afei Alma see wɔn sɛ: Wonim sɛ yɛmmfa yɛn yafunu nto nkurɔfoɔ no nwuma so; na hwɛ, mede me ara me nsa ayɛ adwuma ahwɛ me ho fiti atɛmmuafoɔ no ahennie mfitiaseɛ, m’akwantuo dodoɔ a metuuɛ, bɔɔ asaase no so aporɔ kaa Onyankopɔn asɛm de kyerɛɛ me nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara akyiri mpo.

33 Na adwuma dodoɔ a mayɛ wɔ asɔre yi akyiri mpo no, mennyee senin mpo da, wɔ m’adwuma ho; ɛna me nuanom yi mu biara nso nnyee hwee da, gye sɛ atɛmmuo-adwa no so nko ara; na ɛno mpo yɛgye wɔ yɛn mmerɛ dodoɔ a yɛde di asɛm ho sɛdeɛ mmara no teɛ.

34 Na afei, sɛ yɛnnye hwee wɔ yɛn nwuma a yɛyɛ wɔ asɔre no mu mpo a, ɛdeɛn mfasoɔ na yɛnya, sɛ yɛbɛbrɛ yɛn ho wɔ asɔre no mu, gye sɛ nokware no a yɛbɔ ho dawuro no, ama yɛadi dɛ wɔ yɛn nuanom no ɛdɛ ho?

35 Ɛnneɛ adɛn nti na woka sɛ yɛka nsɛmpa no kyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no pɛ mfasoɔ, wɔ mmerɛ a wo ara ankasa wonim sɛ yɛnnya mfasoɔ biara? Na afei, wo gyedi sɛ yɛredaadaa nkurɔfoɔ yi nti na ɛma wɔnya ɛdɛ a ɛte sei wɔ wɔn akoma mu?

36 Na Korihɔ buaa no sɛ, Aane.

37 Na afei Alma see no sɛ: Wogyedi sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ?

38 Na ɔbuaa sɛ, Daabi.

39 Afei Alma see no sɛ: Wobɛgye akyinnyeɛ bio sɛ Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ, na afei woregye akyinnyeɛ wɔ Kristo nso ho? Na hwɛ, Mese wo sɛ, menim sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, na Kristo nso bɛba.

40 Na afei ɛdeɛn adanseɛ na wo wɔ sɛ Onyankopɔn nni hɔ, anaa Kristo remma? Mese wo sɛ wonni bi, gye sɛ w’asɛm no nkoa ara.

41 Nanso, hwɛ, mewɔ biribiara a ɛdi adanseɛ sɛ saa nneɛma yi yɛ nokware; na wo nso wo wɔ biribi a ɛdi adanseɛ kyerɛ wo sɛ ɛyɛ nokware; na wobɛgye ho akyinnyeɛ anaa? Wogyedi sɛ saa nneɛma yi yɛ nokware?

42 Hwɛ, menim sɛ wogyedi na mmom naadaa honhom bi na aba wo so, na wode Onyankopɔn Honhom no ato nkyɛn sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɛrenya tenabea wɔ wo mu; na mmom ɔbonsam wɔ tumi wɔ wo so, de wo nenam, na ɔde wo yɛ deɛ ɔpɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔbɛsɛe Onyankopɔn mma.

43 Na afei Korihɔ see Alma sɛ: So wobɛnya nsɛnkyerɛnee bi akyerɛ me ama magye adi sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ, aane, ma menhunu sɛ ɔwɔ tumi, na ɛno na ɛbɛma m’agye wo nsɛm no adie.

44 Na mmom Alma see no sɛ: Wahunu nsɛnkyerɛnee ara yie; Wobɛsɔ wo Nyankopɔn ahwɛ anaa? Na wobɛka sɛ, kyerɛ me nsɛnkyerɛnee bi, mmerɛ a wo wɔ wo nuanom ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ kronkron yi nyina ara ho adanseɛ? Twerɛsɛm no da w’anim pefee, aane, na nneɛma nyina ara kyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ; aane, asaase mpo, ne nneɛma nyina ara a ɛwɔ so, aane, ne ntwareho, aane, ne nsaase nyina ara nso a ɛnam wɔn kwan so tware wɔn ho pɛpɛɛpɛ di adanseɛ sɛ Ɔbɔadeɛ Kokoroko bi wɔ hɔ.

45 Na yei nyina ara akyiri no, wonenam, na woredane nkurɔfoɔ yi akoma, redi adanseɛ kyerɛ wɔn sɛ Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ? Na yei nyina ara akyiri no, wobɛgye akyinnyeɛ, wɔ saa adanseɛ yi nyina ara ho? Na ɔkaa sɛ: Aane, mɛgye akyinnyeɛ, gye sɛ wokyerɛ me nsɛnkyerɛnee.

46 Na afei ɛbaa sɛ Alma see no sɛ: Hwɛ, medi awerɛhoɔ sɛ wayɛ w’akoma den, aane, sɛ woda so ne nokware honhom no redi asie ama wo kra akɔ ɔsɛee mu.

47 Mmom hwɛ, ɛyɛ sɛ wo akra bɛyera akyɛn sɛ akra bebree bɛnam watorɔ ne wo naadaa so akɔ ɔsɛee mu; ɛno nti sɛ wogye akyinnyeɛ bio a, hwɛ Onyankopɔn bɛbɔ wo, ama watɔre mum, wontumi mmue w’ano bio, ama wonaadaa nkurɔfoɔ yi bio.

48 Afei Korihɔ see no sɛ: Mennye akyinnyeɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ; na mmom mennye nni sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ; na meka nso sɛ, wo nnim sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ; na gye sɛ woda nsɛnkyerɛnee bi adi kyerɛ me, anyɛ saa a mennye nni.

49 Afei Alma see no sɛ: Mede yei bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnee akyerɛ wo, sɛ wobɛtɔre mum, sɛdeɛ me nsɛm teɛ; na meka wɔ Onyankopɔn din mu, sɛ wo bɛtɔre mum, a worentumi nkasa bio.

50 Afei mmerɛ a Alma kaa saa nsɛm yi no, Korihɔ tɔree mum, ama wɔantumi ankasa, sɛdeɛ Alma nsɛm teɛ no.

51 Na afei mmerɛ a ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no hunu yei no, ɔtenee ne nsa na ɔtwerɛ de maa Korihɔ, sɛ: Woagye adi sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ tumi anaa? Hwan mu na wopɛɛ sɛ Alma nyɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnee nkyerɛ wo no? Wopɛ sɛ ɔma ebinom hunu amane, ma ɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnee kyerɛ wo? Hwɛ wɔayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnee akyerɛ wo; na afei wobɛgye akyinnyeɛ bio anaa?

52 Na Korihɔ tenee ne nsa na ɔtwerɛɛe sɛ: Menim sɛ meyɛ mum, ɛfiri sɛ mentumi nkasa; na menim sɛ biribiara nni hɔ a ɛbɛtumi de saa adeɛ yi aba me so gye sɛ Onyankopɔn tumi; aane, na menim mmerɛ nyina ara sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.

53 Na hwɛ, ɔbonsam adaadaa me; ɛfiri sɛ ɔyii ne ho kyerɛɛ me sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ, na ɔsee me sɛ: Kɔ na kɔgye nkurɔfoɔ yi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyina ara afom ɛkwan no akɔdi Onyankopɔn bi a obiara nnim no hɔ; aane, na ɔkyerɛɛ me deɛ menka. Na makyerɛkyerɛ ne nsɛm no; na ɛnam sɛ ɛsɔ honam adwene ani nti mede kyerɛkyerɛe; na mekyerɛkyerɛɛe ara kɔsii sɛ medii nkonim mpo, na yei maa megye dii sɛ ɛyɛ nokware; na yei nti megyinaa nokware no ano kɔsii sɛ mede nomee kɛseɛ aba me so mpo yi.

54 Afei mmerɛ a ɔkaa yei no, ɔsrɛɛ Alma sɛ ɔmmɔ mpaeɛ nkyerɛ Onyankopɔn, ama wayi nomee no afiri ne so.

55 Nanso Alma see no sɛ: sɛ nomee yi firi wo so a, wobɛdaadaa nkurɔfoɔ yi akoma akɔ akyiri bio; ɛno nti ɛbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo sɛdeɛ Awurade pɛ mpo teɛ.

56 Na ɛbaa sɛ nomee no amfiri Korihɔ so; na mmom ɔyii no totwenee, na ɔnantenantee afiefie mu srɛsrɛɛ aduane.

57 Afei, deɛ ɛtoo Korihɔ no terɛɛ asaase no nyina ara so ntɛm ara; aane, ɔtɛmmuafoɔ panin no maa wɔbɔɔ dawuro kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ asaase no so nyina ara a wɔagye Korihɔ nsɛm no adi no sɛ, wɔn nsakyeraɛ ntɛmntɛm, anyɛ saa a ntɛmmuo no bi bɛba wɔn so.

58 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔn nyina ara gyee Korihɔ atirimuɔdensɛm no too mu. Ɛno nti wɔn nyina ara sakyeraae bio baa Awurade hɔ; na yei de amumuyɛ a ɛte sɛ Korihɔ deɛ no bi baa awieɛ. Na Korihɔ nantenantee afiefie mu srɛsrɛɛ aduane de hwɛɛ ne ho.

59 Na ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a ɔnenam nkurɔfoɔ no mu no, aane, nkurɔfoɔ a wɔate wɔn ho afiri Nifaefoɔ ho, na wɔfrɛ wɔn ho Soramfoɔ, ɛnam sɛ barima bi a wɔfrɛ no Soram dii wɔn anim—na mmerɛ a ɔnenam wɔn mu no, hwɛ, wɔtwifaa ne so, na wɔtiaa ne so kɔsii sɛ ɔwuui mpo.

60 Na sei na yɛhunu deɛ ɔdanee Awurade akwan no; na yei ma yɛhunu sɛ ɔbonsam remmoa wɔ ɛda a edi akyire no, na mmom ɔtwe wɔn ntɛmntɛm de wɔn kɔ asamando.
alma 31:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 31[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma di asɛmpatrɛsoma anim kɔgye Soramfoɔ a wɔahwe ase wɔ gyedie mu no—Soramfoɔ po Kristo, wɔgye adwene hunu a ɛwɔ eyie a Nyankopɔn yi obi no di, na wɔgyina mpeabɔ bi a wɔahyehyɛ mu nsɛm ato hɔ dada no so som—Honhom Kronkron no hyɛ asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no ma—Ɛdɛ a wɔwɔ no Kristo mu no mene wɔn amanehunu mmorosoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 74 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Afei ɛbaa sɛ Korihɔ abrabɔ baa awieɛ no akyire no, Alma nsa kaa ɛnkra sɛ Soramfoɔ ɛredanedane Awurade akwan, na Soram a ɔyɛ wɔn kandifoɔ no atwe nkurɔfoɔ no akoma ama wɔabɔ wɔn mu ase asom ahonini mum no, n’akoma hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɛredi yea, ɛnam nkurɔfoɔ no amumuyɛ nti.

2 Na Alma dii awerɛhoɔ kɛseɛ yie mmerɛ a ɔhunu amumuyɛ a ɛwɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ no mu no; ɛno nti ɔdii awerɛhoɔ kɛseɛ wɔ n’akoma mu ɛnam Soramfoɔ ho a wɔate afiri Nifaefoɔ ho no nti.

3 Afei na Soramfoɔ no aboa wɔn ano wɔ asaase bi a wɔfrɛ no Antionum, a ɛwɔ Sarahɛmla asaase no apueɛ afa mu, baabi a aka kakraabi na ɛne ɛpo ano abɔ hyeɛ no. Yɛsɔn asaase no anaafoɔ a ɛno nso da ɛserɛ no anaafoɔ, ɛserɛ no a na Lamanfoɔ ahyɛ so ma no.

4 Afei Nifaefoɔ no surooe yie sɛ anhwɛ a na Soramfoɔ no ne Lamanfoɔ no akɔyɛ baako, na ɛbɛma Nifaefoɔ no ahwere nneɛma bebree.

5 Na afei ɛnam sɛ wɔka asɛm no a ɛtumi ma nkurɔfoɔ no yɛ deɛ ɛyɛ nokware—aane, na ɛnya tumi kɛseɛ wɔ nkurɔfoɔ no adwene so kyɛn akofena, anaa biribifoforɔ biara a ato wɔn—ɛno nti Alma dwenee sɛ ɛbɛhia sɛ wɔde Onyankopɔn asɛm no mu tumi no bɛyɛ adwuma ahwɛ.

6 Ɛno nti ɔfaa Amon, ne Aaron, ne Omna; na ɔgyaa Himnae wɔ Sarahɛmla asɔre no mu; na mmom mmiɛnsa a wɔn di kan no deɛ ɔfaa wɔn kaa ne ho, ne Amulek ne Seesrom nso, a na wɔwɔ Melek; na ɔfaa ne mmammarima no mu mmienu nso.

7 Afei ne mmammarima no mu panin no deɛ wɔamfa no anka ne ho, na ne din de Hɛlaman; na mmom wɔn a ɔfaa wɔn kaa ne ho no, wɔn din de Siblon ne Korianton; na saa nkurɔfoɔ yi maa wɔne wɔn kɔɔ Soramfoɔ no mu sɛ wɔrekɔka asɛm no akyerɛ wɔn.

8 Afei Soramfoɔ yi yɛ Nifaefoɔ a wɔate atua afiri Nifaefoɔ mu; ɛno nti wɔaka Onyankopɔn asɛm no akyerɛ wɔn da.

9 Mmom wɔahwease wɔ mfomsoɔ kɛseɛ mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔannhwɛ sɛ wɔbɛdi Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm n’ahyɛdeɛ so, sɛdeɛ Mose mmara no teɛ no.

10 Ɛna wɔnni asɔre no dwumadie biara so, sɛ wɔbɛkɔ so abɔ mpaeɛ na wɔasu afrɛ Onyankopɔn dabiara, amma wɔankɔ nsɔhwɛ mu.

11 Aane, ne tia ara ne sɛ wɔdanee Awurade akwan wɔ akwan ahodoɔ bebree mu; ɛno nti, na ɛmaa Alma ne n’asɛmpatrɛfoɔ no kɔɔ asaase no so sɛ wɔrekɔka asɛm no akyerɛ wɔn.

12 Afei, mmerɛ a wɔbaa asaase no so no, hwɛ, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn mmerɛ a wɔhunu sɛ Soramfoɔ no asi nhyiadan, na wɔboa wɔn ano bɔ mu dakoro wɔ dapɛn mu, saa da no wɔfrɛɛ no Awurade da; na wɔsomm wɔ ɛkwan bi so a Alma ne ne nuanom nhunu bi da;

13 Na wɔahyehyɛ baabi wɔn hyiadan no mfinfini, na ɛhɔ na wɔgyina, na ɛhɔ wɔ soro tra etire so; na nipa baako pɛ na ɔtumi kɔ soro hɔ.

14 Ɛno nti, obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔsom no ɛwɔ sɛ ɔkɔgyina soro hɔ, na ɔma ne nsa so kɔ soro, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ tea mu sɛ:

15 Kronkron, kronkron Nyankopɔn; yɛgyedi sɛ wo yɛ Onyankopɔn, na yɛgyedi sɛ woyɛ kronkron, na woyɛ honhom, na woda so yɛ honhom, na wobɛyɛ honhom afebɔɔ.

16 Kronkron Nyankopɔn, yɛgyedi sɛ wo na wate yɛne yɛn nuanom ntam; na yɛnnye yɛn nuanom amamerɛ a wɔn agyanom nam nkwadaa adwene so de maa wɔn no nni; na mmom yɛgyedi sɛ wo na wayi yɛn sɛ yɛnyɛ wo mma kronkron; na wada no adi akyerɛ yɛn sɛ Kristo biara remma.

17 Na mmom wote saa ara ɛnora, ɛnɛ, ne afebɔɔ, na wayi yɛn sɛ yɛmɛnya nkwagyeɛ, mmerɛ a wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia nyina ara no wonam wabufuhyeɛ so de wɔn ato asamando, O Nyankopɔn yɛda wo ase wɔ saa kronkron yɛ yi ho; na yɛda wo ase nso sɛ wayi yɛn amma yɛanni yɛn nuanom nkwasea amamerɛ akyiri, deɛ ɛbrɛ wɔn ase ma wɔnya gyedie wɔ Kristo mu, deɛ ɛtwe wɔn akoma firi wo ho koraa, yɛn Nyankopɔn.

18 Na yɛda wo ase bio, O Nyankopɔn, sɛ yɛyɛ nkurɔfoɔ kronkron a wasa mu ayi yɛn. Amen.

19 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Alma ne ne nuanom ne ne mmammarima no tee saa mpeabɔ yi no, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn mmorosoɔ.

20 Na hwɛ, obiara kɔbɔɔ saa mpaeɛ korɔ no ara.

21 Afei wɔfrɛɛ saa baabi no Rameumptom, a n’asekyerɛ ne sɛ kronkron gyinabea.

22 Afei saa baabi yi so na obiara kɔgyina bɔ saa mpaebɔ korɔ yi ara kyerɛ Nyankopɔn, da wɔn Nyankopɔn ase sɛ wasa mu ayi wɔn, na wanyae wɔn amma wɔankɔdi wɔn nuanom amamerɛ akyiri, na wɔantwe wɔn akoma amma wɔanye nneɛma a ɛbɛba a wɔnnim ho hwee no anni.

23 Afei, mmerɛ a nkurɔfoɔ no nyina ara daa ase wɔ saa kwan yi so wiee, wɔsann wɔn akyiri kɔɔ wɔn afiefie mu, na wɔanka hwee a ɛfa wɔn Nyankopɔn ho bio kɔpem sɛ wɔboaa wɔn ano bio wɔ saa kronkron gyinabea hɔ de naaseɛ maa sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ no.

24 Afei mmerɛ a Alma hunu sei no ɛyɛ n’akoma anibereɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu sɛ wɔyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn atirimuɔdenfoɔ na wɔte wɔn bɔne mu saa ara; aane ɔhunu sɛ wɔn akoma di sika kɔkɔɔ, dwetɛ, ne afɛɛfɛdeɛ ahodoɔ nyina ara akyiri.

25 Aane, na ɔhunu nso sɛ wɔamema wɔn ho so ama ahomasoɔ ahyɛ wɔn akoma mu ma.

26 Na ɔmaa ne nne so kɔɔ soro, na ɔteaa mu sɛ: O ɛnkɔsi dabɛn, O Awurade, na wobɛhwɛ ama wo nkoa atena ase ha wɔ honam mu, ahwɛ saa atirimuɔden kɛseɛ sei a ɛwɔ nnipa mma mu yi?

27 Hwɛ, O Nyankopɔn, wɔresu frɛ wo, nanso ahomasoɔ ahyɛ wɔn akoma mu ma. Hwɛ, O Nyankopɔn, wɔde wɔn ano resu frɛ wo, wɔ mmerɛ a wɔde wiase nneɛma hunu hyehyɛ wɔn ho buruburo de mema wɔn ho so.

28 Hwɛ, O me Nyankopɔn, wɔn ntadeɛ aboɔden, ne wɔn mpɛtea, ne wɔn agudeɛ ɛdeda wɔn abakɔn, ne wɔn sika kɔkɔɔ ahyehyɛdeɛ, ne nneɛma a ɛsombo a wɔde siesie wɔn ho; na hwɛ, wɔde wɔn akoma ato so, nanso wɔsu frɛ wo na wɔka sɛ—Yɛda wo ase, O Nyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ yɛyɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wasa mu ayi yɛn ama wo ho, mmerɛ a nkaeɛ no bɛyera.

29 Aane, na wɔka sɛ wama wɔn ahunu sɛ Kristo biara remma.

30 O Awurade Nyankopɔn ɛnkɔsi dabɛn na wobɛhwɛ ama saa atirimuɔden ne nokwaredie a ɛnni nkurɔfoɔ yi mu yi bɛkɔ so? O Awurade, wobɛma me ahoɔden ama matumi de agyina me mmerɛyɛ yi ano. Ɛfiri sɛ meyɛ mmerɛ, na saa atirimuɔdensɛm a ɛte nkurɔfoɔ yi mu yi ma me kra di yea.

31 O Awurade, awerɛhoɔ ahyɛ m’akoma ma dodo; wo bɛkyekyere me kra werɛ wɔ Kristo mu. O Awurade, wobɛma manya ahoɔden, ama mede abotare de agyin saa amanehunu a ɛbɛba me so yi, ɛnam nkurɔfoɔ yi amumuyɛ nti.

32 O Awurade, wobɛma me kra awerɛkyekyerɛ, na wama madi nkunim, ne me nuanom apaafoɔ a wɔka me ho yi nso—aane, Amon, ne Aaron, ne Omna, ne Amulek nso ne Seesrom, ne me mmammarima mmienu yi nso—aane, yei nyina ara mpo na wo bɛkyekyere wɔn werɛ, O Awurade. Aane, wo bɛma wɔn akra awerɛkyekyerɛ wɔ Kristo mu.

33 Wo bɛma wɔn anya ahoɔden, ama wɔde agyina amanehunu a ɛbɛba wɔn so ɛnam nkurɔfoɔ yi amumuyɛ nti.

34 O Awurade, wobɛma yɛn nkunimdie ama yɛatwe wɔn ama wo wɔ Kristo mu bio.

35 Hwɛ, O Awurade, wɔn akra sombo, na wɔn mu dodoɔ no ara yɛ yɛn nuanom; ɛno nti, ma yɛn tumi, ne nyansa O Awurade, ma yɛntumi ntwe yɛn nuanom yi mma wo bio.

36 Afei ɛbaa sɛ mmerɛ a Alma kaa saa nsɛm yi wieeɛ no ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn a wɔne wɔn wɔ hɔ no nyina ara so. Na hwɛ, mmerɛ a ɔbɔɔ ne nsa mu guu wɔn so no, honhom Kronkron no hyɛɛ wɔn ma.

37 Na ɛno akyiri no wɔdii mpaepae mu, na obiara kɔɔ ne kwan, a wɔannwenenwene wɔ deɛ wɔbɛdie ho, anaa deɛ wɔbɛnom ho, anaa deɛ wɔbɛfira ho.

38 Na Awurade yɛɛ wɔn mmoa maa ɛkɔm anne wɔn, na nsukɔm anne wɔn; aane, na ɔmaa wɔn ahoɔden nso, na wɔanhunu amane biara, gye sɛ ɛdɛ a wɔwɔ no Kristo mu no mene wɔn amanehunu biara. Afei yeinom sii, ɛnam Alma mpaeɛ a ɔbɔɔ no wɔ gyedie mu no nti.
alma 32:
[center][font_size=26]Ti 32[/font_size][/center]

[i]Alma kyerɛkyerɛ ahiafoɔ a wɔn amanehunu abrɛ wɔn ase—Gyedie yɛ anidasoɔ ho ahotosoɔ wɔ adeɛ a yɛnhunu na ɛyɛ nokware—Alma di adanseɛ sɛ abɔfoɔ som marima, mmaa, ne nkwadaa—Alma de asɛm no toto aba ho—Ɛwɔ sɛ wɔdua na wɔma no aduanenuro—Ɛno ma ɛnyini yɛ dua na ne so na wɔte nkwa a ɛnniawieɛ aba firi. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 74 ansa na wɔrebɛwo Kristo.[/i]

1 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔkɔɔe, na wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreka Onyankopɔn asɛm no akyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no, wɔwurawuraa wɔn nhyiadan mu ne wɔn afiefie mu; aane na wɔkaa asɛm no mpo wɔ wɔn mmɔnten so.

2 Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔyɛɛ adwuma yie wɔ wɔn mu, maa wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔredi nkunim wɔ ahiafoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu no so na hwɛ, wɔyii wɔn firii nhyiadan no mu ɛnam wɔn ntaadeɛ a amoɔmoa no nti.

3 Ɛno nti wɔamma wɔn kwan amma wɔanwura wɔn nhyiadan no mu ankɔsom Nyankopɔn, wɔbuu wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ efii; ɛno nti na wɔyɛ ahiafoɔ; aane, wɔn nuanom ahiafoɔ a wɔwɔ wɔn mu no buu wɔn sɛ wɔn ho nni mfasoɔ; ɛno nti na wɔyɛ ahiafoɔ wɔ wiase nneɛma afa mu; na wɔyɛ ahiafoɔ nso wɔ akoma mu.

4 Afei mmerɛ a na Alma rekyerɛ adeɛ na wɔrekasa kyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ no wɔ Onida pampa no so no, nkurɔfokuo kɛseɛ bi baa ne nkyɛn, wɔn a yɛaka wɔn ho asɛm sɛ wɔyɛ ahiafoɔ wɔ akoma mu no, ɛnam wɔn hia buruburo wɔ wiase nneɛma mu no nti.

5 Na wɔbaa Alma hɔ; na wɔn panin no see no sɛ: Hwɛ, ɛdeɛn na me nuanom yi nyɛ, ɛnam wɔn hia buruburo nti nnipa nyina ara mfa wɔn nnyɛ hwee, aane, yɛn asɔfoɔ no mpo titire; ɛfiri sɛ wɔapamo yɛn afiri yɛn nhyiadan a yɛabrɛ yɛn ho de yɛn ankasa yɛn nsa asi no mu; na ɛnam yɛn hia buruburo mmorosoɔ nti no wɔapamo yɛn; na yɛnni baabiara a yɛbɛsom yɛn Nyankopɔn; na hwɛ, ɛdeɛn na yɛn nyɛ?

6 Na afei mmerɛ a Alma tee yei no, Alma danee n’ani hwɛɛ no ntɛmntɛm, na ɔde ɛdɛ kɛseɛ hunuui; ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu sɛ wɔn amanehunu ama wɔanya ahobraseɛ ampa na wɔasiesie wɔn ho sɛ wɔbɛtie asɛm no.

7 Ɛno nti wanka hwee bio ankyerɛ nkurɔfokuo nkaeɛ no; na mmom ɔtenee ne nsa na ɔteaa mu frɛɛ wɔn a wahunu sɛ wɔasakyera wɔn ho nokware mu no, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

8 Mehunu sɛ mobrɛ mo ho ase wɔ akoma mu; na ɛte saa deɛ a, na nhyira nka mo.

9 Hwɛ mo nua yi aka sɛ, ɛdeɛn na yɛn nyɛ?—Ɛfiri sɛ wɔapamo yɛn afiri yɛn nhyiadan mu, ama yɛntumi nsom yɛn Nyankopɔn.

10 Hwɛ mese mo sɛ, mo adwene yɛ mo sɛ mo rentumi nsom Onyankopɔn wɔ baabi foforɔ ka mo nhyiadan no nko ara mu anaa?

11 Na ebio nso, mɛbisa mo sɛ, mosusu sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ mosom Onyankopɔn da koro pɛ wɔ dapɛn no mu anaa?

12 Mese mo sɛ, ɛyɛ sɛ wɔapamo mo afiri mo nhyiadan mu, ama moabrɛ mo ho ase, na ama mo asua nyansa; ɛfiri sɛ ɛho hia sɛ mosua nyansa; na ɛnam sɛ moyɛ ahiafoɔ buruburo nti na mo nuanom mfa mo nnyɛ hwee na wɔato mo atwene no, ama mo akoma ayɛ mmerɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ahokyerɛ ama mo abrɛ mo ho ase.
